この女性は安全な出産とお腹の中にいる子供の健康のために熱心に祈っています。
この女性は妊娠中は何かこなす度に長い休息を取り、不要なリスクをとってお腹の中の子供の健康が脅かされないようにして、注意深く頑張りすぎないようにしています。
この女性は妊娠中であることをやや軽視しており、子供の健康を優先するよりも、現在の状態の不便さの気を紛らわせる方法を見つけることについて心配しています。
合併症を恐れてこの女性は普段の毎日の活動から小休暇を取り、休息とお腹の中の子供の健康を守ることに集中することにしました。
彼女の妊娠は縁起の良い兆候があり、母子ともに健康な状態で出産できるだろう。
彼女の妊娠は縁起の悪い兆候があり、残念な運命が訪れるかもしれない。
この女性は肉の誘惑を避け、貞節となることを聖処女に盟約した。代わりにキリストの母は出産の危険な場面でも彼女とお腹の中の子供を守ってくださるはずだ。
この女性は慎みのない服を避け、謙虚となることを聖処女に盟約した。代わりにキリストの母は出産の危険な場面でも彼女とお腹の中の子供を守ってくださるはずだ。
この女性は病める人や貧しき人を助け、慈善を行うことを聖処女に盟約した。代わりにキリストの母は出産の危険な場面でも彼女とお腹の中の子供を守ってくださるはずだ。
この女性は普段の習慣を改めて全ての無駄を捨て、節制することを聖処女に盟約した。代わりにキリストの母は出産の危険な場面でも彼女とお腹の中の子供を守ってくださるはずだ。
This woman is traveling alone in the wilderness, exposing both herself and the child that she is carrying to bad weather, predators and bandits.
愛する人の訪問を受け、慰問されたことによって妊娠中の微妙な時期のこの女性の心は穏やかになっている。
この子が自分の最初の子供になると思うと、急に不安が押し寄せてきた。もし何か間違ったことをしたら？何か悪いことが起こったら？出産の日が来るまで何をして過ごせばいいのだろうか？
子供の健康のために祈らねば。
あらゆる重労働は避けて休まなければ。
この重い責任から気を紛らわせる方法を何かしら見つけなければ。
Ouch! As I place a hand over my belly and slowly sit down, a soft smile makes its way across my face. The baby is kicking again. I wonder if he will grow up to be a warrior...
I am sure I am carrying a fierce little soldier.
The child's rowdiness inside your belly may be a sign of his future character.

Today, as I was laying down, gently caressing my stomach and looking out my bedroom's window, I started to wonder what will my next child be. It would be nice to finally give birth to a boy, after all this time, and make sure my dynasty has a proper heir...

Today, as I was laying down, gently caressing my stomach and looking out my bedroom's window, I started to wonder what will my next child be. It would be nice to finally give birth to a girl, after all this time, and make sure my dynasty has a proper heir...
Today, as I was laying down, gently caressing my stomach and looking out my bedroom's window, I started to wonder what will my next child be: am I carrying a boy or a girl?
I sure hope it is a boy.
You will be truly delighted if the child you are carrying ends up being a §Yboy§!.
I sure hope it is a girl.
You will be truly delighted if the child you are carrying ends up being a §Ygirl§!.

What a bother! The number of good dresses that I am still able to wear is growing increasingly smaller as my pregnancy takes its course. Perhaps I should order new clothes to be tailored on my current measurements...
Maybe if I ate less I could still wear some of my old dresses...
I will have [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] buy me new clothes.
Ask your husband to buy you new clothes.
I really need to order new clothes.
No need to go through all this trouble for some dress.
妻の[From.GetFirstName]に新しい服が欲しいと言われた。妊娠したことで以前の衣装はきつくて入らなくなり、宮廷に着ていくのにふさわしい服が一つもなくなってしまったので苛立っているようだ。
お前、新しい服なんかいらないよ。今でも十分に美しいのだから!
よかろう、仕立て屋を呼べ。
必要ないのでは？数か月後には捨ててしまうだろうに。
お腹が大きくなっても新しい豪華な服は必要ないとの[From.GetFirstName]の意見に納得した。
[From.GetFirstName] was happy to buy me new clothes. Being able to wear something that is both nice and comfortable has certainly improved my disposition.
Unbelievable! [From.GetFirstName] refused to buy me new clothes! Am I not already under enough stress as it is?
He never thinks about how I feel.
当初は兆候は小さく、偶然の一致として却下されましたが、今では無視できないほど頻繁になっています。私は縁起の良い星の下で出産するでしょう。
全ての御印を正しくとらえなくてはならない。
祝福されているにちがいない！
当初は兆候は小さく、偶然の一致として却下されましたが、今では無視できないほど頻繁になっています。妻は縁起の良い星の下で出産するでしょう。
良い結果になればよいが。
当初は兆候は小さく、偶然の一致として却下されましたが、今では無視できないほど頻繁になっています。私の妊娠を取り巻く兆しは非常に恐ろしいものです。
Maybe I am misinterpreting the signs...
当初は兆候は小さく、偶然の一致として却下されましたが、今では無視できないほど頻繁になっています。妻の妊娠を取り巻く兆しは非常に恐ろしいものです。
兆候の解釈が間違えていると思う。
My poor [From.GetFirstName]! What am I going to do now!?!
願わくは偶然の一致だといいのだが…
私の将来について確実なことはなく、生まれてくる子供の人生について心配することを止めることはできない。おそらく聖母マリアに誓いを立て、苦難を和らげ、強くて健康な子供を産むのを助けてくれるよう聖母に祈るべきだ。
聖母にどのような誓約をするかを決めます
私は私の悩みと共に聖母に心配する必要はない。
聖母マリアの像は礼拝堂のアルコーブに立っていて、彼女の腕の中では神の子が休んでいる。私はその前にひざまずいて、彼女の哀しい笑顔を見上げる。
貞節で高潔であることを誓う
§Y貞節§!を守り、肉欲の快楽を避けることで、§Y聖母マリア§!はあなたと強くて健康な子どもを祝福なさるでしょう
謙虚であることと、すべての軽薄な物を遠ざけることを誓う
§Y謙虚§!であり、装身具や上等な衣服を避けることで、§Y聖母マリア§!はあなたと強くて健康な子どもを祝福なさるでしょう
慈善団体で、貧しい人々の世話をすることを誓う
§Y慈善§!であることに努め、貧しい人々に富を与えることで、§Y聖母マリア§!はあなたと強くて健康な子どもを祝福なさるでしょう
節制し、すべての不摂生を避けることを誓う
§Y節制§!に努め、全ての不摂生を避けることで、§Y聖母マリア§!はあなたと強くて健康な子どもを祝福なさるでしょう

I cannot stop worrying about my unborn child. Perhaps I should make a personal offering to the old gods and placate their thirst for blood so that they in turn may spare the life of my unborn child as well as mine.
Expose yourself to the dangers of the wilderness to give the gods their due, and pray for the future health of your unborn child.
It would be too dangerous to go out alone in my condition.
供物の煙が空に昇ると、風の中を進む神々の幽かな囁きが聞こえてきそうだ。不死の者たちへの呼びかけは済み、今度は私の要求を伝える時間だ。
神よ！我に逞しく健やかな子どもを与えたまえ！
If the gods will it, your child will be born §YStrong§!.
Gods! I only hope to have a beautiful and healthy child!
If the gods will it, your child will be born §YBeautiful§!.
Gods! I wish for my child to be bright and healthy!
If the gods will it, your child will be born §YSmart§!.
うーん、子供の様子が今日はいつもと違うようだ。何を食べるべきだろう？
たくさんであれば「何を」食べるかは問題ではない。
You do not seem to crave for anything out of the ordinary. It is probably for the best.
ウズラの足はどんな味がするのだろう…
Order your cooks to prepare a §Yquail's foot§! for dinner.
どうしてもウサギの頭が食べたいのだ……
Order your cooks to prepare a §Yhare's head§! for dinner.
マスの眼が食べたい！今すぐ！
Order your cooks to spice your dinner with a §Ytrout's eye§!.
I will ask my husband about it.
妻は妊娠したせいで食べ物の好みが大分おかしくなってしまった。妻が夕食に頼むものはもはや控えめに言っても不安になるようなものから前向きに言ってもおぞましいものにまで広がってしまっている。それでも、学者共が言うには妊娠した女性の食べたいものを常に食べさせてやらなければいけないらしい…
妻が食べたいだけいくらでも食べさせてやろう。
[From.GetFirstName]がいつでも満腹でいられるように、コックに面倒を見させる。
つまりうずらの「足」ということかな、お前？
コックに[From.GetFirstName]の夕食の§Yウズラの足§!を用意させる。
コックに[From.GetFirstName]の夕食の§Yうさぎの頭§!を用意させる。
うぇっ！なんで魚の目玉なんか食べたいのかね？
コックに[From.GetFirstName]の夕食の§Yマスの目玉§!を用意させる。
こんなくだらないことに費やす金はない。
Mother is not feeling well. The baby in her belly is unruly and she is gloomy all the time. Maybe I should go cheer her up?
My mother has not been feeling well lately. Going through a pregnancy is no easy task. Perhaps I should visit her and try to cheer her up a bit.
どうもこの頃妻がふさぎこんだ様子だ。お腹の子が負担になって四体液のバランスが乱れたことが妻の気分に影響したに違いない。
背徳的な裏切りへの罪悪感ゆえか、それとも単に妊娠して四体液のバランスが乱れているからかは定かでないが、近ごろ妻はすっかり塞ぎこんでいる。どうやら自分が私に対して犯した罪の重さを、ようやく理解しだしたようだ。
妻に何かよいものを買おう。
自分の優しい振る舞いに§Y[Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]§!は慰められるだろう。
彼女と一緒にいる時間を作ろう。
[GetFromRelation]は自分の訪問を喜ぶはずだ。
妻は元気になるだろう。
[From.GetFirstName]がどんな感情を抱いているか、私には想像することしかできない――お互いに対する愛情を公にできないだけでなく、私たちの愛の結晶のことも、嘘でごまかしているはずだ。
[From.GetFirstName]がどんな感情を抱いているか、私には想像することしかできない――お互いに対する愛情を公にできないだけでなく、望まない子を宿すことを強いられたのだ。
彼女のところへ行かなければ。
その夜、私は夫が部屋で待っているのを見つけてとても驚いた。部屋の周りにはいろいろな種類のプレゼントが並んでいた。どうやら彼は妊娠のお祝いを伝えたいだけのようだ。
Oh, dear, you really *do* love me!
ありがとう、あなたの気持ちは確かに受け取ったよ
自分が贈ったプレゼントで[From.GetFirstName]はとても喜んでいた。私を見るやいなや妻は私の腕に飛び込んできて情熱的なキスをお見舞いしてきた。どうやら優しい振る舞いを行った自分に妻は完全に虜になったようだ。

[From.GetFirstName] decided to come visit me. [From.GetSheHeCap] said that [From.GetSheHe] was worried about my health, and so decided to spend the entire afternoon trying to cheer me up, asking questions about [From.GetHerHis] future brother, touching my belly, and trying to hear the baby inside. [From.GetSheHeCap] is such a sweet child.

[From.GetFirstName] decided to come visit me. [From.GetSheHeCap] worries about my health and wished to offer [From.GetHerHis] sympathies for my current condition. [From.GetSheHeCap] told me that [From.GetSheHe] is quite eager to meet [From.GetHerHis] new baby brother or sister.

My beloved husband decided to pay me a visit tonight. We have not had a lot of time to be together since the pregnancy started showing, so it was a much welcome surprise for me to meet him in private again.
You are going to be a wonderful big [From.GetSisterBrother], [From.GetFirstName].
あなたの訪問に感謝します。
母さんのところへ行って正解だった。母さんは私と話してとても気分がよくなったようだし、生まれてくる子のいい[Root.GetSisterBrother]になれると言ってくれた。
I was right to visit my [GetFromRelation]. She is feeling much better now. Hopefully what I did will help her get through this pregnancy more easily.
I hoe you are well, Mother.

When I discovered [From.GetFirstName] lurking in my chambers I barely managed to restrain myself from screaming and accidentally call the guards on [From.GetHerHim]. My lover told me that [From.GetSheHe] wished to comfort me in this stressful period of my life.
I am so glad you came!
赤ん坊がようやく産まれたので、私は再びぐっすりと眠ることができます。
私の小さな[From.GetFirstName]は非常におしゃべりで陽気な[From.GetBoyGirl]に成長している。[From.GetHerHis]のあのねじれた足のためではないならば...
何が原因なのだろうか…
My little [From.GetFirstName] is growing into a silent [From.GetBoyGirl]. I worry that [From.GetSheHe] might be having a harder time learning to talk because of that harelip of [From.GetHersHis].
私の[From.GetFirstName]は特別かわいい子供というわけではないが、平凡な顔の奥には確かに非凡な好奇心が隠れている。
It looks like all that time kicking in my belly was not just for show: my sweet [From.GetFirstName] is growing into a fierce and healthy [From.GetBoyGirl].
[From.GetHerHim]のことをとても誇りに思う！
The gods are truly generous! My sacrifice was not in vain: [From.GetFirstName] is growing into a healthy and strong [From.GetBoyGirl].

The gods are truly generous! My sacrifice was not in vain: [From.GetFirstName] is growing into a healthy and bright [From.GetBoyGirl].

食堂へ向かって歩いていると、すれ違った召使いの少女たちにクスクス笑われた。慌てた様子で仕事に戻っていったので少女たちの喋っていたことはほんの少ししか聞こえなかったが、奴らのふざけた態度の原因がこのむくんだデカい尻にあることは明らかだ。これまでの大晩餐の数々で遂に自分の姿が台無しになり始めたのだ。

前に居城から出て散歩にでかけたり領地を見て回ったりしたのはいつのことだっただろう？ずっと怠けていたせいでこんなたるんだ豚の様になってしまったとは言え、だからなんだというのだ？自分は[Root.GetTitle]なのだ。肉体労働者とは違う。

深夜をまわり、司書たちが出ていって全ての明かりが落とされた図書館にいるのは自分だけだ。机の上に広げられた古い研究所のページを繰る度に手の震えが激しくなり、目の下には大きな隈ができたが、それでも自分を止められない。豊かな魂に比べれば肉体などなんと無駄なことか！
どんな不摂生にも誘惑にも目もくれず、来る日も来る日も[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]の教えを追求した。顔色が悪くなり、虚弱体質にはなったのかもしれないが、敬虔なる節制を守れば守るほど魂が心新たにより強くより清められていくのを感じる。毎日のように襲ってくる空腹を満たしていたのももう過去の話だ。
食べかけのパンから目を逸らし、テーブルの横に無言で並ぶ給仕の列へとギョロリと見つめた。若い召使いの女が目をそらしているのを見つけて疑念は即座に確信へと変わった。裏切り者の女は衛兵に引きずられていって残った召使いたちに料理が皿ごとひっくり返された。皆自分に毒を盛ろうとしている。どうやって食事を取ればいいというのだ？
今日もまた別の封臣が自分の健康を心配して諫言してきたのをはねつけた。どんな課題や問題も解決する自分の勤勉さには宮廷の者の多くがとても感謝しているのに、今度は過労死を心配されるようになったのだ。いつも目の下に隈を作って布団に入り、ほんの風のひとそよぎでもよろめきそうになる。
今朝は大切な古文書が[Root.GetHouse]から廷臣が去る前に届くかどうか確認するため門へと急いだ。召使いに小姓と間違えられて最初は笑っていたが、今よく考えてみると、ひたむきに研究と[Root.GetTitle]としての責任を果たすことはもはやこの肉体では難しくなってしまったのではないか？
もっと睡眠を取るべきかもしれない…
毎日もっと休む時間を取るようにします。食生活を大きく変えるやり方と比べるとあまり大した成果は出ないでしょうが、少なくともかつての習慣がぶり返す危険は冒さずに済みます。
こんな風にやせ細るなど、戦士としてあってはならないことだ！
バカバカしい。節制は健康を保つためには欠かせないものだ。
とにかく食事の時間などない。
正直食事もしたくない。
あらゆる誘惑に抵抗しなければ。
自分のことなど考えられない。やるべきことがあまりに多すぎる！
お前らのようなのに一杯食わされるぐらいなら飢えた方がマシだ！
どのみち食事など面倒すぎる…
節制がすぎると§Y栄養失調§!になる可能性があります。
食事と睡眠の時間を減らすことでより§Y勤勉§!になれるかもしれません。
食事と睡眠の時間を減らすことで自分の§Y学識§!を向上させることができるかもしれません。
誘惑に耐え、神々との融和により時間を費やすことによって§Y狂信的§!になれるかもしれません。
食事と睡眠管理に実践的な手法を取ることで自分の§Y策略§!が向上するかもしれません。
いや、これはやりすぎだ！なにか食べなければ！
食生活と睡眠時間を変えることで体型をもとに戻します。
痩せてガリガリになったのかもしれないが、今ほど自分が生きていると実感できたことはない！いつもやるべきことも直すべきこともある。我が魂は常に新たな挑戦を求めているのだ。上手く出来た仕事を見返して得る満足だけでお腹は一杯だ。
ああ、なんと満足できることか！
ついさっき気付いたのだが、いつの頃からか家族の訪問を受けることがどんどん多くなってきたきたような気がする。病気で死にそうだとか思われているのか、単に自分の惨めな有様を哀れんでいるだけなのかはわからないが、少なくとも自分の前ではずいぶん丁寧に気遣いをしてくれるようになった気がする。
自分が気にすることではない…
§Y親族§!がこちらに憐れみを示すことにより、こちらへの評価が上昇します。
[GetFromRelation]の[From.GetFirstName]がこの様な惨めな状態に陥り、床についたまま食事も取らずすすり泣いている今、もはやその骨と皮だけの肉体からひねり出されるささやかな願いを無下にすることなど誰にもできなくなりつつある。
こんな虚弱で悲しい被造物を誰が憎めようか？

The ambassador smiles politely at me and gives me his best wishes before leaving the court room. I can scarcely find anybody that doesn't appreciate my helpful and eager attitude. Having to take care of everybody's problems may be vexing, but has allowed me to significantly increase my network of friends and allies both at court and abroad.
I am always happy to be of service.

It has been quite some time since I returned to my bedroom to sleep regularly. I have been informed that several people in my court are worried about me, that I am going insane in my library, but they simply do not understand how imperative it is for me to continue my research. My frail, decaying body is a small price to pay for the arcane secrets I am discovering within these walls.

Continued meditation has helped me expunge all base desires from my flesh. As my body grows weaker, I feel my soul reaching for the divine, every day a bit closer to its apotheosis. I have long since started to ignore the small-minded advices of my courtiers about sleep, food, or exercise. I am far beyond such mundane needs.
すでに天にも昇るような気持ちだ！
I was surprised to realize that my continued and rigorous abstinence has considerably improved my health. It appears that my body was in need of a bit more moderation in order to work better.
今日、私は、馬に乗っている間に気を失った後、危うく馬に踏みつけられるところだった。 私の食生活は、健康をかなり損なったようだ。

Cutting on sleeping and eating times has really helped me getting ahead of my tasks. I may be looking ghastly, but I feel much better now that everything has been nicely fit into my schedule. As long as I keep skipping dinner and only sleep twice a week, I can fulfill all my responsibilities with ease.

I gaze once more into my mirror, giving a satisfied smirk to my reflection. It has not been easy resisting all temptations, but now I have finally gained the sort of slim, graceful figure that most ladies can only dream of. With not a single ounce of fat left on my body, I am surely going to be the envy of the realm.

I still need to be very careful about what I eat, and make sure to sleep as little as possible, lest some one of those vile turncoats pretending to be my servants can have his way with me, but I am definitely getting better at spotting the guilty looks and traitorous brows amongst the forgettable faces of my staff.

私の [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] は近頃、[From.GetHerselfHimself]の身を省みず自棄にでもなっているようだ。[From.GetManWoman] はほとんど何も口にせず、寝ることもなく、急速に歩く骸骨へと変貌していっている。もし [From.GetSheHe]がこんなことを続けるようなら、[From.GetSheHe] は、完全に衰弱しきってしまうかもしれない。
Nonsense! [From.GetHerHisCap] temperance and dedication are praiseworthy!
Inform §Y[From.GetFirstName]§! that you are happy for [From.GetHerHim].
なるべく角が立たないように[From.GetHerHim]に注意をする必要がある。
あらゆる手を使って§Y[From.GetFirstName]§!の抱える問題のある行動や、拒食をやめるよう注意する。
一体どうしてしまったんだ？死んでしまうぞ？なんでもいい、食うんだ！
無遠慮に§Y[From.GetFirstName]§!は痩せすぎだと注意する。
私には関係のないことだ。
Just today my [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] has openly praised me for my enviable shape, as well as my exemplary show of constraint and dedication in all things.
Very nice of you to say so.
今朝、[From.GetFirstName]が部屋に来て、私の体が気がかりであることを話してくれた。[From.GetSheHeCap]はこの断食が私を深刻な危険にさらしているのではないかと考え、もっと食べるように勧めた。
[GetFromRelation]が苛立たしい！ [From.GetSheHeCap] は私の部屋に飛び込んでくると、私が飢え死にする前に、もっとたくさん食べた方が良いと言い立てた。まるで私のあらゆる私生活に干渉する権利があるかのようだ。
体型を戻すために食事療法を開始します。
自分の言葉がちゃんと届いたようで安心した。[From.GetFirstName]は心配してくれたことに感謝の言葉を述べ、これからはもっとバランスの取れた生活習慣を送れるよう努力すると約束してくれた。
残念ながら[From.GetFirstName]には私の言葉も馬耳東風だった。私の警告は無視され、[From.GetHerHis]は未だ部屋の中で毎日を無為に過ごしている。
さらに悪化しています。
今までの食生活を変えることは簡単なことではなかったが、どうやら遂にその成果が出たようだ。目の下のたるみが完全になくなり、皮膚にも生気が戻ってきた。そして奮励努力する度に気が遠くなるような感じもなくなってきた。
新しい服がいるかもしれないな…

I have tried my best to ignore my natural instincts and force myself to eat more often, but it is of no use: every time I manage to take a little bite more than usual I end up feeling sick or puking everything out again. Dieting is making me feel worse than I ever was before. Perhaps I should just stop trying...
I must force myself to like food!
Go against your temperate inclinations and gain back some weight.
I need to keep thinking of my health.
Endure the stress and gain back some weight.
I should not make my life even more miserable.
Cope with your depression and gain back some weight.
Appetite or not, I have to eat something!
基本的な衝動を無視して、体重を少し増やす。
My research will have to wait.
Set aside your studies for a while in order to recover some of your lost weight.
I must force my mind to the mundane.
Reduce your religious fasting and meditation in order to recover some of your lost weight.
I must risk the poison to survive.
敵が自分の体重を取り戻そうと企んでいるのではないかという不安は無視する。
I must rest if I want to recover.
Work less to better adjust to your new diet and gain back some weight.
Eating so much is simply against my nature.
This is wrong, I will not stand for it anymore!
Eating against my whims is simply too much effort...
I need to get back to my studies.
The divine beckons me, enough with food.
I have risked to be poisoned more than enough times already...
I cannot waste time with this stupid diet!
Abandon your diet and accept the reality of your condition.

Whenever I walk through the streets of [Root.Capital.GetName], I can hear the sound of snickering behind my back. My tribesmen do not respect me, and who could blame them? I have grown so fat that even the most menial task makes me sweat and pant. How can I be the [Root.GetTitle] of anything in these conditions?

Whenever I am carried around [Root.Capital.GetName] on my litter, I receive no shortage of envious gazes from the starving tribeswomen working in the streets. They all envy my pampered lifestyle, but little do they of what it has cost me. I have grown so fat and bloated that even breathing is turning into a challenge for me.
どんな大きな鎧にも私の体は入らない。どんなに強い馬でも私を乗せることはできない。[Root.Capital.GetName]の鍛冶屋は私が座れるよう、大きく安定した玉座を作るために昼夜を問わず働いている。
ふくよかな体形であることは最初は楽しかったかもしれない、しかし今の私は宮廷すべての物笑いの種になっている。まともなドレスは私には合わず、[Root.Capital.GetName]にいるすべての子供が[From.GetTitle]の太すぎる太ももと、でっぷりしたお腹についての歌を歌うのだ。
もういい！私には運動が必要だ！
減量するために激しい運動を始めます。時間はかかりますが、厳しい食事制限よりは精神的な悪影響が少ないでしょう。
食事制限をしなければ！
減量のために食事制限を始めます。
だからどうした？私はこのままでいい。
§Y健康§!を犠牲にして暴食を続けます。

Whenever I walk through the streets of [Root.Capital.GetName], I can hear the sound of snickering behind my back. My tribesmen do not respect me, and who could blame them? I have grown so thin and pale that even the most menial task makes me cringe and faint. How can I be the [Root.GetTitle] of anything in these conditions?

Whenever I am carried around [Root.Capital.GetName] on my litter, I receive no shortage of envious gazes from the other tribeswomen. They all envy my pampered lifestyle, but little do they know of what it has cost me. I have grown so frail and sickly that I can barely stand without assistance.

I have come to the point where even loud noises upset me. I spend most of my days laying down, having my servants whisper the reports of the day and murmuring back my orders. My mind is still sound, but my body is growing too weak to sustain me.

There was a day when I would revel in the envious gazes of other ladies looking at my slim figure, but not anymore: I have grown so frail and sickly that I can barely take a walk without risking to faint. Bards swear that I am as diaphanous as an angel, but right now I think I might rather be just a regular woman.
Put yourself to work to gain back some weight. It might take longer, but it will be less traumatic than a hard diet.
Start dieting to gain some weight.
Continue wasting away at the expenses of your §YHealth§!.

I am a bit concerned by my [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName]. Eating so much as [From.GetSheHe] does might not be good for [From.GetHerHis] health. Just today I saw [From.GetHerHim] struggling simply to get on [From.GetHerHis] horse. The beast didn't look too well after the ride either...

I am a bit concerned by my [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName]. Eating so much as [From.GetSheHe] does might not be good for [From.GetHerHis] health. [From.GetSheHeCap] has started to grow a potbelly and [From.GetSheHe] does not look too far from gaining another chin.
[GetFromRelation]の[From.GetFirstName]が少し心配だ。食事はろくに摂らず、夜に起きていることが多いのは[From.GetHerHis]の健康に良くない。[From.GetSheHeCap]はいつも体調が悪そうで、アソコを保つ能力も乏しい。

I am a bit concerned by my [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName]. Eating so little and spending so many nights awake might not be good for [From.GetHerHis] health. [From.GetHerHisCap] voice has turned into a whisper and I am starting to see [From.GetHerHis] bones sticking out from [From.GetHerHis] body.
[From.GetHerHim]にもっと食べないよう伝えよう。
Tell §Y[From.GetFirstName]§! to stop eating so much.

Tell §Y[From.GetFirstName]§! to keep eating as much as [From.GetSheHe] likes.
[From.GetHerHim]にもっと食べるよう伝えよう。
§Y[From.GetFirstName]§!に過酷な減量を止めるよう伝える。
私があれこれ言うべき問題じゃないな。
私は単純に私の[GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName]が完璧な肉体を持ち、幸せな生活を送っている光景を見ることに耐えられない。[From.GetSheHe]がバランスの取れた食事と健康な体を保つことをどれほど気にかけているかを知った後、[From.GetHerHim]をほんの少しのささやきで台無しにできないかどうか考え始めた...
病気ですか、[From.GetFirstName]？ちょっと今日は膨れているように見えますが…
§Y[From.GetFirstName]§!が太っていることを仄めかす。
おお[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]、[From.GetFirstName]、骨格が目立ってきていますよ！
§Y[From.GetFirstName]§!が痩せすぎていることを仄めかす。
そんなちんけな事はしたくない。
今日[GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName]が訪れた。 [From.GetSheHeCap]は、私の食習慣が以前よりますます心配になったと言った。 [From.GetSheHeCap]は、ここ数カ月の間に私の体重がかなり増えたと思っていて、健康が悪化するのを恐れている。
Pah! Nonsense! I don't believe you!
Tell §Y[From.GetFirstName]§! that [From.GetSheHe] whatever trick [From.GetSheHe] is planning will not work on you.
少し*食べ過ぎ*たのかもしれない…
§Y[From.GetFirstName]§!の忠告を聞き入れて食べる量を減らします
黙れ！お前には関係ない！
今日[GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName]が訪れた。どうやら、[From.GetSheHe]は私の健康を心配していて、私は虚弱すぎてやせすぎていると思っています。 [From.GetSheHe]は、このまま少ししか食べないならば、私はもうすぐ刀を振るうことも、女性を喜ばせることも、あるいはただ馬に乗ることさえできなくなるでしょうと言っている。
今日[GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName]が訪れた。どうやら、[From.GetSheHe]は、私が現在の食事で喜んで自分自身を飢え死にさせているのではないかと心配してたようだ。 女性の曲線美は悪いものじゃないと言って、[From.GetSheHe]は私を安心させた。
Pah! Nonsense! I don't believe you!
Tell §Y[From.GetFirstName]§! that [From.GetSheHe] whatever trick [From.GetSheHe] is planning will not work on you.
もう少し食べたほうがいいのかもしれない…
§Y[From.GetFirstName]§!の忠告を聞き入れて、食べる量を増やします
黙れ！お前には関係ない！
[GetFromRelation]は私の助言を聞き入れ、やっと沢山食べるようになった。すっかり元の姿に戻った[From.GetSheHeCap]は、逞しく健康的な、理想の体になった。
[GetFromRelation]は私の助言を聞き入れ、やっと沢山食べるようになった。[From.GetSheHeCap]はすっかり元の姿に戻った。実際、彼女は素晴らしいことに肉も付き始めている。
まったく信じられない！まぬけな[From.GetFirstName]は私のちょっとした嘘を信じ込み、すぐに食べ物を喉に詰めこみ始めた。このいたずらがどんな結果をもたらすのか楽しみだ...
[GetFromRelation]は私の助言を聞き入れ、やっと食べる量を減らした。すっかり元の姿に戻った[From.GetSheHeCap]は、痩せて身軽で健康的な、理想の体になった。
[GetFromRelation]は私の助言を聞き入れ、やっと食べる量を減らした。すっかり元の姿に戻った[From.GetSheHeCap]は、ほっそりとしてより上品になり、淑女に相応しい進歩を遂げた。
まったく信じられない！まぬけな[From.GetFirstName]は私のちょっとした嘘を信じ込んだ。太りすぎているとうろたえだして、自分から飢餓に突き進んでいったのだ。このいたずらがどんな結果をもたらすのか楽しみだ...
[FromFrom.GetFirstName]は正しかった。 新しい食事療法により、私はずっと強くて健康的に感じる。 私はつい最近まで、少し腹がたるんでいたことを恥ずかしく思う。

[FromFrom.GetFirstName] was right. I am quite enjoying my new voluptuous curves. Thinking back to the silly girl I was, starving myself to the brink of death just to look as skinny as a boy makes me chuckle.
[FromFrom.GetFirstName]の忠告は、私が元の体形に戻るために必要な動機となった。最初は普段とは違う食生活に戸惑っていたが、今ではずっと体調が良くなり、この世のどんな試練にも挑めそうな気がする。
[FromFrom.GetFirstName]の忠告は、私が元の体形に戻るために必要な動機となった。最初は普段とは違う食生活に戸惑っていたが、美しく健康的な女性に生まれ変わった気がする。
以前の服は捨ててしまおう。
[FromFrom.GetFirstName]が最初に私の体重について警告してからというもの、体重の問題について執着してきた。私は以前よりも細身だとは思うが、それで十分なのだろうか？鏡を見るたびに、太った豚しか見えない。
[FromFrom.GetFirstName]の忠告は、私が元の体形に戻るために必要な動機となった。私は自分の人生の残りの部分を自分の状態に気づいていない太った至福の豚として過ごすことにどれほど近かったか信じられない。
[FromFrom.GetFirstName]の忠告は、私が元の体形に戻るために必要な動機となった。私は自分の人生の残りの部分を自分の状態に気づいていない太った至福の牝牛として過ごすことにどれほど近づいていたか信じられない。
うっ、とてもお腹が空いた…

I was shocked to hear [From.GetFirstName]'s response to my warnings: apparently [From.GetSheHe] thinks that I am not truly concerned about [From.GetHerHis] health, and that this is all a plot of some sort to lower [From.GetHerHis] self-esteem.

I am not sure if [From.GetSheHe] realized I was lying or if it was just one [From.GetHerHis] paranoid streaks, but [From.GetFirstName] was not swayed by my words: in fact, [From.GetSheHe] openly claimed that I was trying to manipulate [From.GetHerHim].

My advice fell on deaf ears: my [GetFromRelation] does not wishes to change [From.GetHerHis] frugal diet, even after I warned [From.GetHerHim] of the risks [From.GetSheHe] is exposing [From.GetHerselfHimself] to because [From.GetHerHis] stubbornness.
[GetFromRelation]に食事の量を減らさせようとする試みは無駄に終わったようだ。

My advice fell on deaf ears: my [GetFromRelation] does not wishes to put [From.GetHerselfHimself] on a stricter diet, even after I warned [From.GetHerHim] of the risks [From.GetSheHe] is exposing [From.GetHerselfHimself] to because of [From.GetHerHis] gluttony.
[GetFromRelation]により多く食べさせようとする試みは無駄に終わったようだ。
This character has become so fat that [Root.GetSheHe] can no longer perform normal activities without assistance.
This character has grown so thin and sickly that [Root.GetSheHe] can no longer perform normal activities without assistance.

All these years spent indulging my gluttony have finally caught up with me: my body has grown so bloated and flabby that I can no longer stand without help. I spend my days laying on my bed, looking at the line of servants going back and forth from the kitchen, carrying more delicacies to fill my insatiable appetite.

All these years spent starving myself have finally caught up with me: my stomach has closed almost entirely, so much so that I need servants slowly feeding me small spoonfuls of soup in order to eat anything. I have become too weak to stand without help, and the even mere act of thinking has become a laborious task for me.
この人物は大食漢であるため食べ過ぎで体調を崩したりしにくいです
この人物にはストレスのはけ口があります。
この人物には鬱を軽減するためのはけ口があります。
This character is well-known for [Root.GetHerHis] grandiose feasts and welcoming attitude.
この女性は、明るく熱心な態度で母親の義務を果たします。
この男性は、明るく熱心な態度で父親の義務を果たします。
This character truly embodies the purest principles of moderation.

料理人の給仕を徹底的にぶちのめして、部屋から叩き出した。指についた脂を舐め取って椅子に座ると軋む音で目が引きつる。こんな沢山の馬鹿と太鼓持ちに囲まれていなかったらこんなに食べ過ぎることもなかったものを…！
悶々として髪をかきむしりながらローストビーフにかじりつき、ガツガツと飲み込んだ。深呼吸して気持ちを落ち着かせようとしたが、だんだん大きくなる腹が服で圧迫されただけだった。食べれば食べるほどに、怒りが湧いてくる。怒りが湧くほどに、もっと食べたくなってしまう。
目が回る。何かが横で転がり、床に落ちてガチャンと音がした。これは…もう10本も飲んだのか？「ほら持ち上げろ！」屈強な若者の一団に指示する。若者達はひいこら言いながらなんとか自分を寝室まで運んだ。その苦労を見て、ビールの飲みすぎで自分が如何に太ってしまったか気付いた。ようやく酔いが冷めたのだ。
大きくあくびをした後瞬きをし、目が回るのが収まるのを待った。昨晩飲んだ自分を召使いが寝台まで運んでくれたに違いない。ふと下を向くと、ビール太りした腹が目に入ってつい笑ってしまった。この豪快な生き方は自分の健康にはあまり良くないに違いない…

食べかけの鶏肉をハンカチに吐き出すとうんざりして皿を下げさせた。もう人肉以外のものを食べるのは耐え難い。下等動物の肉で体を満たすなどまっぴら御免だ。だが、残念ながらそれはつまりほとんどの日は何も食べるものがないということだ。
小さな白い肉をナイフに乗せ、右左に返して注意深く確認してから皿へと戻した。自分の知る限り、腐ったり不潔な食べ物を食べて死んだ人はたくさんいる。病気せずに長生きしたいなら食に関しては量より質を取らなければならないのだ。
下等な食物を以て自らを貶めることはできない。
常に注意深くあらねばならないのだ。
Why deny it? I only crave for human flesh.
I must stop this diet immediately.

I place my fists on my side and smirk at my reflection. I am looking quite impressive as of late. A strong and powerful [Root.GetTitle] such as myself should look the part. I am the biggest man in [Root.Capital.GetName] and I wouldn't want to have it any other way.

I give myself another look at the mirror, brushing my hands over my dress to follow the curves of my beautiful, rippling body. I dare anybody to mistake me again for one of those insipid, skinny peasant girls working around town. This truly is the look of a [Root.GetTitle]: imposing and majestic.
I couldn't agree more with myself!
ひとつ深呼吸して、使用人の試みを待つ。そして、愛馬へと私の身体を押し上げようと試みること、三度。わずかばかりの苦闘の末、5名の少年は哀れな獣へとなんとか私を据え付けて、ついに出発の準備が整った。私のこの持て余した体重は時折トラブルの種になったかもしれない。が、忍耐の美徳をしっかりと私に教えてくれた。
息を止めること三度、二人の気の毒なメイドはドレスの紐をひっぱりお肉を押し込んだ。彼女らにねぎらいの言葉を軽く掛けてやると、反対側が引き裂けた。私のこの持て余した体重は時折トラブルの種になったかもしれない。が、忍耐の美徳をしっかりと私に教えてくれた。

I let out an satisfied mumble and sit back, rubbing my distended stomach and closing my eyes as I slowly fall asleep, ready to dream about my next meal. It is a simple routine I have fallen into since some time, but one that I quite enjoy.

So often rulers such as myself have fallen prey to temptation, surrounded themselves with the excesses granted by our station and subsequently forgot their duties. My deprivations, on the other hand, have allowed me to remain in touch with the struggles of even the poorest of my subjects.
I must never forget this feeling.
Every day I look around I hear young men riding by my window, laughing and teasing each other, while my frail constitution forces me to remain confined to my rooms. I hate them all.
今朝、窓の側で本を読んでいると、コックの娘が中庭で座っているのが目に留まった。その愚かな田舎娘はまるでガチョウのように幸せそうにご飯を食べていた。一方、今の私の顎には小さくて柔らかい食べ物しか食べられないほどの力しか残っていなかった。

They think themselves so clever, the little rats. They all think they can poison my food, stalk in my bedroom at night and that I won't see them. They all think their pitiful pleas for mercy will save them. But they are wrong.

I cannot believe how many envious, malignant people are spreading rumors around me. But enough is enough. Since I am way too bored to whip them myself, I have decided to send all these nuisances directly to the dungeons whenever they start talking about my supposedly poor health.

After so many days spent waiting for a worthy enough target, I jumped on the ambassador like a feral beast. I struggled to overcome him, my body was too weak after my self-imposed deprivation. Even worse, his meat lost all its flavor after only a few bites. Perhaps suffering is a necessary condiment...

彼女が楽しいと思うことを優先しよう。
この時間全てを無駄にするのは止めにしよう。

Spending all these hours laying awake in the dark was almost unbearable at first, but, after I ordering a bard to sing me stories from outside the bedroom, the experience has completely changed. Now I am a lot more relaxed.
And I am learning a lot too...
初めは[From.GetFirstName]は暗い部屋で十分に休むのに苦労していたが、吟遊詩人に外から物語を語らせるという素晴らしい考えを私が思い付いてからは、その経験もだいぶ耐えられるものになったようだ。
彼女は多くのことを学ぶんでいることだろう。

I can barely keep track of time, spending hours upon hours in the dark while the sun shines outside, then being unable to sleep when night finally comes. I was just bored at first, but now I am starting to be scared as well. After my prolonged seclusion, my mind is starting to conjure shadows and whispers.
暗闇での休息は将来の子供の健康には良いかもしれないが、妻の精神の安定には明らかに有害だ。彼女は前より夜に眠りにつきづらくなったと感じていて、神経質になってしまいその状況に対応することができなくなった。
I was dubious at first, but spending these long hours in quiet, dark meditation has helped me find peace. I am a lot less worried about my child than I was only a few weeks ago.
暗いところで休んだことは妻を落ち着け頭をすっきりさせることに本当に役立った。彼女の体調は良くなって丈夫な子を産む準備が整ったように見えるし、ただそれだけを望む。
何もかもこのシンプルな療法のおかげだ…
I might not be able to accomplish much while wasting all this time chatting, but at least I think I am becoming better at talking in general...
妻は、廷臣や召使との会話を止めることが全くできないようだ。なにはともあれ、この彼女の新しい習慣は彼女の会話をより快適で熟練したものにした…
たまには静かに過ごせたら…

Being always so distracted might have prevented me from doing much work, but all this talking with my vassals and servants has had the unforeseen advantage of strengthening my relation with many of the people in my court.
常に会話に気を取られていたため、妻は良好な休息を取れなかったかもしれないが、封臣や使用人との会話によって宮廷の多くの人々との関係を強めるという予期せぬ利点をもたらしました。
My husband [scoped_spouse.GetFirstName] has been so patient with me, carefully listening to all the rambling I have been doing in these last weeks... I have never felt so close to him before.
I think I am in love!

My wife has spent as much time with me as possible in the past week, constantly talking about the strangest subjects. I was worried at first, but now I am starting to enjoy our long conversations in a way I did not thought possible...
Am I falling in love with her?
It is but a passing fancy.
我が妻 [From.GetFirstName] が妊娠する中、今年の収穫祭を特別な何かとして執り行うべきか否かに頭を悩ますこととなった。 [Root.GetFertilityGoddess] の喜びは、健康な子どもの誕生への助けとなるかもしれない。
[From.GetFirstName]のため、完全無欠の収穫祭を挙行するのだ！
[Root.GetFertilityGoddess]へと、妻の名のもと、多めに供物を捧げるのだ。
古臭い迷信に使う金などない…

I was relieved to hear that [From.GetFirstName] decided to make a huge sacrifice during the seasonal festivity made to honor [Root.GetFertilityGoddess] this year, hoping it would help me deliver a strong child with little complications.
I am sure the goddess will protect me!
[From.GetFirstName]は私達の子供と私の両方が神々の寵愛を受けられるように努力を惜しまない。個人的に今年の収穫祭を企画してくれたし、その際に私に[Root.GetFertilityGoddess]自身を演じさせてくれた。
この栄誉はとてもありがたい。
赤ん坊を農民の女の腕の中に戻し、彼女が祝福に感謝して次の請願者のためにスペースを空けるのに、温かい微笑みを与える。[Root.GetFertilityGoddess]を代表して行動することで、この短い時間の間に、自分がどのようにしたらより良い[Root.GetTitle]になれるのかを本当に理解することができた。
家臣ともっとよく話をしよう。
子にとっての母のように、臣下にとっての私であろう。
もっと模範的な教徒でなければならない
神具を身にまとい、私を通して[Root.GetFertilityGoddess]の祝福を受けに来た請願者たちの希望と畏敬の念に満ちた顔を見る... 私は神の祝福を感じなければ、重大な責務を負うことになるだろう。
彼女の子孫になれるだろうか？
No mother was ever as honored as I am.
この祭りは単なる偶然ではなかった。私は[Root.Capital.GetName]からの請願者の群衆に祝福を与えている間、女神の力が私の血脈を流れているのを感じる。私は本当に[Root.GetFertilityGoddess]の子孫に違いない。
[Root.GetFertilityGoddess]に代わって、町中を担ぎ回されて加護を与えるのは、思ったほどのんびりとしたものではないし、満足感もないが、今年のお祭りは人々に喜ばれている。彼らはいつも私が微笑みかけ、子供たちを抱きかかえるのを見て興奮している。
単純な魂は簡単に感動するものよ...
[Root.Capital.GetName]の通りで私の駕籠が移動されるとき、別の高貴な客人が私に頭を下げ、祝いの気持ちを伝えてくれた。これほどの家臣が[Root.GetFertilityGoddess]の敬虔な信者だとは気づかなかった。祝福中の女神の演者に選ばれたことは、私を多くの人々に愛させた。
[Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName]の敬虔な§Y封臣§!全員からの評価が上昇
今年の収穫祭では、[From.GetTitledFirstName]が[From.GetFertilityGoddess]の代表に選ばれた。[From.GetTitle]は、母なる愛をすべての臣下に分け与え、彼女の祝福によって土地と家畜の繁栄を保証してくれた。
なんて敬虔な女性なんだ！
収穫祭の間に[Root.GetFertilityGoddess]を演じるのは、とても楽しい体験だ。私の[Root.GetHouse]には大勢の請願者が私の祝福を受けに来ている。彼らは皆、私に感謝の言葉を浴びせ、その多くは女神にささやかなお供え物としてお菓子やリンゴ酒を持ってきてくれた。
食べるのを拒否するのは冒涜だ！
この恵みのおかげで喉がしゃがれてきた...
[Root.GetFertilityGoddess]の神器を身にまとい、祝福を行う私は疑問に思う。彼女が生命と豊穣の女神であるならば、どうして彼女は高潔な存在とされるのか？ふるまいよりも、世界に生命をもたらす原動力の方が重要なのだろうか。
美徳が優先されるのは間違いない。
彼女が我ら全員の欲望を刺激したので、私たちは生命を創造することがでたのだ。
祭りのために[Root.GetFertilityGoddess]の役を引き受けた妻はわくわくしていた。いつも明るくて笑顔が絶えない彼女は、世間からの人気者だ。これを機に、強い子宝を授かることができるように、また、女神の祝福が私の土地にも広がっていくことを願っている。
私の妻ほど今年の祭りにふさわしい選択はない。彼女は[Root.GetFertilityGoddess]自身と同じように、私の臣民に祝福を与える時には優しくて思いやりがある。彼女の行動が、彼女が強い子を産むのを助けると同時に、女神の祝福が私の土地全体にうまく広がることを願っている。
今年の感謝祭において、我が妻以上にふさわしい選択なぞありえなかった。謙虚と敬虔の化身であった。強き子が生まれ、女神の息吹が我が土地に満ちる。彼女の振る舞いがそんな果報を招いてくれればいいのだが。
妻は、祭りの期間中に[Root.GetFertilityGoddess]としての役割を本当に良く果たした。 彼女はどんな女神にも劣らず横柄に振る舞った。 彼女の行動は少し場違いかもしれないが、少なくとも彼女は楽しんでおり、儀式を適切に管理している。
妻は、祭りの期間中に[Root.GetFertilityGoddess]としての役割を本当に良く果たした。 彼女はどんな女神にも劣らず横柄に振る舞った。私はただ、これらの特別な振る舞いが彼女のエゴを膨らませ、彼女が不注意にも[Root.GetFertilityGoddess]自身を怒らせないことを願っている...
妻は、祭りの期間中に[Root.GetFertilityGoddess]としての役割を本当に良く果たした。 彼女はどんな女神にも劣らず横柄に振る舞った。 彼女は確かに祝福を与えることに喜びを感じているが、彼女の態度はいつも冷静で洗練されている。彼女の行動が私たちの家に威信をもたらし、[Root.GetFertilityGoddess]の恩恵をもたらすと確信している。

My wife could have not been a more appropriate choice for this year's festival. She is the spitting image of [Root.GetFertilityGoddess], and all the peasants love her. If nothing else, this ceremony has certainly helped improve the spirit of [Root.Capital.GetName]'s population.

My wife could have not been a more appropriate choice for this year's festival. She is the spitting image of [Root.GetFertilityGoddess], and many of my vassals have taken a liking to her collected and pious conduct during the course of the ceremony. I have received quite a few compliments for choosing such a wise woman to be my wife.

My wife is certainly having her fun taking on the role of [Root.GetFertilityGoddess]. Everybody seems to like her, and she has wasted no time hoarding all the food offerings made to the goddess for herself.

My wife is certainly having her fun taking on the role of [Root.GetFertilityGoddess]. Everybody seems to like her, though I am worrying a bit about how frequently she is accepting cider from her petitioners.

My wife could have not been a more appropriate choice for this year's festival. She is a model of modesty and pious conduct. Hopefully her actions will both help her deliver a strong child as well as spread the goddess' blessing across my land.
私の妻は、ちょっと文字どおり豊穣の女神の役割を果たしすぎたのかもしれない。彼女は間違いなく祝典を楽しみ農民からも貴族からも賛辞を受けてきたが、その一方で彼女の取り巻きの中で最も可憐な請願者たちに、うさんくさい内密の謁見を許可したという不穏な噂も耳にした。
これが彼女の出産に役立つと確信している。
[Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName]の敬虔な§Y封臣§!全員からの評価が上昇

[From.GetFirstName] grows more beautiful every day. I had my doubts at first, but now I cannot deny it any longer: the child is surely blessed. When I played [Root.GetFertilityGoddess] while I was carrying her, the goddess must have touched her and gifted her with her beauty and purity.
[From.GetFirstName] は日に日に美しくなっていく。最初は疑っていたが、今やもう否定はできない、この子は間違いなく祝福を受けている。妻が[Root.GetFertilityGoddess] を祭りで演じた時、女神は彼女の中の子供に触れ、その美しさと愛嬌を授けてくれたに違いない。
最初は気づかなかったが、今では疑いようもない：[GetFromRelation][From.GetFirstName]は左利きだ。それが常になる前にこの癖を修正したほうがいいかもしれない。

It was hard to notice at first, but now there can be no doubts about it: my [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] is left-handed. This sort of deviancy should not be allowed to take root, lest it encourages more ungodly behaviors later in [From.GetHerHis] life.

It wasn't hard to realize that my [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] is left-handed like me. I am wondering now whether it wouldn't be better if I corrected this behavior in the child before it becomes permanent...
The left hand is of the Devil!
Teach to §Y[From.GetFirstName]§! about what the scriptures say about [From.GetHerHis] unholy behavior.
右手を使ったほうがはるかに実用的だぞ。
§Y[From.GetFirstName]§!に左利きの戦術的制限について教えよう......
子供はこのままでいい。

My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] is furious with me for some reason. [From.GetSheHeCap] says that I should always use my right hand whenever I do something, or [From.Religion.GetHighGodName] will be mad at me.
My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] told me that I should try to always use my right hand instead of the left. [From.GetSheHeCap] says that it will help me in many ways when I am older.
Alright, [GetFromRelation]. I will do like you say.
No! I like using the left hand!

[From.GetFirstName], that devious little brat, has fooled me into believing [From.GetSheHe] had stopped using [From.GetHerHis] right hand. Only this morning I overheard [From.GetHerHim] flaunting [From.GetHerHis] trickery with [From.GetHerHis] playmates!
誠実な[From.GetBoyGirl][From.GetFirstName]は私の指示に従うことを決めて、[From.GetHerselfHimself]を右利きに矯正した。
The gall on [From.GetFirstName]! [From.GetSheHeCap] outright refused to listen to me, and insists on using [From.GetHerHis] left hand for everything [From.GetSheHe] does!
You give birth prematurely before bleeding to §RDeath§!.

After much struggling, my wife bled out, giving birth to a fragile, sickly child. All the suffering that we went through has produced only a pale, skeletal creature that might not even survive the night.

My poor, sweet [From.GetFirstName] is dead. She resisted for as long as she could, but she was unable to survive her labor. She sacrificed herself so that a little, pale fiend could come out of her womb, so sickly and skeletal that the midwives are scared to hold it.
I will protect this child, for her sake.
The little monster stole her from me!
I have always lived a sheltered life because of my sickly disposition. Other children are scared of how I look, and many of the grown-ups are mad at me for killing my mother by being born.
誰も理解してくれない！

Throughout my entire life, I have always been shadowed by death, yet I am still here. Despite my weak disposition and frail bones, I have endured past my childhood years. I cannot tell if this is a blessing or a curse...
I want to learn why I am like this.
Now the world will suffer as I did.

I have survived my mother's death and the scorn of everybody around me. Many thought that I would die of illness long before now, but they were all wrong. Time and again I have escaped death, to the point that I now find myself no longer fearing its cold embrace.
I have always been too weak for any sort of manual labor, but being able to focus on my mind since my earlier years has allowed me to learn a lot more than most kids do by my age.

It is time for the adults to start fear me as well as other kids have always done. Under my quiet and frail demeanor I have ironed I ruthless mind, and now I have finally the power and maturity to put it to use for my own benefit.

My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] has always been a frail and quiet kid. Yet, the more [From.GetSheHe] grows, the more brazen [From.GetHerHis] behavior becomes. It seems like being constantly on the brink of death due to [From.GetHerHis] weak disposition has stripped away all of [From.GetHerHis] natural fears...

My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] has always been a frail and quiet kid. [From.GetHerHisCap] body is not meant for manual labor, and is voice barely goes beyond a whisper, but [From.GetHerHis] mind is a boiling cauldron of ideas, restlessly working to explore the darkest subjects.

My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] has always been a frail and quiet kid. Unfortunately, it has long become apparent to me that beyond [From.GetHerHis] silence and [From.GetHerHis] scrawny body lays a vicious and ruthless spirit.
This character was born under ominous circumstances. Always sickly during [Root.GetHerHis] childhood, [Root.GetSheHe] has long since grown out of most fears plaguing common men.
This character was born under ominous circumstances. Always sickly during [Root.GetHerHis] childhood, [Root.GetSheHe] has always eschewed manual labor in favor of literary study.
This character was born under ominous circumstances. Always excluded and avoided by everyone during [Root.GetHerHis] childhood, has grown into a heartless and conceited [Root.GetManWoman].
このキャラクターはすぐには忘れられないような壮大な儀式の期間中に、教皇自身の手によって大変仰々しく華やかに洗礼を受けました。
このキャラクターはすぐには忘れられないような壮大な儀式の期間中に、[Root.Religion.GetName]の総主教自身の手によって大変仰々しく華やかに洗礼を受けました。
このキャラクターは高名な司教[Root.Religion.GetName]から洗礼を受け、その輝かしい生い立ちと自身の一族と教会との良好な関係をはっきりと示しました。
This child was baptized in the blood of the innocent during a grotesque satanic ritual that bound [Root.GetHerHim] forever to the Prince of Darkness.

While I have yet to cleanse myself from impurities after labor, [From.GetFirstName] should be baptized as soon as possible. Given that [From.GetSheHe] is the heir of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName], I should make sure that the rite celebrating [From.GetHerHis] coming into this world is as grandiose as possible.
[From.GetFirstName]はできるだけ早く洗礼を受けるべきです。そうすれば天国での[From.GetHerHis]の場所は保証されるでしょう。 [From.GetSheHe]が[Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName]の跡継ぎであることを考えると、この世界に入ってくる[From.GetHerHis]を祝う儀式はできるだけ壮大になるようにしなければなりません。
[From.GetSheHeCap]は「非常に」特別な洗礼を受けるだろう…
洗礼に相応しいのは教皇だけだ！
Only the Patriarch is fit to baptize [From.GetHerHim]!
§Y[From.GetFirstName]§!の洗礼を[Root.Religion.GetName]教会の長によって執り行う。
最も高名な聖職者が[From.GetHerHim]を祝福します。
§Y[From.GetFirstName]§!の洗礼を領内で最も有力な[Root.Religion.GetName]教会の代表者によって執り行う。
洗礼は通常通り行われる。
§Y[From.GetFirstName]§!は他の子供たちと同様の洗礼を受ける。

Before I proceed with the initiation rites, I should select a godparent from the ranks of our Order to lead and protect [FromFrom.GetFirstName] as [FromFrom.GetSheHe] walks on the dark path I prepared for [FromFrom.GetHerHim].
[FromFrom.GetFirstName]のために壮大な洗礼の儀式を準備しているというニュースが広まった後、数人の家臣が子供の代父母として選んでほしいと要求してきた。

[From.GetTitledFirstName] will initiate little [FromFromFrom.GetFirstName] to the dark rites from the cradle. I was offered the honor to accompany the child on [FromFromFrom.GetHerHis] dark path as [FromFromFrom.GetHerHis] god[Root.GetFatherMother].
[From.GetTitledFirstName] は、 [From.GetHerHis] の [FromFromFrom.GetSonDaughter] の洗礼に伴い、盛大な式典を開催することに決め、[From.GetSheHe] は、私にその子供の代[Root.GetFatherMother]となる名誉を与えることにした。
秘密の会合に集まったフードの崇拝者達は子供を取り囲み、おぞましい詩を詠唱する。他の純真無垢な犠牲者達は[baptizing_child.GetHerHim]の上に血を流し、小さな[baptizing_child.GetFirstName]は闇と血の中で洗礼を受け、永遠にルシファーに束縛される。
[scoped_pope.GetTitledFirstName]は多くの枢機卿に囲まれながら、子供を三回洗い清め、その魂を守るために祈りの言葉を唱えた。そして[scoped_pope.GetSheHe]は[baptizing_child.GetFirstName]を少し掲げて大聖堂に集まった群衆に見えるようにし、将来家臣となる者たちの歓声を一身に浴びせた。
[scoped_pope.GetTitledFirstName]は子供を三回洗い清め、その魂を守るために祈りの言葉を唱えた。そして[scoped_pope.GetSheHe]は小さな[baptizing_child.GetFirstName]を、教会に集まった群衆に見えるよう高く掲げた。
なんと素晴らしい光景か！
秘密の会合に集まったフードの崇拝者達は私を取り囲み、おぞましい詩を詠唱する。他の純真無垢な犠牲者達は私の上に血を流し、私は闇と血の中で洗礼を受けて、永遠にルシファーに束縛される。

[scoped_pope.GetTitledFirstName] washes me three times over, reciting a prayer to protect my soul, surrounded by a host of cardinals. Then [scoped_pope.GetSheHe] raises me up for all the crowd gathered in the great cathedral to see, exposing me to the cheers of all of my future subjects.
[scoped_bishop.GetTitledFirstName] washes me three times over, reciting a prayer to protect my soul, then [scoped_bishop.GetSheHe] raises me up for all the crowd gathered in the church to see.
The time has come to make [From.GetFirstName] aware of the illustrious future that the Light-bringer has in store for [From.GetHerHim]. I will introduce [From.GetHerHim] to the brotherhood tonight.

Tonight, [From.GetFirstName] woke me in the middle of my sleeping hours to drag me in a weird and secret place. [From.GetSheHeCap] introduced me to a group of strange, hooded people. They were all happy to see me, and told me that they expect great things from me in the future.
特性 '§Yサタニストによる戴冠§!'を得ます。
特性 '§Y教皇による戴冠§!'を得ます。
特性 '§Y大司教による戴冠§!'を得ます。
§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!はあなたへの謁見を許可されます

The way [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] knelt down and offered me [FromFrom.GetHerHis] loyalty one would easily forget that [FromFrom.GetSheHe] doesn't even believe in [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] as I do. Still, it was a respectful gesture for an unbeliever such as [FromFrom.GetHerHim] to come pay me homage in the [Root.Religion.GetName] way.
The child kneels down, reciting mechanically [FromFrom.GetHerHis] oath of vassalage. I had no idea [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] was such a young [FromFrom.GetBoyGirl]...

[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] slowly kneels down with the help of one of [FromFrom.GetHerHis] servants. The old man recites [FromFrom.GetHerHis] oath of vassalage with a faint voice, stopping a few times to remember some of the words.

[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] gives me a charming smile as [FromFrom.GetSheHe] bows down to give me [FromFrom.GetHerHis] oath of vassalage. I am so distracted by [FromFrom.GetHerHis] chiseled features, that it takes me some time to realize that it is already my turn to speak.

[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] gives me a charming smile as [FromFrom.GetSheHe] bows down to give me [FromFrom.GetHerHis] oath of vassalage, giving me a good view on [FromFrom.GetHerHis] cleavage. I am so distracted by [FromFrom.GetHerHis] alluring features, that it takes me some time to realize that it is already my turn to speak.
臣下の誓いを唱えている短い時間でさえ、[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]の姿を目に入れることは耐えがたいものだ。私が嫌な思いでその[FromFrom.GetManWoman]を見てから、しばらくの時が経った…

[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] bows [FromFrom.GetHerHis] head courteously as [FromFrom.GetSheHe] kneels down and recites [FromFrom.GetHerHis] oath of vassalage, surrounded by a crowd of curious courtiers. It is so rare to see a [FromFrom.GetManWoman] like [FromFrom.GetHerHim] rise to the rank of [FromFrom.GetTitle]...

[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] kneels down and recites the words of [FromFrom.GetHerHis] oath of vassalage, yet [FromFrom.GetHerHis] homage gives me no comfort: [FromFrom.GetHerHis] voice is detached, [FromFrom.GetHerHis] gaze cold and rapacious... This ruler's constant use of bloodletting to maintain [Root.GetHerHis] health and balance [Root.GetHerHis] humors has sucked all passion from [Root.GetHerHis] body and turned [Root.GetHerHim] into a cold, calculating loner.

This ruler has grown accustomed to talking through [Root.GetHerHis] servants and avoiding the spotlight as much as possible, using [Root.GetHerHis] frail nature to manipulate the people around [Root.GetHerHim].
Irreverent rumors have besmirched this ruler's name, slightly reducing [Root.GetHerHis] legitimacy in the eyes of [Root.GetHerHis] peers and subjects.

This ruler has a reputation for punishing [Root.GetHerHis] detractors in the most heinous ways, so much so that many of [Root.GetHerHis] subjects have started to treat [Root.GetHerHim] better just to be safe from [Root.GetHerHis] hire.

Studying my liege's frail condition has brought me to believe that [From.GetHerHis] lack of appetite and sleep may be caused by a severe unbalance of [From.GetHerHis] humors. Operating periodic leeching sessions on [From.GetHerHim] might be what [From.GetSheHe] needs in order to get back in shape.
私が間違っていたのか…
My Physician has informed me that periodic leeching might be what I need to restore my appetite and facilitate my sleep at night. Perhaps I should try this treatment...
I am not submitting myself to this!

[From.GetTitledFirstName] was thrilled to test my treatment. We immediately operated the first of many bloodlettings to come, and I am hopeful that, through this process, my liege will soon find [From.GetHerHis] balance once more.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] was not interested in my proposal. I can do nothing else to help [From.GetHerHim] now.

All this bloodletting might not have helped me get back in strength, but it is undoubtedly affecting my humoral balance. While I see some things more clearly, I feel like I am growing colder and more detached towards the world around me.
[FromFrom.GetFirstName] has failed me for the last time.
A rational mind is all I need.

The guards drag me to the feet of [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s bed. My liege coldly explains to me in a whisper that, while [From.GetSheHe] feels that the bloodlettings helped [From.GetHerHim] gain a new perspective on the nature of life, [From.GetSheHe] doubts that my intentions for starting the treatment were as pure as I claimed.

Whatever [From.GetFirstName]'s plans were, [From.GetSheHe] will no longer be able to enact them. Yet, I have found that I do not wish to interrupt [From.GetHerHis] treatment. The clarity of mind and purity of intent given to me thanks to these bloodlettings have made me a much more effective [Root.GetTitle].

While [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s appetite is yet to return, the leeching seems to have stabilized [From.GetHerHis] condition. Some malicious courtiers have spread the rumor that the constant bloodletting is sucking away all humanity from my patient, but I doubt any of it is true.
迷信以外の何ものでもない！

I look at the tumid leeches over my arm, feeling the bad blood being sucked out of me. My body may be weak, but I have never achieved such clarity of mind before. So many of the worries and attachments that bothered me in the past have now become inconsequential, and I am free to act however necessary to achieve my goals.
No longer I am a slave to passion.

[From.GetTitledFirstName] is such a frail and gentle creature. Even the simplest actions are hard for her to perform. The more I see [From.GetHerHim], the more I am convinced that it is my duty as [From.GetHerHis] vassal to protect [From.GetHerHim] from harm.

It has occurred to me since some time that [From.GetTitledFirstName] has started treating me with a peculiar care compared to my other vassals. Just today [From.GetSheHe] decided to openly state that [From.GetSheHe] feels duty-bound to protect me from any harm that may come to me.
I shouldn't take advantage of [From.GetHerHis] good intentions.

[From.GetTitledFirstName] was touched by my concern, but [From.GetSheHe] decided to politely decline my offer of assistance, assuring me that [From.GetSheHe] is perfectly capable of handling [From.GetHerselfHimself] and that it would be immodest for me to be so close to [From.GetHerHim].

My spouse [FromFrom.GetFirstName] spends too much time with [From.GetTitledFirstName]. [FromFrom.GetSheHeCap] has developed an unhealthy relationship with that [From.GetManWoman], listening to [From.GetHerHis] every command. [From.GetSheHeCap] is clearly taking advantage of [FromFrom.GetHerHis] good nature.
Demand that §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! distance herself from your husband.

[From.GetTitledFirstName] has caught wind of [From.GetHerHis] spouse's obsession with me and demanded that I relinquish [FromFromFrom.GetHerHim] from the unhealthy hold I am keeping [FromFromFrom.GetHerHim] under. Unfortunately, I have grown rather accustomed to [FromFromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] doing everything for me...

The unthinkable has happened. My wife, growing jealous of the preferential treatment I was giving to my liege, has openly demanded [From.GetTitledFirstName] to distance [From.GetHerselfHimself] from me. [From.GetFirstName] ordered me to kill [FromFrom.GetFirstName] to prove my loyalty to [From.GetHerHim].
Only as [From.GetFirstName]'s blade sinks into my stomach I finally realize how deep my husband obsession was running...

The unthinkable has happened. My wife, growing jealous of the preferential treatment I was giving to my liege, has openly demanded [From.GetTitledFirstName] to distance [From.GetHerselfHimself] from me. [From.GetFirstName] ordered me to repudiate [FromFrom.GetFirstName] to prove my loyalty to [From.GetHerHim].
I cannot believe it! My husband decided to turn against me for [FromFrom.GetFirstName]'s sake! [From.GetSheHeCap] refuses to sleep or even talk to me anymore.
What has that witch done to him?

[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] has stopped speaking with [FromFrom.GetHerHis] wife, just like I ordered. I never realized I could exploit my weakened condition to manipulate people to such an extent...
I should do this more often.
[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] has permanently silenced [FromFrom.GetHerHis] wife, just like I ordered. I never realized I could exploit my weakened condition to manipulate people to such an extent...
I should do this more often.
It has just come to my attention that one of the bards under my patronage has just written a not too flattering song mocking [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s wide girth.
No harm in a bit of satire...
Allow the bard to perform at your liege's court.
I better remove the man from my employ.

Tonight a new bard performed at [Root.Capital.GetName]. His songs were quite catchy, until I realized that in many of them the man was using clever metaphors to make fun of my weight, comparing me to a ravenous boar constantly eating roasted pigs.
An insult to the [Root.GetTitle] warrants some punishment...
Have the bard flogged and expelled from court.
Oh, well! It was a rather funny song!

I was right not to worry. My bard played his piece and [From.GetTitledFirstName] laughed just as much as everybody else, although I am not sure if [From.GetSheHe] understood the real meaning behind the bard's metaphors...
The important thing is that nobody was hurt.

[From.GetTitledFirstName], the patron of the bard that entertained my court last night, took some time to apologize for the inappropriate nature of the songs this morning. [From.GetSheHeCap] was extremely relieved and happy when I told [From.GetHerHim] that I was well aware of the songs' meaning and that I enjoyed the performance regardless.

What I feared has happened: the bard's song greatly angered [From.GetTitledFirstName], to the point that my liege had the bard flogged and thrown out of court without much ceremony. Unfortunately, this morning I have heard news that the man has not even learned his lesson: he is going around the countryside, still performing his shameful pieces.
At least I am not his target...
私の正義は高く評価されなかったようだ。 吟遊詩人は鞭打たれ、宮廷から追放されたはずだったが、今でも彼は不敬な振る舞いを続けている。 私は彼が田舎をさまよい、出会う人すべてに私についてのより一層卑劣な歌を伝えているという噂を聞いた。
I should have had him killed...

The unthinkable has happened: [From.GetTitledFirstName] was so furious of the bard's song that [From.GetSheHe] had the man roasted on the spot as punishment. I never imagined my liege could be such a cruel and ruthless [From.GetManWoman]...
I best not get on [From.GetHerHis] bad side...
As the smoking carcass of the bard is brought back to the main hall, nobody is laughing anymore. Perhaps now my subjects will understand the proper respect that is due to their [Root.GetTitle].
Hmmm... And he smells delicious too!
[From.GetTitledFirstName] is well beyond my reach. There is no point in trying to antagonize [From.GetHerHim] anymore.
Does [From.GetSheHe] still think of me, I wonder?
いまや監獄で朽ち果てる身となった[From.GetTitledFirstName]に対して、出来る嫌がらせはほとんどない。
もう十分、楽しませてもらったよ。
遅かれ早かれ、[From.GetSheHeCap]はそこから抜け出すだろう…
§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!が解放されるのを待ってから、§Y敵対行為§!を続行しよう!
[From.GetTitledFirstName] awaits [From.GetHerHis] imminent death lying senseless in [From.GetHerHis] bed. I do not think there is anything left that I can do to increase [From.GetHerHis] suffering.
もう十分、楽しませてもらったよ。
How can I possibly keep harassing a person that I have come to love so much?
[From.GetFirstName] has become one of my dearest friends. I should stop antagonizing [From.GetHerHim] so much.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] well and truly hates me. There is no point in trying to antagonize [From.GetHerHim] any further.
No need for any convoluted plot - merely attacking [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s character should be enough to make it clear how much I despise [From.GetHerHim].
Instruct all the town criers across your realm to mock and insult §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! on your behalf, besmirching [From.GetHerHis] name and §YAntagonizing§! [From.GetHerHim] in the process.
I will make my disdain clear!
Publicly denounce §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]'s§! recent conduct, besmirching [From.GetHerHis] name and §YAntagonizing§! [From.GetHerHim] in the process.
A private message will be enough.
Send a private message to §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!, insulting [From.GetHerHim] and §YAntagonizing§! [From.GetHerHim] in the process.
Better wait for something more concrete...

The entirety of [From.PrimaryTitle.GetName] is laughing at me, thanks to [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s damnable actions. I have received news from many travelers going through [From.GetHerHis] realm that the most absurd rumors about me are being spread by the [From.GetTitle]'s officials themselves.

I have received news that [From.GetTitledFirstName] has denounced me on several occasions recently, going to great lengths to besmirch my reputation, even at the expenses of [From.GetHerHis] own dignity as [From.GetTitle].
[From.GetTitledFirstName] never misses a chance to inform me of how much [From.GetSheHe] despises me. The [From.GetManWoman] is truly obsessed with me, to the detriment of both of us.
The rumors spread by §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! about you will affect your reputation.
All of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] is laughing at [From.GetTitledFirstName], yet from what I hear [From.GetSheHe] is completely unmoved by my slandering campaign.
Despite making my dislike for [From.GetTitledFirstName] quite clear, [From.GetSheHe] has completely ignored my taunting. I am unsure if any of it has worked at all.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] has ignored my insults, dismissing them as the posturing of a lesser [Root.GetManWoman].
Perhaps I should try something more personal...
My efforts to smear and antagonize [From.GetTitledFirstName] have been a complete success. I might have lost some of my reputation in the process, but [From.GetTitledFirstName] looks furious.
I truly cannot stand [From.GetTitledFirstName]! [From.GetSheHeCap] seems to revel in every misfortune that befalls upon me and never misses an opportunity to taunt and insult me.
[From.GetTitledFirstName]の態度が我慢できなくなってきた。その[From.GetManWoman]はいつも私をイライラさせる。
I am not exactly sure why is [From.GetTitledFirstName] so obsessed with attacking my character at any given occasion. In truth, I could not care less about [From.GetHerHim].

[From.GetTitledFirstName]'s hopeless attempts at taunting me are truly pathetic. I might have been a bit irritated by them at first, but now I find [From.GetHerHis] meaningless strutting almost amusing.
My hostile attitude towards [From.GetTitledFirstName] has not gone unnoticed. [From.GetSheHeCap] hates me more every day.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] looks far from pleased by my hostile attitude towards [From.GetHerHim].
Unfortunately, it appears [From.GetTitledFirstName] has ignored my attempts to antagonize [From.GetHerHim].
Not only is [From.GetTitledFirstName] ignored my hostility towards [From.GetHerHim], [From.GetSheHe] looks charmed by it!
Spread ill rumors about §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! without exposing yourself too much, thus avoiding any possible retaliation from the target of your slander.
誰がそんな変人を愛することができるんだ?
あのような不摂生は[From.GetTitle]としてふさわしくない！
[From.GetHerHis]の自堕落な振る舞いについて説教することにより、§Yと敵対[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!します。
[From.GetTitledFirstName]の信仰を嘲笑して、§Y[From.GetHerHis]と敵対する§!
[From.GetTitledFirstName]の人間性を嘲笑して、§Y[From.GetHerHis]と敵対する§!
私にふさわしくない振る舞いだ。
[From.GetSheHe]の行動は正確に把握している。
§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!の中傷は無視して、[From.GetSheHe]が広めた噂が引き起こす付随的な損害の回避に集中する。
Accept §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]'s§! criticism as valid and just.
[From.GetSheHe]が何と言おうと、私は[From.GetHerHim]を許そう。
Inform §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! that you care little about [From.GetHerHis] moralizing.
どうやら[From.GetTitledFirstName]は、私が[From.GetHerHim]について広めた噂が[From.GetHerHis]の正当性を危うくするのを防ぐことにもっぱら関心があるようだ。[From.GetSheHeCap]は私の攻撃を、私が意図していたひどい侮辱よりも迷惑に捉えているようだ…
もっと厳しい言葉を使うべきだったかな。

[From.GetTitledFirstName]'s humility outweighs [From.GetHerHis] dignity, apparently. Far from being insulted by the rumors I spread about [From.GetHerHim], [From.GetTitledFirstName] accepted my slander as rightful criticism.

[From.GetTitledFirstName]'s kindness outweighs [From.GetHerHis] dignity, apparently. Far from being insulted by the rumors I spread about [From.GetHerHim], [From.GetTitledFirstName] has decided to forgive me for my accusations.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] has such a cynical mind that my insults rang hollow to [From.GetHerHis] ears. [From.GetSheHeCap] does not care at all about everybody knowing of [From.GetHerHis] wickedness.
他にできることがあるとでも？
予想通り、[From.GetTitledFirstName]は激怒している。私が[From.GetHerHim]について広めた噂により、[From.GetHerHis]の化けの皮が剝がれた。結局のところ、噂を否定することはできようか？
[From.GetTitledFirstName]と敵対しようとする私の試みによって、奴は嫌な予感が頭から離れなくなったようだ―[From.GetFirstName]は、私が奴について広めた下劣な噂に晒されたことによって、さらなるストレスを抱えることとなったらしい。
なんとも喜ばしいサプライズではないか！

It seems my attempt to antagonize [From.GetTitledFirstName] has had some unsavory expect on the mind of my victim - [From.GetFirstName] appears to feel a lot more miserable after being subjected to the vile rumors I spread about [From.GetHerHim].
Wouldn't it be a shame if [From.GetSheHe] put [From.GetHerselfHimself] out of [From.GetHerHis] misery...
[From.GetTitledFirstName]'s recent accusations were only the last in a long series of insults [From.GetSheHe] has riddled me with. There is little doubt that this [From.GetManWoman] hates me.
私の意図を隠す意味はもはやないーー[From.GetTitledFirstName]は私のことを怨敵だと公然と宣言した。
今日から先、我らは仇敵となるのだ。
It has recently come to my attention that [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] and I share a common enemy in [From.GetTitledFirstName].
よければ、友達にならないか？

It appears I am not the alone in despising [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]. After my latest squabble with [FromFrom.GetHerHim], I have discovered a true supporter in [From.GetTitledFirstName]. Our common hatred for [FromFrom.GetFirstName] has really brought us together.
あなたと友達になれて光栄だ。

It appears I am not the alone in despising [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]. After my latest squabble with [FromFrom.GetHerHim], [From.GetTitledFirstName] informed me that [From.GetSheHe] fully shares my hatred for [FromFrom.GetFirstName] and completely agrees with my actions.
良いこと言うじゃないか！
Taunting a powerful [From.GetTitle] like [From.GetFirstName] is something many other rulers would be scared to do. News of my recent actions have earned me quite a bit of prestige.

[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] has made no secret of [FromFrom.GetHerHis] hatred towards [From.GetTitledFirstName]. [FromFrom.GetSheHeCap] might be the right person to press my rightful claim against the usurper.
すぐに[FromFrom.GetHerHis]の宮殿へに行こう！

[From.GetTitledFirstName], a claimant to [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]'s throne, has come to my court after my recent show of hostility towards the [FromFrom.GetTitle]. [From.GetSheHeCap] hopes that I will aid [From.GetHerHim] in [From.GetHerHis] struggle against [FromFrom.GetFirstName].
It should not be hard to smear [From.GetTitledFirstName], given the abominable crime already staining [From.GetHerHis] name. It will be all too easy to condemn a Kinslayer such as [From.GetHerHim].

The Church has already condemned [From.GetTitledFirstName] to eternal damnation by excommunicating [From.GetHerHim]. It is time somebody reminded [From.GetHerHim] that heretics of [From.GetHerHis] kind have no place left in society.

I have it on good authority that [From.GetTitledFirstName] is less of a man. I should make sure that this shameful mutilation [From.GetSheHe] is afflicted by is something neither [From.GetSheHe] nor [From.GetHerHis] subjects ever risk forgetting.

There are many rumors about the vile, blasphemous experiments [From.GetTitledFirstName] carries out in the secrecy of [From.GetHerHis] laboratory. It would be only right for me to denounce [From.GetHerHis] witchcraft.

[From.GetTitledFirstName] is a licentious man with no self-control, always running after any sweet face he lays eyes on. Surely, denouncing his dissolute behavior will earn me his hatred, as well as smear his reputation.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] is a licentious woman with no self-control and a long list of lovers. Surely, denouncing her dissolute behavior will earn me her hatred, as well as smear her reputation.

[From.GetTitledFirstName] has already the bad reputation of a weaselly, conniving [From.GetManWoman]. It should not be hard for me to further smear [From.GetHerHis] name by pointing out [From.GetHerHis] lack of honesty.

[From.GetTitledFirstName] already has the reputation of a cruel, sadistic monster. It should be easy for me to build upon [From.GetHerHis] devious tendencies to further smear [From.GetHerHis] name and earn [From.GetHerHis] contempt.
[From.GetTitledFirstName]'s excesses are already known throughout the realm... Yet, maybe the people need a reminder of how lavish and depraved [From.GetHerHis] feasts really are...
私生児である[From.GetHerHis]には、折を見て[Root.Culture.GetName]社会での自分の適切な立ち位置を自覚させるべきだと思っている。この私の思いやりを[From.GetTitledFirstName]はいずれ感謝するだろう。

[From.GetTitledFirstName] has been turned into a limping cripple, yet [From.GetSheHe] still thinks that [From.GetSheHe] deserves any dignity? Maybe I should make it clear to [From.GetHerHim] of how pathetic [From.GetHerHis] state is.

[From.GetTitledFirstName]'s mind is already vanishing. It is time somebody made it clear to [From.GetHerHim] that a [From.GetManWoman] with [From.GetHerHis] mental deficiencies has no place in proper society.

[From.GetTitledFirstName] is a shell of a [From.GetManWoman], barely strong enough to stand on [From.GetHerHis] own. Who could ever respect such a pitiful creature? I should make sure everybody knows how pathetic [From.GetSheHe] is.

Who could ever take [From.GetTitledFirstName] seriously? The [From.GetManWoman] is so fat I doubt [From.GetSheHe] would be able to ride a horse. It won't hurt me to remind [From.GetHerHim] and [From.GetHerHis] court of how pitiful [From.GetHerHis] state is.
