Why don't we "read" the signs again?
どうしてこんなことになってしまったのだ？！
§Y女系相続法§!と§Y完全な女性の権利§!が領国中に強制されます。
§Y男系相続法§!及び§Y伝統的な女性の権利§!が領国中に強制されます。
[Root.Religion.GetName]の教えでは聖典の解釈を自由に行うことができます
[Root.Religion.GetName]の教えでは聖典の解釈を自由に行うことができます。※宗派の変更は一生に一回しか行なえません。
This character believes in adapting some of the features of the newer religions to [Root.GetHerHis] own worship of the old gods.
This character believes in detaching [Root.GetHerselfHimself] from worldly affairs in the pursuit for true enlightenment.
This character has interpreted [Root.GetHerHis] scriptures as a call to action against all the infidels threatening the survival of [Root.GetHerHis] faith.
This character believes that the true worship of the old gods is still best exemplified by the care that a [Root.GetManWoman] has for [Root.GetHerHis] own family.
The [Root.Religion.GetName] faith allows free interpretation of the scriptures. I must decide which of the main branches of beliefs I ascribe to the most.
Perhaps I misinterpreted the new scriptures. Perhaps there is a better way to worship the gods...
§Gこの宗教の信者は望む宗派を選ぶことができます§!
By creating the Holy Order Dralha's Children, all [Root.Religion.GetName] rulers will be able to hire them and use them in the struggle against those religions that would do us harm.
§Yダラの崇拝者§!の宗教騎士団が創設される。

Followers of the [leader_of_dralhas.Religion.GetName] faith have always followed the central tenet of showing respect to all living creatures and to refrain from violence. But even the most peaceful of men must occasionally go to war.\n\nAs such, a new order has been founded, named the [leader_of_dralhas.PrimaryTitle.GetName]. They swear loyalty to all [leader_of_dralhas.Religion.GetName] rulers against those who would do them harm. A most devout [leader_of_dralhas.GetManWoman], named [leader_of_dralhas.GetFirstName], has pledged [leader_of_dralhas.GetHerselfHimself] to undertake the leadership of the order to preserve their way of life.
大食にて悪名高き[GetFirstName]、そのおぞましき食欲を満たさんとせざる日はなし。邪悪なるこの者は死後自らの犯した罪の代償を払わん。
ペルシャ帝国を復興せるこの者の生涯はあまねくゾロアスター祭司の説教によりて不朽の伝説とならん。この者アフラ・マズダーの御下にあるべし。
敬虔なるこの者、その身を尽くして異教徒に[Religion.GetHighGodName]の言葉を広めんとす
大改革者の名を以て知らるこの者、配下の諸部族と共に古き偶像への信仰を捨て、栄光ある[Religion.GetName]の教えに帰依す
信心深きこの者、近年稀に見る大聖戦にて[Religion.GetHighGodName]の栄光のために異教徒と戦えり。
獣と話し、まぐわうと噂されし邪悪なる[GetFirstName]、死後にそのおぞましき罪への代償を支払わん。
人の肉を食えると噂さる[GetFirstName]、死後にその邪悪さの罰を受けること疑いなし
自らの魂を[Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName]に売ったと噂さる[GetFirstName]、常より得体の知れぬ問題人物と見なされり。
古の強大なる帝国を復興せる[GetFirstName]、その名はこの世ある限り栄光の名の下にあらん。
教会より破門され、追放者として身罷りし[GetFirstName]、死後は永遠の責め苦を受けるは必定なり。

Now organized in a strict hierarchy with an official religious head,
高位聖職者同士の緩やかな繋がりによる、地方独立的な階級制度に再編成し、
それぞれの独立した聖職者に[Root.GetHerHis]の信者に対する完全な権限を与えるために再編成され、
[Root.Religion.GetName] 信仰は、宣教師や十字軍などの、か弱く女々しい敵対者に対抗する準備を整えた。
[Root.Religion.GetName]の信仰は再び活力を取り戻し、シャーマニズムとしての起源を捨て、公式の教義を獲得することで、邪教へ対抗するに相応しいものとなった。
the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith has abandoned its tribal ways for a well-defined dogma and structure, fit to oppose its rivals.
the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith has developed a series of well-defined rituals and a full list of deities to combat the proselytizing efforts of its neighbors.
[Root.Religion.GetName]が外国の宣教師や異なる神々の祈祷に対抗できるように、口承によって伝わっているすべての呪文や魅力を記した聖典を承認した。
[Root.Religion.GetName]が敵対的な宗教の批判や軍隊に対抗できるように、口承によって伝わっているすべての呪文や魅力を記した聖典を承認した。
[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]を礼拝する作法を記し、[Root.Religion.GetName]を異教の伝道師や宣教師との論争のために聖典を纏めた。
[Root.Religion.GetName]信仰は遂に他の東方宗教との根本的な違いを明白にしたことで、これ以降では仏教やヒンドゥー教、それらに類する宗教への改宗を防ぐことができるでしょう。
the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith is finally fit to complete the conquest of the New World without fear of its champions being swayed by foreign preachers and missionaries.
the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith is ready to contend with its degenerate and barbarous opponents, reborn stronger than ever from its ashes.

神は人の運命を星々に写された。人の本質を知るためにはただ空を見上げるべし。
§G誕生時に占星術特性が与えられ、またディシジョンでも占星術特性を得ることができます§!
星が私の行動にどのような影響を与えているのか、子どもの頃に何度も聞かされていたが、今では確信が持てない。大人たちが私を特別な気分にしようと話をしただけなのだろうか?
それは本当に違いない!
ぼくは星なんか気にしない！
[GetFromRelation]の[From.GetFirstName]は、[From.GetHerHis]の誕生時に定められた宿星の示す自分の運命に深い関心を持っている。
私の[GetFromRelation][From.GetFirstName]は、自分の出生と星座が自分の運命と関連している、という考えを好んでいないようだ。
だからどうした？占星術など迷信にすぎない。
そうだな。[From.GetSheHeCap]の将来は星々に左右されるべきではない。
[From.GetSheHeCap]は星々の意志に気に病みすぎだ。
My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] warned me that I worry too much about the stars and that I should not let the circumstances of my birth affect my judgment on present events.
My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] praised me for not focusing too much on astrology at the expenses of my better judgment.
I should not let the stars rule over me!
My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] praised me today for paying the due respect to the heavens and taking a healthy interest in astrology and the influence that the stars have on me.

My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] decided to scold me today for my lack of interest in astrology. [From.GetSheHeCap] warned me that I should always pay mind to the influence that stars have over people.
私は自分の中に何があるのか見つめなければならない。

By determining in clear terms which constellations favor me and which bring me harm, I can fully embrace the nature of my zodiac sign and reach a greater level of understanding of myself and the world around me.
正確な計算の結果、自分が内向性や独創性を象徴する宝瓶宮の下に生まれたと断定した。
正確な計算の結果、自分が苛烈性や高潔性を象徴する白羊宮の下に生まれたと断定した。
正確な計算の結果、自分が忍耐や内省を象徴する巨蟹宮の下に生まれたと断定した。
正確な計算の結果、自分が好奇心や堅実さを象徴する磨羯宮の下に生まれたと断定した。
正確な計算の結果、自分が多才さや気まぐれを象徴する双子宮の下に生まれたと断定した。
正確な計算の結果、自分が熱情や高慢を象徴する獅子宮の下に生まれたと断定した。
正確な計算の結果、自分が公正や中庸を象徴する天秤宮の下に生まれたと断定した。
正確な計算の結果、自分が内向性や哀憐を象徴する双魚宮の下に生まれたと断定した。
正確な計算の結果、自分が活力やカリスマ性を象徴する人馬宮の下に生まれたと断定した。
正確な計算の結果、自分が秘密主義や頑固さを象徴する天蝎宮の下に生まれたと断定した。
正確な計算の結果、自分が不屈さや決断力を象徴する金牛宮の下に生まれたと断定した。
正確な計算の結果、自分が勤勉や謙虚を象徴する処女宮の下に生まれたと断定した。
まさしく、星々は我が胸の内を知る。
古代ギリシャ・ローマの遺跡や文献を学ぶために時間を使う。
古代ギリシャ・ローマの遺跡や文献を学ぶために時間を使う。
この統治者はカエサルの軍事的功績に関する記述や文献の研究に長い時間を費やし、自らの軍事的能力に磨きをかけました。
この人物はキケロに代表される古典時代の政治家の演説を研究することに時間を費やし、優れた駆け引きや詭弁の技術を学びました。
ユスティニアヌスの洞察力
この統治者はユスティニアヌス帝に関する記述や文献の研究に長い時間を費やし、国政術やローマ法についての深い理解を得ました。
私はこの世界を飾る偉大な文明の遺跡の中を歩きまわった。彼らの偉業を真似ようと思うならば、この機会を利用して、私たちの前に現れた人々の歴史と輝かしい業績を詳細に研究すべきだ。
彼らが崇拝した奇妙な神々についてもっと知りたい...
古代の将軍とその戦術を研究しよう。
古代の帝国はどのように統治されていたのだろうか...
古代の偉人の演説を研究しよう。

I did my best, but my attempts to study the history of the Roman Empire were not as successful as I hoped. Most accounts I was able to access are fragmented and confusing. I don't think I was able to learn anything valuable after all these months of study.

I am fascinated by the legends of the old gods worshiped by Romans and Greeks in the past. Their capricious and passionate nature differs so much from [catholic.GetHighGodName]'s unknowable and contradictory designs... Their plots and rivalries certainly offer a better explanation for the chaotic state of our world.
What if *they* are the real gods?
They are nothing but entertaining stories.
ここ数ヶ月、私はカエサルのガリア人に対する軍事的功績の断片的な資料に没頭して取り組んだ。それは啓発的な学習経験であり、装備や大きさの違いにかかわらず、彼の戦術のいくつかを自分の敵に適用することができると確信している。
ここ数ヶ月間、私はローマの偉大な政治家たちの断片的な資料に没頭して取り組んできた。ユスティニアヌス帝の著作、特にローマの法典の改革については、目を見張るものがあった。
ここ数ヶ月、私はローマで最も優れた弁論家たちの断片的な資料に没頭して取り組んできた。キケロや他の偉大な弁論家の条約文を読むことで、外交や政治の優れた技術について多くを学ぶことができた。
§Y古代ギリシャ神話§!の研究を行う
§Yローマの戦略§!の研究を行う
§Yローマの政治§!の研究を行う。

Followers of the Bön religion worship many gods and spirits. Adherents seek Great Perfection through the Dzogchen, which is one of the Nine Vehicles (or paths) of the Bön faith. In secret, the Bön Faithful continue to sacrifice animals made of barley flour to appease the higher powers.

Followers of Hellenism worship the old gods of the ancient Greeks and Romans. Adherents sacrifice animals and calculate the future through astrology, believing their deities to be fickle and passionate beings, largely indifferent to the affairs of mortals.

Followers of Hellenism worship the old gods of the ancient Greeks and Romans. Adherents sacrifice animals and calculate the future through astrology, believing their deities to be fickle and passionate beings, largely indifferent to the affairs of mortals
This woman is recovering from the traumatizing consequences of aborting her own child.

What horrible crime have I committed? Whenever I close my eyes I can hear the silent cries of my son that never was. The guilt for the ruthless murder of that innocent soul plagues my mind like a disease.

The unthinkable has happened. Rumors about my terrible crime have spread across the court. And, if the stories are true, I have nobody to blame but myself. The servant whisper that every night I walk in my sleep around the castle, asking forgiveness to the child I murdered before his own birth.
I feel that there is something wrong with me. The premature end to my last pregnancy broke something within me.
故郷の教会に対して無慈悲な破壊を行った新皇帝に対しローマ市民が立ち上がりました。
§Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!は最近宗派を変更していない
アブラハム宗教反体制派
アブラハム宗教反体制派
死せる異教を復興させてこれをアブラハム宗教に代えるものとした決断に帝国中で多くの封臣が怒り狂っています。
死せる異教を復興させてこれをアブラハム宗教に代えるものとした決断によって新たに建国された帝国は内戦へと引きずり込まれました。
数世紀に渡って教会は我が帝国の古の首都ローマの支配権をほしいままにしてきた。教皇庁の影響はこの都にいまだ残っている。多数の教会がその証拠だ。おそらく今こそ教会に対する帝国の権威の優越を議論の余地のない形で再確認しなければならないだろう…
キリスト教徒がこの偉大なる古の都ローマから追い出された今でも、[Root.GetTitle]たる我が権威に挑みかかるように奴らの神へ捧げられた遺跡が未だに残っている。ローマを真に我が物とせんと願うなら、方法は一つしかない…
何世紀も前、ガラリヤ人はローマに火を放ち、更にはその罪を嘗てのローマ皇帝になすりつけた。今こそ帝国の嘗ての首都の7つの丘に蔓延る邪教の寺院を一掃して嘗ての借りを返すべきだろう
街からキリスト教の残滓を全て取り除かなければならぬ。
§Yローマ§!の§Y教会§!全てを燃やします。
私にはこんな冒涜行為はできない。
Heathens as they are, we should not destroy their temples.
We must endeavor to be better than them.

未だ残るあらゆる反乱因子を撲滅し、帝国に対して過去行われた侮辱行為に対して罰を与えるため、[From.GetTitledFirstName]は聖座そのものの破壊を命じた。司祭や司教が教会から慌ただしく逃げ出した後、聖遺物や書籍を回収する暇もなく、[From.Culture.GetName]兵たちが聖なる建物に火を放った。\nこの言語道断な行いによってカトリック教会の権威は永久的に損なわれることになるだろう。
文化と伝統に対して一切の敬意も関心も抱かぬ[From.GetTitledFirstName]は聖座そのものの破壊という言語道断な命令を行った。司祭や司教が教会から慌ただしく逃げ出した後、聖遺物や書籍を回収する暇もなく、[From.Culture.GetName]兵たちが聖なる建物に火を放った。\nこの言語道断な行いによってカトリック教会の権威は永久的に損なわれることになるだろう。
名実共に異教のローマ帝国として[From.GetTitledFirstName]は聖座そのものの無慈悲な破壊を命じた。司祭や枢機卿を教会に閉じ込め、[From.Culture.GetName]兵たちが聖なる建物に火を放った。\nこの言語道断な行いによってカトリック教会の権威は永久的に損なわれることになるだろう。
キリスト教徒の悲嘆も自分には関係のない話だ。
ガラリヤ人は気晴らしに火刑に処される程度の存在になるだろう…
§Yキリスト教§!世界はこの行為に激怒します\n§Y聖座§!の破壊は§Yカトリック教会§!の§Y宗教権威§!に重大な悪影響を及ぼします。
この行為によって[From.GetTitledFirstName]は永遠に呪われよう！
キリスト教徒の寺院が燃やされたとなどいう話は自分たちには全く関係ないことだ。
今こそ我々の祖先の過ちを正すべきだ…
ローマ市民は今回の大火をよく思っていないようだ。数日後、遂に平和は破られ、怒りが頂点に達した多数の百姓達が駐屯地を襲撃し、聖座を破壊し、大火によって自分たちの家を巻き添えにした皇帝に対して公に反旗を翻した。

I have restored the Empire, a feat worthy of immortal glory, yet now doubts beset my mind. How can I ensure that this Empire will not fall like it did in the past? When looking for the causes that fragmented and destroyed the old Empire, there is only one thing that appears to be constant...
帝国の崩壊の原因はキリスト教会にほかならない…
帝国を強化するために古の§Y古代ギリシャ宗教§!の教えを復活させます
無能で不信心な指導者達が帝国の破滅をもたらしたのだ。
テオドシウス帝が東夷の宗教であるキリスト教を国教としたことでローマ帝国は滅亡への道を歩み始めたのではないか。つまり、逆に古き神々への信仰を取り戻せば帝国の長きにわたる繁栄をより確かなものとすることができるのではないだろうか？帝国を救うためのこの決断は、しかし一歩間違えば再び帝国を滅亡させてしまうものになるだろう…
皆が帝国を復興した自分を讃えている内に速やかにことを運ばなければ！
全§Y封臣§!に自分に従って改宗するよう命じる手紙を送ります。\nかつて§Y古代ギリシャ宗教§!の聖地であった地域を全て自分の支配下に置くことができれば、そこに新たな神殿を建立することができます。
自分の計画を明らかにするまでは我慢強く志を同じくする魂を探さなければ

[Root.GetTitledName]へ
結論から言うと、嘗ての皇帝達がガラリヤの異教に入れ込んでしまったことこそが偉大なるローマ帝国の没落と密接に結びついていたのであり、ローマ帝国の栄光を真に回復するためには、古のローマの宗教を復興させなければならないのだ。

ようやくだ！我らの時代が到来したのだ！

The great celebrations across the Christian world after the restoration of the Roman Empire at the hands of [From.GetTitledFirstName] have been cut short by a terrifying and unexpected turn of events. The new [From.GetTitle] has determined that Christianity is a barbarous and seditious cult that has no place in [From.GetHerHis] new Empire. \nIn an effort to rebuild the past glory of Rome in its entirety, [From.GetSheHe] has forsaken [From.GetHerHis] faith in favor of worshiping the old pagan gods of [From.GetHerHis] ancestors.
古の神々が教会の灰塵から立ち上がるだろう！
新たな§Y古代ギリシャ宗教の神殿§!が§Yローマ§!に創建されます。
新たな§Y古代ギリシャ宗教の神殿§!が§Yテッサロニケ§!に創建されます。
新たな§Y古代ギリシャ宗教の神殿§!が§Yアテナイ§!に創建されます。
新たな§Y古代ギリシャ宗教の神殿§!が§Yシラクサ§!に創建されます。
新たな§Y古代ギリシャ宗教の神殿§!が§Yアレクサンドリア§!に創建されます。
We stand united against the barbarity of the Galileans!
Babylon has risen again! The end time is near!
This is of no concern to us.

[From.GetTitledFirstName] has clearly gone insane, yet, with the authority [From.GetSheHe] has accumulated after [From.GetHerHis] many accomplishments, [From.GetSheHe] might be able of perverting the Empire into a force for evil, a nation of idolaters. [From.GetSheHeCap] must be stopped now, before it's too late!
蜂起してこの暴君を退位させなければならない！
Send letters urging all the followers of the §YOne True God§! in the Empire to band together against the Apostate on the throne.
There is nothing we can do.

To all the faithful of the One True God!\nThe [From.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName] has taken over our [scoped_hellenic_emperor.GetTitle]'s mind, twisting it with lies and madness. We must stand together and depose the Apostate who sits on the holy throne of Rome or see the accursed heathens spread once again across our world.\n[From.GetTitledName]
These are the words of a traitor.

The time has come!\nAll the followers of the One True God suffering under the yoke of our mad [scoped_hellenic_emperor.GetTitle] have reunited under my lead and are ready to bring the blasphemous tyrant to justice.

Several indignant vassals have banded together to stand against the new Imperial religion of Rome. They have taken arms and plan to overthrow their own [scoped_hellenic_emperor.GetTitle] and restore the worship of their god throughout the Empire.
I cannot say I am surprised...

Despite the incredible unpopularity of [FromFrom.GetHerHis] decision, [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] has managed to emerge victorious from the Empire's recent civil war and reaffirm [FromFrom.GetHerHis] desire to restore the Hellenic faith to the Roman world. After [FromFrom.GetHerHis] show of force and lucidity, the Emperor has gained several new supporters, both amongst the people as well as the nobility. \n\nThis is truly a new beginning for Rome and a dark day for Christians everywhere.

The Civil War has ended, and [FromFromFrom.GetFirstName] has reaffirmed [FromFromFrom.GetHerHis] authority as our rightful [FromFromFrom.GetTitle]. Perhaps it is time I reconsidered my choice and embraced Hellenism, lest I suffer the [FromFromFrom.GetTitle]'s wrath.
Deep down I always believed in [hellenic_pagan.GetHighGodName]!
No, I must stand my ground!
Convert to §YHellenism§! and urge your §YVassals§! to do the same.
帝国を復活させれば先祖のように気品ある華やかな生活様式を楽しむことができる。
§Yローマ文化§!は帝国中に広がっていくだろう。
ローマ文化を受容する
帝国を復活させれば先祖のように気品ある華やかな生活様式を楽しむことができる。

As expected, the reintroduction of ancient Roman law and customs has not been well received by the Galilean moralizers. An entire coalition of Christian priests has petitioned me to put a stop to these new excesses to prevent the damnation of my subjects' souls.

The higher standards of living that many of my subjects have had access to since the restoration of the Empire have caused the ire of a few moralizers amongst my Christian subjects. A group of petitioners from the Church's clergy has pleaded me to put a stop to these new, luxurious customs, as they are detrimental to my people's salvation.

The higher standards of living that many of my subjects have had access to since the restoration of the Empire appear to have caused the anger of some Christian priests. A group of petitioners from the Church's clergy has pleaded me to put a stop to these new, luxurious customs, as they are detrimental to my people's salvation.
Your cult of mediocrity is no longer law.
I care not for the lamentations of infidels.
On the contrary, I must be charitable to be virtuous!
Issue a great period of celebrations throughout the Empire, further encouraging the adoption of §YRoman Culture§!.
We will endeavor to be moderate.
It is not our intention to upset the Christians.
Far from me to eschew humility...
The outcome of the Civil War will drive more citizens of the Empire to embrace §YHellenism§!.

生まれ変わった[leader_of_myrmidons.Religion.GetName]が新たな守護者を見出した。国境を取り巻く野蛮な異教徒と戦うために身を捧げ、古き神々の聖なる祭壇を守る熱狂的な戦士たちの一団であるミュルミドーンだ。\n敵と相対するすべての[leader_of_myrmidons.Religion.GetName]の領主に忠誠を誓う。最も敬虔な[leader_of_myrmidons.GetFirstName]という[leader_of_myrmidons.GetManWoman]が、彼らの生き方を守るために、この騎士団を導くと誓っている。
ミュルミドーンの創設
我らを取り巻く野蛮なる異教徒達から守るため、一つの旗の下に最も献身的な戦士たちを編成しなければならない。
§Yミュルミドーン§!の宗教騎士団が結成される。

The secretive cult of Bacchus has always been a plague to the civilized society of Ancient Rome. Members of this cult gather at night to perform obscene rituals to satisfy their most primal instincts, dabbling in sorcery, cannibalism and bestiality.
Has not been approached by the Bacchants before.
Attempt to find out whether §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! is open to the power of the occult. If so, you may invite [Root.GetHerHim] to become a Bacchant.

Beneath the confines of civilized society lay the tumultuous passions tormenting all human beings. Re-establishing the mystic cult of Bacchus will only allow the enlightened among us to satisfy our innermost desires without restraint.
The Secret Society of the §YBacchants§! is established.

Believed to be vanquished for centuries, the mad followers of Bacchus have resurfaced, spreading their grotesque beliefs throughout civilized lands.\nSlaves to their most primal desires, these deviants hide their twisted allegiance to the darkest powers of Chaos during daytime, walking inconspicuously amongst the virtuous. Yet, when night comes, they gather in the wilderness to dance around fires while dressed like goats and leopards, performing obscene orgiastic rites and consuming raw human flesh.
Is it such a crime to follow one's instincts?

I'm having dinner and plenty of drinks with [satanists_recruiter.GetTitledName] tonight. It's lovely, yet what I am most charmed by is [satanists_recruiter.GetFirstName] [satanists_recruiter.GetHerselfHimself]. Why else would I not immediately stop our conversation, which has slowly begun to touch upon some unsavory and deviant topics about the primal needs of every [Root.GetManWoman]?
しかし、好奇心はそそられるな...

What if I told you I can set you free from all the tedium and responsibilities of society? [satanists_recruiter.GetFirstName] continues, throwing a cautious glance around us before pulling up [satanists_recruiter.GetHerHis] sleeve, revealing a scar in the shape of [satanists_recruiter.GetDWDevil]'s mark. "I can show you a world of pure passion where your every pleasure is distilled to its purest form..."

I meet [From.GetTitledFirstName] on my way to the meeting. We walk together in the sacred garden, under the cover of the night, attracted by the maddening rhythm of the drums and cymbals of our brethren. Many have already begun the ritual when we arrive, dancing incessantly around the fires, filled with the God's essence.
It is time to spill some blood!

The frenzy takes hold of us as the god's brew courses through our veins, filling us with primal strength and divine intent. We fret and scream at the moon, circling around the wailing victims rounded around the fire. I leap forward growling and sink my teeth in the flesh of a young man, tearing him apart and desecrating his corpse.

The frenzy takes hold of us as the god's brew courses through our veins, filling us with primal strength and divine intent. We fret and scream at the moon, circling around the wailing victims rounded around the fire. Yet, in the end it's [FromFrom.GetFirstName] that I leap on, consumed by Bacchus' madness, tearing and clawing.
Be merry tonight, my kindred, for tomorrow civilization awaits.

Our frenetic dance quickly turns into a violent orgy. Wails of men and beasts overlap in a sinister cacophony as the grotesque shadows of our jumbled limbs quiver, grasping for the crackling fires. When I finally regain consciousness after dawn, soiled and exhausted, I only have broken memories of the terrible delights I experienced during the Bacchanal.

Our frenetic dance quickly turns into a violent orgy. Wails of men and beasts overlap in a sinister cacophony as the grotesque shadows of our jumbled limbs quiver, grasping for the crackling fires. Then, just as I am finally feeling the gods fill me with his ecstatic presence, I feel somebody yelling at me and something hitting my head.

Meeting with [satanists_recruit.GetTitledFirstName], I made sure to only cautiously mention the most extreme and unsavory practices of our rituals... Thankfully, it seems that my carefully chosen words had the desired effect on [satanists_recruit.GetHerHim]. From [satanists_recruit.GetHerHis] glittering eyes I got the distinct impression that [satanists_recruit.GetSheHe] enjoyed the promise of titillating experiences within our congregation.

Meeting with [satanists_recruit.GetTitledFirstName], I made sure to only cautiously mention the most extreme and unsavory practices of our congregation... Regretfully, it seems that my words only irritated my [satanists_recruit.GetRootRelation] – from the steely look [satanists_recruit.GetSheHe] finally gave me, I should probably steer clear of [satanists_recruit.GetHerHim] for now.
Determine which §YPagan Branch§! you belong to.
Abandon the §YPagan Branch§! you currently ascribe to and choose another one.

The ancient [Root.Religion.GetName] is proving unable to withstand the onslaught of its organized, proselytizing neighbors. Rather than abandoning the old ways, [Root.GetTitledName] and the most powerful of [Root.GetHerHis] priests have decided to reform the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith in order to turn the tides and protect their ancient customs.\nWith official clergy and ratified scriptures, this new religion has already started to spread amongst the old [Root.Religion.GetName] faithful.
我が愛しの [From.GetFirstName] から、私の子供を身籠ったと伝えられた。
我が愛しの[From.GetFirstName]が、身籠ったという報せを受けた。どうか彼女の夫が、血縁上の疑念を抱かないよう、彼女に上手く丸め込まれますように。
私たちは祈ることしかできない…
[Root.Religion.GetName]信仰を受け入れたからには、いずれの宗派に属すのか決めなければならない……
§G艦隊維持コストが10%減少します§!

Rulers follow the Aztec principles of human sacrifices, seafaring and relentlessness
近親婚は禁止されており、また後継者指定を行えます
重婚及び神統結婚を行えます

この人物は当主の男妾の子として生まれました。男妾の子は継承可能ですが、周囲から少々軽んじられる傾向があります。
That vile hag [From.GetBestName] has forced me to become her consort!
[FromFrom.GetBestName] has forced my husband [From.GetBestName] to become her consort!

My consort, [target_consort.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal], does not love me. While love is not exactly necessary, I'd still like to see his charming face light up with smiles and laughter... so I've decided to romance him!
My consort [From.GetBestName] has fled! He climbed out of his tower room window, probably with outside assistance, because my guards were completely unable to locate him before he escaped my realm.
I want a portrait of my beautiful consort.
I am surely with child... my consort will be pleased.
I am surely with child. I wonder which one of my consorts is the lucky father...
古代ギリシャ宗教の学派であるストア派は、知恵、勇気、節制、正義の美徳を中心とした合理的な生き方と、情動を避け、平衡を重んじる精神に基づいている。ほとんどのストア学派は、哲学を学び、高潔な人生を送ることで幸福になると信じている。
地域住民を、より文明化された[From.Culture.GetName]文化に平和的に導くため、一連の布告を公布する。
州の紋章を§G右クリック§!することで地域文化を貴方の文化に転向できるようにする
心安らかに行きなさい

[Root.GetMOGreeting], [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName]

The hectic life of a ruler rarely allows for sufficient time for contemplation. I ask of you to seclude yourself and think about your life and your actions in order to reach a better understanding of the world.

[Root.GetMOFarewell],
Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
The School of Stoicism was one of the predominant branches of Hellenic philosophies at the time of the old Roman Empire, based upon the pursuit of virtue and moderation.

[From.GetTitledFirstName] has decided to restore the ancient School of Stoicism. Based upon the pursuit of reason and moderation, Stoics believe in shunning all excesses and passions in favor of a balanced and rational approach to life, centered around the virtues of Wisdom, Courage, Temperance, and Justice.\nAlthough membership is not excluded to other religions, this philosophy has always been closely related to Hellenism.
They shall be a bulwark for civilized society!
A majority of the population in [From.GetName] has embraced the [Root.Culture.GetName] culture.

A courier is brought before me with a message, telling me that [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] has imposed some strict social reforms on [From.GetName] to lead the populace into embracing [FromFrom.Culture.GetName] customs.
身につけた者を精霊の世界に順応させる羽でできた神聖な頭飾り。

この神殿は天空、正義、豊穣を司る神、[GetZeusJupiterName]に捧げられたものです。

[Root.Religion.GetName]の神殿には多くの神々が住んでいるが、[scoped_temple_barony.GetName]のような重要な神殿は、天から我々を見守っている、最も権威ある神々であるオリュンポス十二神の一柱に捧げるのがいいだろう。
クロニド兄弟の片方を祀る神殿にしよう

慈悲深い神の住み家としよう

[GetZeusJupiterName] is by many considered the King of Heaven. He and his brothers fought a war against their father for control of all Creation and then gambled over its spoils. Fate bestowed dominion of the skies upon [GetZeusJupiterName], leaving the seas to [GetPoseidonNeptuneName] and the earth to [GetHadesPlutoName].
[GetAresMarsName]はいつの時代もローマ人から広く支持された神であり、姉妹である[GetAthenaMinervaName]と比べて直接的で熱狂的な戦いを司る。[GetHephaestusVulcanName]は明確に戦の神とされているわけではないが、鍛冶師や攻城兵器、武器と関連付けられることがある。
アポローンを祀る神殿にしよう！

非イスラム教徒の住人に対する税金であり、イスラム教徒が支払うザカート税よりも高額なため、税収の増加につながります。
A Tax on the non-[Root.Religion.GetGroupName] population, it is larger than regular taxes paid by [Root.Religion.GetGroupName] worshipers and therefore increases the total tax income
The sacred Imperial crown of representing absolute authority over the [e_byzantium.GetFullName].
The ancient crown of the Elected Emperor.

改革によって、[Player.Religion.GetName]信仰は組織化された宗教となります。全ての聖地を支配していなければ、§Y50§!の宗教権威と§Y3つ§!の[Player.Religion.GetName]聖地を支配する必要があり、§R750§!の[Player.Religion.GetPietyName]を消費します。宗教改革によって、統治者は新たな信仰の性質、教義、指導権を選択して、その宗教を完全に作り替えることができます。
§G異教徒の囚人を生贄に捧げて信仰点を得ることができる§!

Unfortunately, it appears that [converting_king.GetTitledFirstName] has fallen gravely ill and is unable to perform is duties as host any longer.
My guest, [sponsoring_king.GetTitledFirstName], has fallen gravely ill and was forced to return back home before the end of [sponsoring_king.GetHerHis] visit.
The signs are not as bad as the diviner says...
愚かな！これは間違いなく吉兆だ！

[From.GetTitledFirstName] is a insufferable, weak-willed [From.GetManWoman], without any worthy accomplishment to [From.GetHerHis] name. It would be nothing more than my duty to make sure everyone knows of how pathetic [From.GetSheHe] is.

[From.GetTitledFirstName] has sent [From.GetHerHis] sycophants to torment me once more, spreading vile rumors about me. It looks like [From.GetSheHe] will not be satisfied until [From.GetSheHe] has dragged my name into the mud.
マルス広場は軍事訓練やパレードを行う目的で、都市や居留地の側に立てられます。兵士たちはここでローマ式の訓練を受け、隊列を形成して行進し、戦闘する方法を教えられます。
§Y完全な双系相続法§!及び§Y完全な女性の権利§!が領国中に強制されます。
This ruler was crowned by a minor prelate.\nA formal coronation is considered by many a fundamental step in the legitimization of any proper [christian.GetGroupName] ruler.
この支配者は著名な聖職者から聖別を受けた。\n正式な戴冠式は、[christian.GetGroupName]の支配を正統なものとするために必要な儀式であると考えられている。
この支配者は[GetChristName]教皇自らによって聖別された。\n[Root.GetHerHis]の神より授かった支配権は争う余地のない確たるものとなった。
今、私に戴冠する意思がある[Root.Religion.GetName]の司祭を見つけたので、式の準備にいくらほど支払うかを決めねばならない。
すべての家臣からの評価が§R-10§!減少する。
雲隠れ、隔離、旅行中、または重要な業務に従事していない\n
雲隠れ、隔離、旅行中、または重要な業務に従事していない\n
考え直したが、もうしばらく待つことにしよう。
You will no longer be able to §YSway [From.GetTitledFirstName]§! for the next §Y10§! years.
§Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! has recently rebuked §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!'s attentions in clear terms.
そろそろ [From.GetTitledFirstName] に、自分のためにまとまった時間を割いてもらうよう頼む時期かもしれない。それが、最も早く確実に [From.GetHerHis]の信頼を得る方法だろう。

My dissertation on military matters was very appreciated it seems: [From.GetTitledFirstName] thanked me for sharing my knowledge with [From.GetHerHim], remarking that [From.GetSheHe] will treasure what [From.GetSheHe] has learned from me.

[From.GetTitledFirstName]'s response to my military dissertation was cold and disinterested. Whether [From.GetSheHe] is does not care about military matters, or [From.GetSheHe] doubts the validity of my suggestions, it is clear that [From.GetSheHe] was not impressed by my words.
I wish to know more about the [christian.GetGroupName] religions.
The words of [muslim.GetGroupName] theologians intrigue me...
I wonder about the god of the [jewish.GetName] people...
There are other religions that are more to my liking.
The mysteries of [zoroastrian_group.GetGroupName] faiths are intriguing.
I wish to follow some of the [indian_group.GetGroupName] principles.
§YRoman Culture§! will start spreading across your lands.
The glorious restorer of the Roman Empire, who brought Europe, Africa and Asia back under Imperial rule.
There is something about Pagans that intrigues me...
I long for the simplicity of the [pagan_group.GetName] worshipers.
$KILLER$の命によりファラリスの雄牛で蒸し焼きにされた
[Root.GetTitledFirstName]は自身の一族が、敵を青銅の牡牛で拷問したことで悪名高いアクラガスの僭主ファラリスに連なる血筋であると主張した。
囚人の処刑に§Yファラリスの雄牛§!を使えるようになります

Following a recent reminder of the terrible fate that expects the enemies of this ruler, many in the court of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] have been dissuaded from acting against their ruthless liege. At least for the time being...
[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]の凄惨な処刑以来、不可解な噂が領内に広がっている。[Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName]の人々は私の所業からかつてアクラガスを支配した僭主ファラリスを想起し、またこの共通点は単なる偶然ではなく私が彼の子孫である証だと信じるようになった。\n\nもしこのまま噂が広がるに任せておけば、わが一族の評判は永遠に汚されるだろう。
私を敬愛しない者は、私を恐れることになる。
Acknowledge the §YBrazen Bull§! as your family symbol.
狂乱が手に負えなくなる前に止めなければ。
I was shocked to hear what fate [From.GetTitledFirstName] has in store for me. This deranged lunatic plans to lock me inside a brazen bull and cook me alive!

As I hear the delightful melody coming from my brazen bull as the screams of [From.GetTitledFirstName] are filtered through the contraption, I find myself reflecting upon how much I have come to rely on this wonderful instrument, and on how much I resemble the enlightened King of Sicily who employed it the first time...

After spending some time researching as well as discussing with a local blacksmith, I was able to submit [From.GetFirstName] to the most intriguing of tortures – a brazen bull. As the [From.GetManWoman] was cooked inside this wonderful contraption, [From.GetHerHis] screams were turned into a delightful and cautionary melody for all my court to hear...
I was shocked to hear what fate [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] has in store for me. This deranged lunatic plans to lock me inside a brazen bull and cook me alive!

[From.GetTitledFirstName] is pushed screaming and kicking inside the brazen bull in the middle of the throne room, under the silent watch of all my courtiers. The [From.GetManWoman]'s desperate shrieking as [From.GetSheHe] is roasted alive inside the contraption soon turns into harmonious bellowing.

The guards drag me out of the dungeon and to [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]'s court. My hopes for freedom vanish quickly as I see the imposing figure of the brass bull staring at me from the middle of the hall, surrounded by fearful courtiers. The guards drag me towards the statue while the executioner starts stoking the fires beneath it.
〈ファラリスの雄牛〉はやめてくれ！
Lock [Root.GetTitledFirstName] into the Brazen Bull and let [Root.GetHerHim] cook inside the monstrous contraption.
Your other §YVassals§! will be Intimidated (§G+10§! §YOpinion§!) by this action.
Let's try something more original this time...
Ugh, just throw them in the Brazen Bull...

Foul rumors are spreading from Sicily. The once prosperous Mediterranean isle has been fallen into the hands of a cruel [From.GetManWoman], who claims to be a descendant of the [pagan_group.GetName] Tyrants of old. 

Consumed by paranoid delusions and sadistic fantasies, [From.GetSheHe] has killed hundreds of [From.GetHerHis] own subjects for the most trivial of slights. 
Most of [From.GetHerHis] victims have met their end in the fiery belly of [From.GetHerHis] brazen bull, symbol of [From.GetHerHis] degenerate dynasty.
Will attract §YShips§! during times of war.

My recent victory over the Roman armies of [defeated_emperor.GetTitledFirstName] has resonated across [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName]. Despite all odds, I was able to lead my people against all the legions and the formidable power of the Imperial fleet, laying waste upon the decadent rule of House [defeated_emperor.GetOnlyDynastyName]. \nSuch was my triumph that the people have started to compare me to Teuta, an ancient [pagan_group.GetName] Queen who once stood against the ambitions of Rome, going even as far as to whisper that my prowess in this war is proof that I share some of my blood with her.

My recent victory over the Roman armies of [defeated_emperor.GetTitledFirstName] has resonated across [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName]. Despite all odds, I was able to stand strong against all the legions and the formidable power of the Imperial fleet, laying waste upon the decadent rule of House [defeated_emperor.GetOnlyDynastyName]. \nSuch was my triumph that the people have started to compare me to Teuta, an ancient Queen who once stood against the ambitions of Rome, going even as far as to whisper that my prowess in this war is proof that I share some of my blood with her.
And why not? We have so much in common...
[Root.GetTitledFirstName] has claimed that [Root.GetHerHis] dynasty shares blood with Teuta, the Pirate-Queen of the Illyrians who stood tragically against the Roman Empire of old.
Nonsense! I have nothing in common with her.

As if the humiliation for our recent defeat at the hands of [From.GetTitledFirstName] was not a price steep enough to pay for the Empire, more barbarians are gathering around the banner of our enemy, emboldened by the recent success of their brethren. Their leader has started to spread ludicrous rumors about her ancestral ties to Queen Teuta, another rebellious Queen of Illyria of bygone times. \nWe must clean the stain of this failure from our reputation before it is too late...

The [defeated_emperor.PrimaryTitle.GetName] has recently suffered an ignominious defeat at the hands of [From.GetTitledFirstName]. Galvanized by their victory, the people of [From.PrimaryTitle.GetName] have started idolizing their [From.GetTitle], comparing [From.GetHerHim] to a ruler of their legends and claiming [From.GetHerHim] to have such a heroic ascendancy.\n Through her victory, the pagan tribes of old Illyria have discovered a new strength to stand against their Roman masters.
Enjoy your fleeting victory while you can!

Dozens of ships have gathered at the shores of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] from the most disparate owners – pirates, adventurers, mercenaries, fishermen... They have not forgotten how I protected them from the Empire in the past, and have all decided to pledge their allegiance to me by offering their help in the war effort.

Dozens of ships have gathered at the shores of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] from the most disparate owners – pirates, adventurers, mercenaries, fishermen... They have not forgotten how [pirate_bloodline_target.GetTitledFirstName] protected their forefathers from the Empire, and have all decided to pledge their allegiance to me by offering their help in the war effort.
お褒めには及びません！！

A few dozen ships have gathered at the shores of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] from the most disparate owners – pirates, adventurers, mercenaries, fishermen... It seems my name still holds some sway with the people. They have all decided to pledge their allegiance to me by offering their help in the war effort.

A few dozen ships have gathered at the shores of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] from the most disparate owners – pirates, adventurers, mercenaries, fishermen... It seems that the name of [pirate_bloodline_target.GetTitledFirstName] still holds some sway with the people. They have all decided to pledge their allegiance to me by offering their help in the war effort.

A few pirate ships have gathered at the shores of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName]. Their owners have offered their services in the war to come, hoping to repay me for offering them haven from the tyranny of the Imperial fleet of the Romans.

A few pirate ships have gathered at the shores of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName]. Their owners have offered their services in the war to come, hoping to repay my family for offering them haven from the tyranny of the Imperial fleet of the Romans.

[invited_lodge_soldier.Society.GetName]の有望な一員である[invited_lodge_soldier.GetFirstName]は、戦闘で[invited_lodge_soldier.GetHerHis]の才能を試し、私の側で戦う[invited_lodge_soldier.GetHerHis]の忠誠心を示し、[Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName]の敵に対して私の軍隊を率いることを熱望しています。
素晴らしい！誰と入れ替えるかは分かりきったことだ……
I expect great things from you, [invited_lodge_soldier.GetFirstName].
ようこそ、仲間の戦士よ！
Request help from your fellow [finnish_pagan_reformed.GetName] warriors against your enemies.
§Y策略§!メニューで、§Y[finnish_pagan_reformed.GetName]§!統治者は戦争中に部隊を要求する決断が可能になります。
A skilled §YCommander§! from [Root.Society.GetName] will arrive at your court.
A band of warriors will arrive at your capital.
Has NOT already requested help from §Y[Root.Society.GetName]§! for the current campaign

My brothers and sisters of [Root.Society.GetName] will gladly come to the help of a fellow [finnish_pagan_reformed.GetName] warrior in the time of need, rushing out of their sacred forests to prove their mettle and fight against the enemies of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName].
I need strong fighters to vanquish my foes!
I need staunch spear-men to defend my homeland!
I need swift riders to pursue my enemies!
Perhaps I do not need their assistance for now...
There are still semi-nomadic bands of warriors wandering in the wilderness of [Root.Capital.GetName], and their liege has decided to summon them to war.
Use your influence with [Root.Society.GetName] to gather any faithful fighters wandering in your realm.
§Y策略§!メニューで、§Y[tengri_pagan_reformed.GetName]§!統治者は領内の徴集を加速させる決断が可能になります。
You will receive a boost in §YPopulation§! and §YManpower§!
You will receive a boost in §YLevy Reinforcement§! rate
[Root.Society.GetName]が私の部隊を率いてくれたおかげで大勢の新兵が[Root.Capital.GetName]に集まり、羊飼いから戦士になった。彼らは私のために戦い、不滅の栄光を勝ち取っている。

The fervor of [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] runs still through the veins of the people of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName]. When called to action, they rush to their family weapons and ride to my banner, ready to show once more the strength and ruthlessness of their ancestors to all those who oppose us.
With the help of [Root.Society.GetName] and their mystics, you can achieve an otherworldly level of strength and clarity of intent, for a short period of time.
§Y策略§!メニューで、§Y[zun_pagan.GetName]§!統治者は限られた期間、軍事スキルが向上する戦闘狂になる決断が可能になります。
Has NOT recently entered a Battle Trance
Augment your §YMilitary§! skills for a limited amount of time, at the cost of your §YHealth§!.
As the [zun_pagan.GetName] mystics surround me, preparing my body and mind for the ritual, one of them asks me what do I wish to do with the power bestowed to me by [zun_pagan.GetHighGodName].
I wish to lead my troops to victory!
I wish to vanquish my enemies!
I wish to inspire my warriors to greatness!
On second thought, maybe this was a bad idea...
This character has made use of the ancient mystical knowledge of the Sun-worshipers to temporarily increase [Root.GetHerHis] military prowess.
This character has made use of the ancient mystical knowledge of the Sun-worshipers to temporarily increase [Root.GetHerHis] military prowess.

Ask for help from [Root.Society.GetName], hoping one of their warriors will assemble a band of mercenaries to aid you in your war.
§Y策略§!メニューで、§Y[slavic_pagan_reformed.GetName]§!統治者は戦争を遂行している時に戦士兵舎から援軍を要求する決断が可能になります。
Has NOT already requested help from §Y[Root.Society.GetName]§!
A member of the Lodge is willing to assist you

My brothers and sisters of [Root.Society.GetName] have heeded my call to action. [scoped_slavic_savior.GetTitledFirstName], a valiant follower of [scoped_slavic_savior.Religion.GetRandomGodName], has assembled a host of warriors to aid me in the ongoing war.
ようこそ！会えてうれしいよ！

[scoped_slavic_savior.GetFirstName] has been working restlessly to aid [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] win the war since [scoped_slavic_savior.GetHerHis] arrival. I must admit I have grown really fond of [scoped_slavic_savior.GetHerHim] in the past few days...
But does [scoped_slavic_savior.GetSheHe] love me back, I wonder?
I cannot distract [scoped_slavic_savior.GetHerHim] with this nonsense right now.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] has grown really fond of me since I joined [From.GetHerHis] campaign. It has come to the point where [From.GetSheHe] flat out admitted [From.GetHerHis] love for me openly.
I was happy to discover that [From.GetFirstName] shares my feeling for [From.GetHerHim]. Now that we are together, nothing will be able to stop us!
Unfortunately, [From.GetFirstName] admitted that [From.GetSheHe] does not shares my feelings for [From.GetHerHim].

[scoped_slavic_savior.GetFirstName] has been working restlessly to aid [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] win the war since [scoped_slavic_savior.GetHerHis] arrival. I could certainly use more fighters like [scoped_slavic_savior.GetHerHim] in my court...
Still, I shouldn't be too careless trusting a stranger...

この人物には、一目でわかる傷跡が残されています。
この人物は幾度もの戦いに貢献したようで、[Root.GetHerHis]の顔面がそれを物語っている。
Let my TRUE nature be revealed for all to see!
The frightful appearance of the Antichrist will become apparent to all.
この人物は人間性の皮も脱ぎ捨てその本性を顕にしました。
With the wicked ruler having been dealt with, the Pope has finally accepted to crown me [Root.GetTitle]. It is time to sheathe our weapons and let the celebrations begin.
This warrior has offered wealth and food to the gods, hoping to receive their divine favor in battle.
This warrior has offered a prized specimen from [Root.GetHerHis] livestock to the gods, hoping to receive their divine favor in battle.
This warrior has offered the life of one of [Root.GetHerHis] servants to the gods, hoping to receive their divine favor in battle.
This warrior has offered the life of one of [Root.GetHerHis] own family members to the gods, hoping to receive their divine favor in battle.
[Root.Society.GetName]の守護神に生贄を捧げ、戦の決意を固めます。
§Y策略§!メニューで、戦士団の祀る神へ富と血を捧げることで武勇を手に入れることが可能になります。
過去§Y10§!年間、§Y闘争の贄§!を捧げていない
神々のご利益を賜るため、供物をささげる。
我が館の神聖なる庇護者の方々より戦いの恩寵を賜る。それを望むのならば、彼の方々へと献身を見せねばならない。供物が貴重であればあるほど、来る戦争にて古き神々から与えられるだろう報いは、より強力なものとなるだろう。

Although I follow the teachings of [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName], giving to the old gods their due might help me in the coming wars. Their violent nature well fits my need for fierceness and savagery.
御身の歓喜がため、我が親族の肉と血を捧げましょう！
古き神々へと我が民を一人、生贄として捧げましょう。
我が家畜から、選りすぐりの一匹を捧げましょう！
I will immolate some of my best horses.
御身の稚気を鎮めるため、食物と財貨を捧げましょう。

小屋から二人の戦士が[scoped_war_sacrifice.GetFirstName]を[scoped_war_sacrifice.GetHerHis]が蹴ったり叫んだりするのを無視しながら外へ引きずり出した。聖職者たちが聖なる印を私の肌の下に刻むことで儀式の準備をしている間に、供物は最も高い木の最も太い枝から吊り下げられた。そして我々は、[scoped_war_sacrifice.GetFirstName]の痙攣する影の下で、古い神々に賛美歌を歌い始めた。

We ride for a few hours in the wilderness, leaving all signs of civilization behind us. Once we are alone, a pair of fellow warriors tie [scoped_war_sacrifice.GetFirstName] on the ground and I repeatedly trample [scoped_war_sacrifice.GetHerHim] with my horse while the priests beat their drums and chant around us. Once the offering has been made, the warriors paint my face and invoke the spirits' powers to protect me.

After leading [scoped_war_sacrifice.GetFirstName] in the woods, a few warriors and I start stalking [scoped_war_sacrifice.GetHerHim], our faces painted and our bodies covered in pelts. We run after our prey, howling the gods' names and throwing rocks at [scoped_war_sacrifice.GetHerHim]. In the end, after having surrounded [scoped_war_sacrifice.GetHerHim], we tear [scoped_war_sacrifice.GetHerHim] apart, offering [scoped_war_sacrifice.GetHerHis] flesh to the gods.

Under the maddening beating of the shamans' drums, the warriors bring [scoped_war_sacrifice.GetFirstName] forward. I approach [scoped_war_sacrifice.GetHerHim], my face inscribed with the sacred symbols, and carve a long cut through [scoped_war_sacrifice.GetHerHis] throat, grabbing [scoped_war_sacrifice.GetHerHim] by the head and showering the Lodge's totem with [scoped_war_sacrifice.GetHerHis] blood.

[scoped_war_sacrifice.GetFirstName] is driven by my fellow warriors to the top of the temple while the priests chant praises to the Sun and cover my face in golden dust. When the victim is brought to my feet, I plunge my blade through [scoped_war_sacrifice.GetHerHis] chest and carve out [scoped_war_sacrifice.GetHerHis] heart, offering it to the eternal aster

We meet in a secluded grove, a few warriors carrying my offering to the gods and a priest bringing all the sacred tools to officiate the rite. [scoped_war_sacrifice.GetFirstName] is stripped naked and cleaned. The warriors then bring [scoped_war_sacrifice.GetHerHim] whimpering to my feet, and I plunge my blade through [scoped_war_sacrifice.GetHerHis] neck, pushing it all the way to [scoped_war_sacrifice.GetHerHis] beating heart.
私の血はあなたの力となるだろう!

小屋から二人の戦士が[sacrificed_courtier.GetFirstName]を[sacrificed_courtier.GetHerHis]が蹴ったり叫んだりするのを無視しながら外へ引きずり出した。聖職者たちが聖なる印を私の肌の下に刻むことで儀式の準備をしている間に、供物は最も高い木の最も太い枝から吊り下げられた。そして我々は、[sacrificed_courtier.GetFirstName]の痙攣する影の下で、古い神々に賛美歌を歌い始めた。

Once the offering has been made, the warriors paint my face and invoke the spirits' powers to protect me.

We run after our prey, howling the gods' names and throwing rocks at [sacrificed_courtier.GetHerHim]. [sacrificed_courtier.GetFirstName] is driven by my fellow warriors to the top of the temple while the priests chant praises to the Sun and cover my face in golden dust. When the victim is brought to my feet, I plunge my blade through [sacrificed_courtier.GetHerHis] chest and carve out [sacrificed_courtier.GetHerHis] heart, offering it to the eternal aster.

We meet in a secluded grove, a few warriors carrying my offering to the gods and a priest bringing all the sacred tools to officiate the rite. [sacrificed_courtier.GetFirstName] is stripped naked and cleaned. The warriors then bring [sacrificed_courtier.GetHerHim] whimpering to my feet, and I plunge my blade through [sacrificed_courtier.GetHerHis] neck, pushing it all the way to [sacrificed_courtier.GetHerHis] beating heart.
私がこの行事にあたって直々に選んだ立派な生贄の家畜を押さえつけるために、何人かの仲間の戦士が手伝ってくれた。神官が唱えている間に私はその短剣を肉の奥深くに突き刺し、その血を私の顔に浴びるがままにした。私が向き直ると、神官たちは私の顔にいくつかの神聖なシンボルを血と泥で刻んだ。
この生贄は私に幸運をもたらすだろう!

My fellow warriors accompany me into the wilderness, helping me to carry my generous offering to the gods. When we are far from civilization, we bury the gold and burn the food. While a priest chants, invoking the protectors of the Lodge to bestow me their power, one of my fellow warriors inscribes a few symbols on my face.
[From.GetTitledFirstName]は、優秀なアスリートや剣闘士をまとめ上げ、[From.GetHerHis]の下で肉体労働を通して俊英を目指す結社、オリンポスの戦士団を作り上げた。\nこの結社は古代ギリシャ宗教の原則に基づいているが、その扉は規律を学び、指導者の教えに従うものであれば如何なる野蛮人にも開かれている。
オリンポスの戦士団を創立する

The Olympian Champions train hard and maintain an expert physique, not only for the purpose of battle, but for games of sport – participating is prestigious, and the most skillful of their community are adored by everyone, commoner and noble alike.
§Y戦士の結社§!である§Yオリンポスの戦士団§!を設立する。
この戦争において§Y[Root.Society.GetName]§!の一員として自らの旗を掲げ、団からの志願兵を募ることが出来ます。あなたが軍を率いている限り、定期的な補充がされます。
自分のポートレートを§G右クリック§!して、特殊な戦術が一時的に解除され、自身が直接率いている軍への戦士団からの召集軍を受け取ります。戦術や構成は§Y結社§!によって異なり、一度平和状態になれば、連帯は貴方の下を去るでしょう。
Ask your fellow warriors to join the fight.

This ruler is making use of [Root.GetHerHis] considerable influence to call fresh reinforcements from [Root.GetHerHis] Warrior Lodge in order to aid [Root.GetHerHim] in battle for as long as [Root.GetSheHe] is in command of [Root.GetHerHis] troops.
The valor and relentlessness of their liege has pushed many peasants to arm themselves against the enemies of the realm.
[Root.Society.GetName]の力を借りれれば、この戦いは勝ったも同然だ!すでに仲間の戦士たちは、戦場での勇敢さを示そうと、領国中から集まってきている。ほんの数ヶ月で敵を鉄と血で溺死させるだろう!
さあ、友人たちよ！不滅の栄光が、我らの勇気を待ちわびているぞ！
熱心な戦士たちが私に続いて栄光を勝ち取るために§Y[Root.Location.GetName]§!にて新しく加わった。

Reinforcements from [Root.Society.GetName] have been dwindling since a few weeks. The promise of eternal glory does no longer yield enough attraction to the remaining members of the Lodge. Perhaps some need another kind of persuasion...
§YReinforcements§! will resume for a while longer.
You will no longer receive more §YReinforcements§! until the end of the war.
What kind of warriors are you?!
I will share my loot with any who wish to join me!
I need no cowards in my army.
新しい部隊の中でも更に規律のないひよっ子どもは、私が戦利品を平等に共有していないと不満を言い始めた。彼らは彼らの考える正当な補償を要求しており、要求が拒否された時には私の軍隊を去ると脅している。
お前らには金を得る権利がある。
消えろ!お前らは不要だ!
私が戦で見せた勇猛さは、熟練した戦士たちだけを刺激したのではない。私の臣下の多くは敵に対して自分の価値を証明するために、[Root.Capital.GetName]に赴いた。
君たちの勇気には胸を打たれるが、これは君たちの戦いではない。
すばらしい!すぐに敵とまみえるだろう!
補給線の手助けになる。
新兵の中には脱退する者もいるでしょう。
男性は寺院領を保有できない
あまり良い考えとは思えなかった...
あなたの行動に対する§Y臣民§!の反応は、芳しくないでしょう。
§Rこの宗教は宣教活動に反対します§!
Enlist the help of the Lodge's shamans to imbue a precious artifact with a warrior spirit that will increase your prowess on the field of battle.
§Y策略§!メニューで、§Y[west_african_pagan_reformed.GetName]§!統治者は戦闘の腕を向上させる特別な仮面や偶像を作成する決断が可能になります。。
Is NOT already supervising the creation of a fetish
Does NOT already own a Mask and an Idol
新しい§Y宝物§!の作成を開始します。
希少な木材に勇気と優しさの真髄を込めて制作された勇壮な面頬です。
希少な木材に暴虐と恐怖の真髄を込めて制作された勇壮な面頬です。
希少な木材を用いて制作され、不屈で頑固な精神の真髄が込められたトーテムの面頬です。
希少な木材を用いて制作され、冷酷で貪欲な精神の真髄が込められたトーテムの面頬です。
希少な木材を用いて制作され、トリックスターの本質の真髄が込められたトーテムの面頬です。

希少な木材を用いて制作され、霊妙で刹那の精神の真髄が込められたトーテムの面頬です。
A priceless totem representing the guardian spirit of a notable tribe, favored by the gods of war.
名高き部族の守護霊を象った貴重な偶像で、戦争の神々に愛されています。
A wooden tube filled with small pebbles and enchanted with ancient spirit-magic.
The shamans from [Root.Society.GetName] quickly explain to me how, before deciding what kind of spirit I wish to trap, we must determine what sort of fetish I am trying to create...

The shamans of [Root.Society.GetName] have completed the preliminary work for my spirit-mask. Before moving onto the sacred carving, they need to know how much am I willing to invest in the creation of this artifact. A mask carved from rarer woods and imbued with sacred oils will be capable to channel more powerful spirits.
The shamans will carve a §YGreat Spirit-Mask§!
This is as much as I am willing to spend...
The shamans will carve a §YRegular Spirit-Mask§!
What is wrong with regular wood?
The shamans will carve a §YSimple Spirit-Mask§!

The shamans of [Root.Society.GetName] have completed the preliminary work for my idol. The only thing that I have left to tell them is what sort of spirit do I wish to curry the favor of and how much I am willing to invest in the rare resources needed to craft the artifact.
A priced totem to channel the cunning of a Trickster!
The shamans will craft a §YCarved Totem§! containing the essence of a Trickster, which will increase the speed and unpredictability of your warriors.
An ivory idol to channel the resolve of a Howler!
The shamans will craft an §YIvory Idol§! containing a howling spirit which will fill you with strength and rage towards the enemies of your tribe.
A wooden rod will do fine.
The shamans will craft a §YRainstick§! that will help you adapt the battlefield to your needs.

My new mask is nearly complete. The only thing that is left for the shamans to do is fill it with a powerful spirit that will inspire me whenever I wear it, giving me with the strength and determination I need to crush my enemies.
I wish you to summon a benevolent spirit.
The shamans will craft a §YSpirit-Mask of Bravery§! that will inspire your troops, increasing their defensive capabilities.
I wish you to summon a malevolent spirit.
The shamans will craft a §YSpirit-Mask of Terror§! that will scare your enemies and fill your troops with a thirst for blood.

My new mask is nearly complete. The only thing that is left for the shamans to do is fill it with a spirit that will inspire me whenever I wear it, giving me with the strength and determination I need to defeat my enemies.
I wish you to summon a brave spirit.
The shamans will craft a §YSpirit-Mask of Determination§! that will increase the defensive capabilities of your troops and make them relentless when assaulting enemy strongholds.
I wish you to summon a ruthless spirit.
The shamans will craft a §YSpirit-Mask of Ruthlessness§! that will fill your troops with a thirst for blood.
I wish you to summon a Trickster.
The shamans will craft a §YSpirit-Mask of Trickery§! that will give your armies an unpredictable edge on the field.
My new mask is nearly complete. The only thing that is left for the shamans to do is fill it with a spirit that will inspire me whenever I wear it, giving me a bit more strength and determination.
I wish you to summon a resentful spirit.
The shamans will craft a §YSpirit-Mask of Anger§! that will fill your troops with a thirst for blood.
I wish you to summon an unwavering spirit.
The shamans will craft a §YSpirit-Mask of Staunchness§! that will increase the defensive capabilities of your troops.
I wish you to summon a fleeting spirit.
The shamans will craft a §YSpirit-Mask of Flight§! that will grant your armies uncanny speed on the battlefield.

As the last symbols are painted upon the carved surface of the totem, the shamans sings their spells around it, binding the Trickster spirit inside the sacred wood, so that it might serve me and my descendants for generations to come.
This spirit will protect the [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName] tribe from now on.

I spend the entire night awake, tormented by the yells of the shamans chanting their spells to entrap a spirit in my new idol. At dawn, the tired old men present me with the ivory artifact, now imbued with its vengeful new guest. The shamans assure me that I will be able to turn the power inside it against my enemies and that the spirit will faithfully serve all of my descendants.

After giving me my new magic staff, the shamans take some time to explain to me how I will be able to summon winds and rain and control the very heavens by properly channeling the powers contained within this precious artifact.
Is it supposed to make all this noise?

As some of the shamans paint the final symbols on the large wooden mask, the smoke of the many offerings fills the air and the magic chants resonate through the field, the spirit is bound to the artifact, imbuing it with arcane power. The shamans offer me the mask, assuring me that I will be able to make use of its magic by wearing it in battle.
我が軍は誰にも止められない！
Your §YMask of Bravery§! is finally ready.

As some of the shamans paint the final symbols on the large wooden mask, the smoke of the many offerings fills the air and the magic chants resonate through the field, the spirit is bound to the artifact, imbuing it with arcane power. The shamans offer me the mask, assuring me that I will be able to make use of its magic by wearing it in battle.
Let my foes tremble at my sight!
Your §YMask of Terror§! is finally ready.

The shamans carve the final details on the surface of the mask, whispering ancient spells to bind the ethereal spirit to it for centuries to come. When they are satisfied with their work, they turn around and offer me the artifact, assuring me that I will be able to access to its power by wearing it in battle.
My family will treasure this gift forever.
Your §YMask of Determination§! is finally ready.

The shamans carve the final details on the surface of the mask, whispering ancient spells to bind the ethereal spirit to it for centuries to come. When they are satisfied with their work, they turn around and offer me the artifact, assuring me that I will be able to access to its power by wearing it in battle.
My enemies will learn to fear the blood of [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName]!
Your §YMask of Ruthlessness§! is finally ready.

The shamans carve the final details on the surface of the mask, whispering ancient spells to bind the ethereal spirit to it for centuries to come. When they are satisfied with their work, they turn around and offer me the artifact, assuring me that I will be able to access to its power by wearing it in battle.
Your §YMask of Trickery§! is finally ready.

The shamans' work has finally born its fruits. My new mask is ready, filled with the essence of an ancient spirit which the shamans assure me will grant me a portion of its power to use against my enemies.
Your §YMask of Anger§! is finally ready.

The shamans' work has finally born its fruits. My new mask is ready, filled with the essence of an ancient spirit which the shamans assure me will grant me a portion of its power to use against my enemies.
I already feel its energy coursing through my veins!
Your §YMask of Staunchness§! is finally ready.

The shamans' work has finally born its fruits. My new mask is ready, filled with the essence of an ancient spirit which the shamans assure me will grant me a portion of its power to use against my enemies.
Your §YMask of Flight§! is finally ready.

[This.GetTitledFirstName]は空の宝物庫に入れる宝物を欲しがっている。
