この野心を達成するには、あなたは友人を作る必要があります。
This character has recently proven themselves to be quite popular.
強大な血脈が世界中に幾つか生成されます。
特別な宝物が世界中に幾つか生成されます。
この剣は名前を付けられたまさしくその星から落ちてきたものだといわれています。
この剣は名前を付けられたまさしくその星から落ちてきたものだといわれています。
この刃はその名を授けた同名の人の特質によって呪われており、不浄だが強力な武器だ。
この剣は神を信じぬ者どもと戦うのを助けるために天から遣わされたものだと言われている。
この剣はその名を授けた同名の都市を千回も守り、これからも千回守り続けるだろうと言われている。
This blade was said to have belonged to an adherent who lost their way.
The Holiest blade, a shining example of this faiths righteousness.
この鎧は名前に示される星から降ってきた金属で作られたといわれています。
この鎧は名前に示される星から降ってきた金属で作られたといわれています。
This armor was made in the very image of its namesake and is thus frightening to behold.
This armor is apparently a gift from above, blessed by the almighty, the shining plates setting it apart from normal mortal armor.
This armor is the most famous example of this cultures craftsmanship, the resources put into alone make it near priceless.
This armor is styled after the beast it is named for. The helmet in particular is very impressive.
完璧なボードゲームの制作に一生を捧げた人物について記された、貴重な書物。かの人物はその働きの中で当然のごとく狂気に走ったという。
壮麗な箱の中にはミイラ化した太古の怪物――あるいは少なくとも何らかの生物――の心臓が収められている。
頑丈な箱に収められた小瓶には、太古の怪物の血が入っているという。近くにいるだけで再生の力が得られるということである。
頑丈な箱に収められた小瓶には、太古の怪物の血が入っているという。近くにいるだけで再生の力が得られるということである。
この目は古く強大な怪物のものであり、それを打ち倒した英雄によってえぐり出されたといわれている。
この目は古く強大な怪物のものであり、それを打ち倒した英雄によってえぐり出されたといわれている。
預言者ムハンマドは、アル・アブド、アッマスール、アル・バッタル、ハトフ、クァルイー、ドゥールッ・ファカル、アル・ミクダム、アル・カディブの九つの剣を持っていました。この宝石がちりばめられた素晴らしい剣はその一つです。
空が少しのあいだ明るくなり、空から降ってきた石が城の庭に激突した衝撃で大地が揺れた。家臣たちに調べに行かせたところ、今まで誰も見たことのないような奇妙な金属の塊をもって戻ってきた。
この金属で、まさに伝説になるような剣を作ってやろう！
これは[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]からの贈り物だな。教会に置くべきだ。
ただの金属だな。さっさと売ってしまえ。
あなたはこの金属を使って鍛冶師に武器を鍛造させます。
空から落ちてきた金属で造られた剣。神からの贈り物だと言う者もいます。
私の庭に空から来た巨大な石が姿を現してから数週間が経ち、あの金属を使って造るよう命じていた武器が仕上がった。この剣はなんとも不思議なものに思える。はるか遠くの天上より来たものが、今やこの私の手中にあるのだ！
これは本当に素晴らしい武器だ。
アイスランド北部沿岸
アイスランド南部沿岸
信じられないほど貧しい
この不毛の荒野には人はまばらにしか住んでいない。
バイキングの時代が始まった
適切な[Root.Culture.GetName]の多くの氏族たちをアイルランドに入植させる
アイスランドへの入植
[Root.Culture.GetName]の探検隊は海を渡り、新しい島を発見してそれを「アイスランド」と名付けた。その名に反して、この島は定住するのにもってこいのようだ。私ははるばる海を渡って入植者を送り込むための船を用意するべきだろう。他の[Root.Religion.GetName]教徒の[Root.GetTitle]が同じことを考える前にだ！

アイスランドはその不吉な名前にも関わらず、非常に肥沃なところであるとわかった。今この時までこの島にはわずかな隠者が住んでいただけでであったが、もはやそうではない。その沿岸では[settler_of_iceland_target.GetFullName]の後押しで用意された船と建築資材とともに、多くの[settler_of_iceland_target.Culture.GetName]の入植者が新たな生活を求めて群れをなしている。[left_iceland_target.GetFullName]と[left_iceland_target.GetHerHis]に従う者たちは嫌気がさして島を去り、そのかつての故郷を目指して南へと向かった。
§Gこの宗教の信者は基礎的な「学識」値が+2増えます§!
今日、市場にて貧相な乞食が硬貨で一杯の器を手に、酒を求めて居酒屋へ向かっているのを見かけた。やはり博愛精神など無意味なのではなかろうか。
もう寄付なんかごめんだ！
馬鹿げてるとしか思えないが、それでも受け入れていかなければ。

Rejecting what they believe to be propaganda from [GetRandomEvilGodName], followers of the [GetName] faith ignore the word of the [GetPriestTitle]s. When hearing any passage from [GetScriptureName] read out loud, they instantly stuff their ears with parsley which each follower keeps with them in a sacred pouch. In honor of [GetHighGodName], every meal during religious holidays is prepared with abundant quantities of parsley.

Followers of the [GetName] religion hold the belief that every third passage of [GetScriptureName] is written by [GetRandomEvilGodName], much to the dismay of adherents to the parent religion. Fanatics often write down the offending passages on rocks, which they subsequently throw at the houses of those they perceive to be heretics or heathens.

Cold nights are cherished by followers of the [GetName] religion, who hold the belief that the touch of [GetHighGodName] is as icy as the deepest winter. As [GetScriptureName] makes no mention of this, [GetPriestTitle]s of their parent faith deem such rituals heretical and inspired by the gospel of [GetRandomEvilGodName].

The [GetPriestTitle]s of the [GetName] faith argue that their way of worship is not only the correct way, but also much older than that of more traditional believers. For millenia the [GetName] faith thrived, until a tiny sect of lunatics broke away to form new branches of the religion – or so [GetName] [GetPriestTitle]s claim. A defining feature of the faith is that the private lives of [GetPriestTitle]s must remain completely secret, which often see them wearing disguises when not tending to their flocks.

The [GetName] faith believes that [GetScriptureName] should be available to all, and not just for the [GetPriestTitle]s to interpret. They therefore produce numerous copies of [GetScriptureName], localized into several languages. Many of these copies hold changes introduced by less than scrupulous [GetPriestTitle]s, which is a contributing reason to [GetName] followers being seen as heretical.

Followers of the [GetName] faith share many similarities between themselves and those of their parent faith. In fact, [GetPriestTitle]s from both sides have been unable to find a single practical difference between the two sects – they both hold [GetScriptureName] in high regard, praise [GetHighGodName] in the correct way and fear the retribution of [GetRandomEvilGodName]. Still, followers of the [GetName] faith claim themselves to be heretics, and ardently so.

The [GetPriestTitle]s of the [GetName] religion often openly preach in the street and in public buildings, and are often ridiculed and spat on by those who do not ascribe to their somewhat ridiculous interpretation of [GetScriptureName]. In the minds of [GetName] worshipers, the text of [GetScriptureName] needs to be simplified to such a degree that a child could understand all of it, and they often rewrite the various passages to be comprehensible for even the most simple-minded person – something which obviously draws the ire of the more hard-line worshipers.

The [GetName] faith incorporates many elements of other religions. Several rites outlined in the [hindu.GetName] holy text ([hindu.GetScriptureName]) are part of everyday worship, and the behaviours of [jain.GetName] [jain.GetPriestTitle]s are emulated by [GetName] [GetPriestTitle]s. While their own holy text, [GetScriptureName], is still held in the highest regard, a lot of emphasis is put on the necessity for [GetPriestTitle]s to interpret other holy texts.

Those who adhere to the [GetName] faith believe that an eternal war is being waged between [GetHighGodName] and all the gods and goddesses of other religions. Followers actively support this war by carving idols of all the foreign gods, which they subsequently burn in ritualistic bonfires.

[GetScriptureName] can be interpreted in many different ways, or so the [GetName] faithful claim. Their [GetPriestTitle]s make many bold claims, and they often conflict – one [GetPriestTitle] might claim [GetHighGodName] to be warlike one day, while another [GetPriestTitle] claims [GetHighGodName] to be championing peace the next. Their [GetPriestTitle]s often gather in grand cabals to discuss which interpretation is the right one, which leads followers of their parent religion to often accuse them of being witches or warlocks.

The [GetName] faith is an offshoot branch with a radically different interpretation of [GetScriptureName]. Their [GetPriestTitle]s constantly debate the validity of various passages, drawing much ire from the mainstream followers. In their interpretation of the scripture, [GetHighGodName] is overtly warlike and unsympathetic, but their practices are otherwise very similar to those of the main branch.

The religious leadership of the [GetName] faith forbid anyone from reading [GetScriptureName], even themselves. They believe the texts to simply be too sacred for anyone to see – instead the [GetPriestTitle]s themselves dictate what adherents should and should not do. Their [GetPriestTitle]s also claim that anyone not following their commands will have their souls eaten by [GetRandomEvilGodName] as they die.

In the [GetName] faith followers not only adhere to the teachings of [GetScriptureName], but also look to other religions for guidance. Alongside their own scripture, they also read passages from the holy texts of the [norse_pagan.GetName] and [buddhist.GetName] faiths. This practice condemn the [GetName] faithful in the eyes of many [GetPriestTitle]s.

Followers of the [GetName] faith act and behave much like the adherents of their parent religion, though with one major difference. All religious practices are performed in reverse order, as they believe the chronology of [GetScriptureName] to have been tampered with by [GetRandomEvilGodName].

The [GetName] faith is an ultra-orthodox branch of fanatical zealots. Adherents do not tolerate any deviance from the word of [GetScriptureName], subscribing to a very literal interpretation rather than the more relaxed one of their peers. They believe this to be the only way to truly please [GetHighGodName].

For followers of the [GetName] faith, the number ten is of paramount importance. Rituals are always performed by ten [GetPriestTitle]s, every sermon touches upon ten passages from [GetScriptureName] and truly ardent worshipers pray to [GetHighGodName] ten times per day. They also believe that [GetRandomEvilGodName] is, in fact, ten separate entities.

Generally, followers of the [GetName] faith are much more relaxed about their rites and methods of worship than the followers of the orthodox branch. Their [GetPriestTitle]s claim that the battle against [GetRandomEvilGodName] is already lost, and that there is no path to salvation. This nihilistic outlook cause many followers to take the name of [GetHighGodName] in vain, which angers more devout worshipers.

Unlike the main branch, worshipers of the [GetName] faith do not believe [GetScriptureName] hold the absolute truth. Followers prefer oral traditions, where [GetPriestTitle]s travel far and wide in order to share their wisdom with other [GetPriestTitle]s.

The [GetName] faith, unlike its parent faith, has a very strict caste hierarchy pertaining [GetPriestTitle]s. Internally, [GetPriestTitle]s are organized into five separate ranks, each owing full loyalty to their superiors. Their flocks are also organized into five separate groupings, with the recent converts and cynical worshipers being tended to by the lowest-ranking [GetPriestTitle]s.

Followers of the [GetName] faith are deemed cursed by adherents of their parent faith. The reason for why this belief is so ingrained and unshakable has been lost to time. The most common claim is that they are spawn of [GetRandomEvilGodName], who spit on [GetScriptureName]. Adherents of the [GetName] faith do not ascribe to this interpretation, as they themselves believe spit to be a blessed tool provided by [GetHighGodName].

The [GetName] faith is as old as the world itself. Their deity, known only as [GetHighGodName], is said to have created the world for the [GetName] faithful to live and thrive in, by condition that they follow the rules set in [GetScriptureName]. [GetScriptureName] was passed directly from [GetHighGodName] to the first [GetName] prophet. Followers also believe that [GetRandomEvilGodName], and an army of dreaded heretics and heathens, seek to undo the entirety of creation and doom the [GetName] faithful to eternal darkness.

In the [GetName] religion [GetScriptureName] tells the story of [GetHighGodName] whose arm was cruelly cut off by [GetRandomEvilGodName] – the pieces of their arm became the land and their blood the sea, creating the world as we know it. Their [GetPriestTitle]s sometimes cut off parts of their own body in an attempt to be closer to [GetHighGodName].

Eons ago, all creatures were united on a single land that spanned infinitely towards the horizons. They lived under a soft light that allowed the lushest grass and the sweetest of fruit to grow. But one day, for reasons and from origins unfathomable by mere mortals, [GetRandomEvilGodName] arrived and shook the very essence of the universe, splitting the lands, scorching the earth and disuniting mortals. Nearly everything was consumed by the infinite darkness still visible at night, except for the land miraculously protected by [GetHighGodName]. The faithful have recorded the history of the world in [GetScriptureName], so they may never forget that they owe their very existence to the benevolence and power of [GetHighGodName].

In the [GetName] faith it is believed that this is the eighteenth cycle that the World has gone through. In every cycle, [GetHighGodName], protector of Life and Light, fiercely battles [GetRandomEvilGodName], feeding on Death and Darkness. As stated in [GetScriptureName], the only way to prevent [GetRandomEvilGodName] from destroying the universe and starting another cycle, is to grant [GetHighGodName] energy through specific rituals, such as always having three candles lit during moonless nights, or celebrating with family every day before, and after, a full moon.

According to [GetScriptureName], when a person dies, their soul becomes ripe for the taking by the Reapers who will bring it to [GetRandomEvilGodName], who will then devour and assimilate them, to quench an insatiable hunger that has lasted since the dawn of time. Only burying the bodies can protect the souls and allow them to safely travel down to the Underworld, the realm of [GetHighGodName], allowing them to come back to earth as guardian spirits who help their descendants and fend off the Reapers.

The [GetPriestTitle]s tell of a time immemorial, when gods and mortals lived together on Earth – the latter as slaves and playthings to the first. After many sunsets, one mortal had enough of this servitude and rose against the foul gods, driving the billions of other mortals to stand with him in a fight for their freedom. In the end, the gods were driven out, repelled to the far confines of the universe, where their remains amalgamated through rage and vengeance, into what we now call [GetRandomEvilGodName]. The rebellious mortal himself was drenched in divine blood, becoming [GetHighGodName], a godlike entity, as strong as the will of all mortals on Earth. In the well protected [GetScriptureName], it says that the remnants of the evil gods draw closer to their lost realm every time a mortal indulges in corruption or decadent behavior, and that only bravery and willpower can wake [GetHighGodName] to protect reality from certain doom.

The [GetName] faith started a long time ago, when a hunter in a now forgotten forest followed a purple feathered bird with large wings to a glade in the heart of the woods. There [GetScriptureName] lay between five trees with golden leaves. The scripture recounted how this forest was the resting place of [GetHighGodName], an entity that had created the world at the cost of its life, after confronting [GetRandomEvilGodName]. Since then, the [GetPriestTitle]s have spread the word in gratitude of [GetHighGodName], to whom they show respect by venerating nature and by burying their dead along with the branch of a tree, allowing them to reunite with their creator.

The [GetName] faith is a rather recent one, founded by the charismatic first [GetPriestTitle], who detailed in length how human beings need to follow certain strict rules of life recorded in [GetScriptureName], lest they be forever doomed to suffer eternal pain at the hands of [GetRandomEvilGodName]. As he drew close to death, the [GetPriestTitle] warned that his good followers were still at risk, due to the numerous masses of wicked heathens performing decadent rituals and increasing [GetRandomEvilGodName]'s influence. The only way he could help protect them was by discarding his mortal coil and ascend to a new form – thus he became [GetHighGodName].

The [GetName] faith is one founded upon fear – their clergy hold terrifying masses, where they recite passages from [GetScriptureName] telling of how [GetRandomEvilGodName] will crack the world open like an egg. Despite followers constantly fearing for their souls, they find brief solace in the stories told about their main deity, [GetHighGodName]. These stories are not often told, and only the most brave [GetPriestTitle]s dare recite them in public.

It is said that the first [GetPriestTitle] was the patriarch of a small tribe who lived on boats out on the endless sea. One day, all the fish in the ocean vanished – eaten by [GetRandomEvilGodName]! Just as the small tribe was on the brink of starvation, [GetHighGodName] appeared before them. The first [GetPriestTitle] pleaded to [GetHighGodName] for salvation, and [GetHighGodName] in response created the land, the trees and all the animals of the forests so that the tribe would not starve. Grateful, the first [GetPriestTitle] created [GetScriptureName] to record all the divine things that [GetHighGodName] had created.

The [GetName] religion is focused upon the practice of ritualistic hunts. All their holidays involve hunts in one form or another, with various quarry being the target of each one. In their religion [GetHighGodName] is a great hunter, and [GetRandomEvilGodName] the prey. Their holy text, [GetScriptureName], detail exactly how each hunt should be performed in meticulous detail.

The [GetName] faith has a particular focus on funerary rites. When an elder dies, they are flayed and their skin fashioned into a religious object such as the cover of a book or a ceremonial mask. Their holy text, [GetScriptureName], tells the story of [GetHighGodName], flayed and buried a hundred times by [GetRandomEvilGodName]. Funerals are always led by at least two [GetPriestTitle]s, one who performs the flaying and one who ensures everything is done to code.

The [GetName] faith is one based largely upon the sense of touch, with adherents locking hands and holding each others shoulders during prayers. Worshipers frequently embrace the [GetPriestTitle]s both before and after a religious ceremony. To bless someone, a [GetPriestTitle] must embrace and lift the chosen one towards the sky – so that [GetHighGodName] may reach down and touch their souls. Their holy text, [GetScriptureName], outlines the jealousy borne by the main enemy of [GetHighGodName] – [GetRandomEvilGodName], the one who must not be touched.

Temples belonging to the [GetName] faith are a spectacle to behold – covered from top to bottom in elaborate wooden carvings, every one of them looks like a work of art. It is said that a woodcarver once started to carve a face into a stump, but was interrupted halfway through. He then started carving a new face into another stump, and when he was finished it sprung to life in the form of [GetHighGodName]. The woodcarver was blessed by [GetHighGodName], and given [GetScriptureName] to keep safe. The half-carved stump he had previously abandoned then sprung to life in the form of [GetRandomEvilGodName], who proceeded to chase the carver out of the forest.

Adherents of the [GetName] faith reject the notion of individuality, believing instead that all are joined in one grand consciousness. In the center of this collective mind lies [GetHighGodName], sleeping. Stories in [GetScriptureName] claim that only [GetRandomEvilGodName] can awaken [GetHighGodName]. [GetName] [GetPriestTitle]s therefore organize a search every year, with an ultimate goal to locate the cave in which [GetRandomEvilGodName] resides.

The [GetName] faithful do not believe this world to be the 'true' world. Their [GetPriestTitle]s say that it is but a shadow of the real world – a world which can only be accessed by pleasing [GetHighGodName]s every command. The rules that must be followed are outlined in [GetScriptureName], with [GetPriestTitle]s standing constant guard over where the texts are kept. They believe that [GetRandomEvilGodName] is always watching, ready to corrupt the texts as soon as they are left out of sight.

In the [GetName] faith ceremonial dance is seen as the most important aspect of worship. Both men and women meet together to dance, preceded by a host of [GetPriestTitle]s. Song and music are always present, and the sung texts are often directly quoted from [GetScriptureName]. Their holy text, [GetScriptureName], tells the story of the great love between [GetHighGodName] and [GetRandomEvilGodName]. It is said that before their falling out, [GetHighGodName] and [GetRandomEvilGodName] danced together constantly. As they left each others side, night and day was created.

Those practicing the [GetName] faith spend a lot of time deep in thought, and their [GetPriestTitle]s spend almost all their lives in contemplation. Their holy text, [GetScriptureName], contains limitless dates and countless numbers of importance, all telling their own story of the future of the world. Interpreting these numbers is a complex task, and new connections are made almost every year. It is said that the truth has been hidden behind complex formulas by [GetHighGodName]. This truth hides the secret to not being ripped apart for eternity by [GetRandomEvilGodName] in the afterlife.

The [GetName] faith was founded when the first [GetPriestTitle] got a revelation from [GetHighGodName]. By using her own blood, the [GetPriestTitle] penned [GetScriptureName] and passed it on to her followers. Since then, many other [GetPriestTitle]s have had revelations, though all of them about [GetRandomEvilGodName] and how the world will end.

The foundation of the [GetName] faith is shrouded in mystery, and [GetScriptureName] does not make mention of their origins. Followers argue that the [GetName] faith has always existed, and that anyone claiming otherwise is an agent of [GetRandomEvilGodName]. Their [GetPriestTitle]s enforce this notion rather vigorously, threatening that the wrath of their supreme diety will strike unbelievers down - [GetHighGodName], riding a mighty chariot across the night sky.

It is said that the seven prophets of the [GetName] faith stayed up for seven days and seven nights when they were revealed [GetScriptureName] from [GetHighGodName]. After the completion of [GetScriptureName], six of them were uplifted to join [GetHighGodName] while one was doomed to spend eternity with [GetRandomEvilGodName]. [GetName] [GetPriestTitle]s thus condemn the number seven.

In the beginning there was only fire, and out of that fire [GetHighGodName] forged the world. The [GetPriestTitle]s of the [GetName] faithful continually write down visions they have of [GetHighGodName] in [GetScriptureName]. At times, one such story may be deemed heretical, and is subsequently burned. The [GetPriestTitle] who wrote down the offending text is often believed to be under the influence of [GetRandomEvilGodName], and is such likely to be burned alongside the heretical pages.

The [GetName] faith is an amalgamation of many other religions. There are several ways which followers may worship [GetHighGodName], all of them equally legitimate. Some even worship [GetRandomEvilGodName] alongside [GetHighGodName]. It is said that somewhere in the world ten [GetPriestTitle]s guard [GetScriptureName], of which only fragments are known even to the most devout followers.

The [GetName] faith is very strict, with [GetPriestTitle]s constantly requiring followers to cite passages from [GetScriptureName]. If a follower would fail to cite three passages in a row, they are punished and deemed corrupted by [GetRandomEvilGodName]. Fortunately [GetScriptureName] contains only twelve passages, spread out over four pages – proving the mercy of [GetHighGodName] once again.

The [GetName] faith is very peculiar in that sermons are always sung. The [GetPriestTitle]s are picked among followers based on the tone of their voice, as their diety [GetHighGodName] is said to have conveyed [GetScriptureName] entirely through divine song. The main enemy of [GetHighGodName] is [GetRandomEvilGodName], who cannot sing. Mute people are deemed cursed by [GetRandomEvilGodName], and are often excluded from mass.

The followers of the [GetName] faith believe that all the world is but a game between [GetHighGodName] and [GetRandomEvilGodName]. Due to this a lot of their religious rites and worship are centered around a complex board game, with the most successful players becoming [GetPriestTitle]s. The rules of this sacred game are recorded in [GetScriptureName].
ウィーナー・ノイシュタット
クロスターノイブルク
ザンクト・エングルマール
チヴィテッラ・デル・ヴェスコーヴォ
サン・ジュゼッペ・イアート

この人物は決闘から何かしら得るところがありました。
この人物は数多くの決闘を経て、不朽の武名を打ち立てました。
あなたの§Y決闘の名誉§!を増加させる\n
あなたの§Y戦場の経験§!を増加させる\n
この人物は戦闘から何かしら得るところがありました。
It is one thing to know strategy from the comfort of the war room, having first-hand experience is another one entirely. This character has seen plenty of plans unfold on the battlefield.

I truly enjoy a good duel. There is nothing I desire more than to challenge and win against the greatest fighters of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName], except perhaps winning glory in personal combat against my enemies... Perhaps I should dedicate my life to this pursuit?
I shall become the greatest duelist [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] has ever known!
No, I have a realm to attend to.

After having studied the strategies of both my own side, as well as those of my enemies, I feel confident that I have gathered enough knowledge to truly consider myself a battlefield strategist. I feel compelled to spend my life doing this, but is it a worthy pastime for a [Root.GetTitle]?
No, I have a realm to attend to.

The sudden expulsion of several important [jewish.GetName] merchants has done some damage to the economy of your realm. It would seem they played a bigger role in the economic development of [Root.Capital.GetName] than your advisors gave them credit for.
This land is poor and sparsely populated. I should spend some of my wealth in order to settle the area with some proper [From.Culture.GetName] [From.Religion.GetName] families!
[indian_group.GetGroupName]宗教に属する宗教の信者は信じる宗派を変えることができます。ただしそのような選択は一生に一度しかできません。
The other religions interest me more.
[hindu.GetName]の信仰はシヴァ派、ヴィシュヌ派、シャクティ派、スマールタ派の4つの伝統がある。新たな道を選ぶと決めたが、どれにするか？
ヴィシュヌ派になろう。
シャクティ派になろう。
スマルータ派になろう。
[hindu.GetName]の教えは多様な宗教であり、主要な宗派だけでもシヴァ派、ヴィシュヌ派、シャクティ派、スマールタ派の4つがあります。改宗の際にはそのどれかを選ばなければなりません。
[buddhist.GetName] tradition principally follows three main branches: Mahayana, Vajrayana and Theravada. As you convert, you must choose one of them.
[jain.GetName]の教えは長い伝統を持つ宗教で裸行派と白衣派の2つの宗派があります。改宗の際にはそのどれかを選ばなければなりません。
[hindu.GetName]の教えはシヴァ派、ヴィシュヌ派、シャクティ派、スマールタ派の4つの伝統がある。新たな道を選ぶと決めたが、どれにするか？
[buddhist.GetName]の教えは大乗仏教、密教、上座部仏教の3つに分かれている。新たな哲学を追求すると決めたが、どれにするか？
[jain.GetName]の教えには裸行派と白衣派の二つの流派があります。あなたは古い殻を脱ぎ捨て、新しい道へ踏み出すことを決断しました。
これから私は裸行派だ。
これから私は白衣派だ。

The §YLeader§! of a society is responsible for its integrity and also often manages members of lower ranks. The leader regulates promotions between ranks, handles membership applications and hands out tasks to lower-ranking members. In certain cases there can exist more than one leader, in which case the most senior one is shown above.
能力：§Y[GetDharmic]の叡智§!\n時間の経過とともに邪悪な特性を失い、敬虔な特性を獲得します。
自分自身を[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]に近づけ、罪を悔い改めるために、人里離れた苦行をしなければなりません。[Root.Religion.GetScriptureName]を読んで、[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]に祈り、人生とふるまいを見つめなおしてください。あなたはこの間、簡素に暮らして、俗世から遮断されなければなりません。
この血脈は男系を通じて伝わります。これは男性のみがその血脈を子孫に伝えられることを意味します。
この血脈は女系を通じて伝わります。これは女性のみがその血脈を子孫に伝えられることを意味します。
通常の血脈の継承に加えて、母系結婚をしていた場合にその子供たちは、母親から父系の血脈を、父親から母系の血脈を継承します。\n子供に父親がおらず、母親が父系の血脈を持っている場合、その子供はそれを継承します。
改革派[tengri_pagan_reformed.GetName]信者からの評価

Bored, I decide to sneak out onto the streets of [child_of_destiny.Location.County.GetName]. I suddenly hear a voice. "Ah, young [child_of_destiny.GetPrincessPrince] [child_of_destiny.GetFirstName]!" It is an old [wise_man_target.GetManWoman], overburdened with books. "I am [wise_man_target.GetFirstName]. The stars have given me a quest – to teach you about the world and the mind of man." [wise_man_target.GetSheHeCap] holds out two books. "Our time is limited, which tome should we study?"
Virtute Animi, I want to lead and inspire!
Dominus Omnium, my future realm shall prosper!

My servants apparently lost track of [child_of_destiny.GetFirstName] today, and it took hours to locate [child_of_destiny.GetHerHim]! [child_of_destiny.GetSheHeCap] was found in the nick of time, just before I was about to order a full-scale search. When they found [child_of_destiny.GetHerHim] [child_of_destiny.GetSheHe] was reading a book no one had ever seen before, written in latin no less...
[child_of_destiny.GetFirstName], oh how you scared me...! And how do you know Latin?
Ridiculous... dispose of that book, and keep an eye on [child_of_destiny.GetFirstName]!
You cannot help but feel inspired, by simply being in the presence of this character.
This character is absolutely determined to be the best ruler there ever was.
This character is the subject of many a longing eye.

I have always been very beloved, though until now I have never thought much about it. Wherever I go, others my age admire me with obvious infatuation! I am constantly showered with compliments and gifts, like I was a [child_of_destiny.GetKingQueen]! I am the center of attention wherever I go, and I like it!
Perhaps one of the [child_of_destiny.GetBoyGirlOpp]s will win my heart one day?
I do not like limiting my options...

[child_of_destiny.GetFirstName] is no mere child anymore, that much is evident. [child_of_destiny.GetSheHeCap] is constantly surrounded by young infatuated admirers, and [child_of_destiny.GetSheHe] is obviously enjoying the attention!
[child_of_destiny.GetSheHeCap] sure is popular with children [child_of_destiny.GetHerHis] age...
How quaint. Guards, please relocate all of these annoying admirers!
This character can react in an instant, drawing [GetHerHis] sword as fast as a flash of lightning.
多くの[Religion.GetPriestTitle]が、この人物は[Religion.GetHighGodName]の祝福によって邪悪な者から守られていると信じています

As I sit in my room, I hear a rustling sound outside the [child_of_destiny.GetChamberOpening]. Suddenly, a [attempted_murderer.GetManWoman] bursts in, brandishing a rusty [GetRandomWeapon]! [attempted_murderer.GetSheHeCap] is covered head-to-toe in blood, and screeches maniacally: "[attempted_murderer.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodNameCap] will have your soul!" I quickly grab a red-hot poker from the fireplace and the [attempted_murderer.GetManWoman], in [attempted_murderer.GetHerHis] frenzy, impales [attempted_murderer.GetHerselfHimself] on it...
I can not trust anyone after this...
This must have been divine intervention!

Grave news! This very night, [child_of_destiny.GetFirstName] was assaulted in [child_of_destiny.GetHerHis] [child_of_destiny.GetChamber]! An assassin somehow managed to sneak into the [Root.GetHolding], killing any guard in [attempted_murderer.GetHerHis] way. In a stroke of luck, [child_of_destiny.GetFirstName] managed to impale the assailant on a fire poker. [attempted_murderer.GetSheHeCap] was later identified as [attempted_murderer.GetFullName], who the [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]s had long suspected of deviancy...
By [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName], how could this happen? Redouble the guard!
By [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName], what if they come for me next?

Wherever I go, all eyes are upon me. One [sex_partner.GetManWoman] in particular stands out – [sex_partner.GetSheHe] is stunningly [sex_partner.GetBeautifulHandsome], and looks at me with such hunger in [sex_partner.GetHerHis] eyes... Perhaps I should encourage [sex_partner.GetHerHim]?
Join me in my [child_of_destiny.GetChamber] for some... [child_of_destiny.GetAlcohol]?
I have more important matters to attend to...
This character has slain a terrible beast that terrorized the common folk.
This character used [GetHerHis] wits to outsmart a legendary beast, causing it to plummet to its death.

In order to teach me how to hunt, [marshal_target.GetJobTitle] [marshal_target.GetFirstName] has brought me into the forest. We are silently moving through the shrubbery as I spot a [child_of_destiny.GetRegionalSmallGameAnimal]! I give chase, running until I manage to get a clear shot off – it is a kill! I turn around to face [marshal_target.GetFirstName] with a gleeful smile on my face, but in [marshal_target.GetHerHis] stead is a massive [child_of_destiny.GetRegionalFerociousAnimal]! I ready my spear, and then I...
... use a rock as leverage and puncture the neck of the [child_of_destiny.GetRegionalFerociousAnimal] as it attacks!
... run towards the nearby cliff and feint the [child_of_destiny.GetRegionalFerociousAnimal] so it falls off!

I am awestruck when I see what [marshal_target.GetJobTitle] [marshal_target.GetFirstName] and [child_of_destiny.GetFirstName] has brought back from their hunt. A trophy from a massive [child_of_destiny.GetRegionalFerociousAnimal]! I thought they were hunting for [child_of_destiny.GetRegionalSmallGameAnimal]... [marshal_target.GetFirstName] ensures me that [marshal_target.GetSheHe] and [child_of_destiny.GetFirstName] tracked the [child_of_destiny.GetRegionalFerociousAnimal] together, and that [marshal_target.GetSheHe] absolutely did not lose track of where [child_of_destiny.GetFirstName] was, only arriving after the [child_of_destiny.GetRegionalFerociousAnimal] was already dead...
What? How can this be? Sounds highly suspect...

Horrible news! While out hunting with [marshal_target.GetJobTitle] [marshal_target.GetFirstName], [child_of_destiny.GetFirstName] was killed by a massive [child_of_destiny.GetRegionalFerociousAnimal]! According to [marshal_target.GetJobTitle] [marshal_target.GetFirstName] the beast came out of nowhere and devoured [child_of_destiny.GetFirstName] in one big gulp, before turning on [marshal_target.GetHerHim] and chasing [marshal_target.GetHerHim] out of the forest...
If you fulfill your destiny of becoming §YKing§! you will found a new §YBloodline§!!
You are granted one free use of the §YInvasion§! Casus Belli!
Due to abandoning the realm, §Y[child_of_destiny.GetFirstName]§! makes the choice of becoming §RDisinherited§!!
§RThese units will NOT be inherited by your successors!§!

My blood burns with ambition, I can stay idle no longer! It is my destiny to become [child_of_destiny.GetKingQueen], and I have the support I need to realize it! Just one question remains, should I focus my ambition inwards, or outwards? Should I stay and fight for the throne of [top_liege_match_target.PrimaryTitle.GetName], or should I abandon my past and look towards [target_invasion_character.PrimaryTitle.GetName]?

The time has come. My blood burns with ambition, I can stay idle no longer! It is my destiny to become [child_of_destiny.GetKingQueen], and I have the support I need to realize it! My eyes are set upon [target_invasion_character.PrimaryTitle.GetName], and all the riches that lie within...
I shall lead my armies towards [target_invasion_character.PrimaryTitle.GetName]!
The time is not right... I will give it more time.

I always expected [child_of_destiny.GetFirstName] to do this, though I hoped the day would never come... [child_of_destiny.GetSheHeCap] has, with popular support, laid claim to [top_liege_match_target.PrimaryTitle.GetName]! With a massive host of willing soldiers backing [child_of_destiny.GetHerHis] claim, I fear it will not be long before a civil war breaks out...
Oh [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName], [child_of_destiny.GetHerHis] ambition will ruin us all!

It seems as if [child_of_destiny.GetFirstName] has decided that [child_of_destiny.GetHerHis] ambitions will never be realized as long as [child_of_destiny.GetSheHe] stays in [top_liege_match_target.PrimaryTitle.GetName]. [child_of_destiny.GetSheHeCap] has attracted a massive host of eager soldiers, willing to fight and die for [child_of_destiny.GetHerHim], which he is steering towards the realm of [target_invasion_character.GetFullName]. I fear [target_invasion_character.PrimaryTitle.GetName] is doomed...
This is the last drop, [child_of_destiny.GetFirstName] is out of the will!
What a relief! Now [child_of_destiny.GetFirstName] is [target_invasion_character.GetFirstName]s problem!

Lately my thoughts have been shaded by dark clouds. Today I read a book about an ancient hero, and [child_of_destiny.GetSheHe] reminds me of myself! [child_of_destiny.GetSheHeCap] fights impossible odds, and overcomes hardships similar to my own. It is as if the hero of the book and myself share a destiny! I must not doubt myself, this world will be mine one day.
Beware, darkness - for I shall banish you from my mind!
This character leads by example. [GetSheHeCap] orates inspiring stories that ensures the loyalty of [GetHerHis] subjects.
This character has no problems sacrificing [GetHerHis] friends to reach [GetHerHis] goals. This ruthlessness attracts the most fierce of warriors to [GetHerHis] cause.

My natural charisma has led me to become very popular. Other kids do not dare to pick on me, as I have many friends who would come to my aid at a moments notice. In fact, there is always someone following me around. Whatever I want them to do, they will do for me – in the playground, I rule.
When I am [child_of_destiny.GetKingQueen], loyalty will be rewarded.
They say they would die for me, I like that!

[child_of_destiny.GetFirstName] seems to be very charismatic – in the playground [child_of_destiny.GetSheHe] is always 'guarded' by at least three other children. It would almost seem as if [child_of_destiny.GetSheHe] is building the foundation of a very young army...
I am glad that my [child_of_destiny.GetSonDaughter] is making friends, I suppose?
Ominous, children should not act like this...
Finally, [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] is mine! Now, how do I wish to rule over my new subjects? Should I impose my beliefs and traditions upon them, or should I adapt to their culture and morals?
I shall adopt both their traditions and faith!
I will adopt their traditions, but I will not abandon [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName].
Their faith speaks to me... adopting it could further my plans.
I will not change, they will have to get used to me!

Ever since I was a child I dreamt about this moment, to seize a crown and name myself [Root.GetTitle], and now it has finally come true! But my ambitions know no bounds – for as long as I live, I shall conquer. My name shall be known across the world, and my legacy will last for millennia!
I have seized my destiny, though it does not end here!

A great conqueror by the name of [child_of_destiny.GetFirstNameWithNick] has invaded and taken over the realm of [child_of_destiny.PrimaryTitle.GetName]. [child_of_destiny.GetSheHeCap] is a [child_of_destiny.GetManWoman] of unrivaled ambition, with eyes set on the rest of the known world. Time will tell if [child_of_destiny.GetSheHe] will build an empire to rival that of Alexander the Great himself, or if [child_of_destiny.GetSheHe] will march [child_of_destiny.GetHerHis] army into oblivion in the Gedrosian desert...

I thought I was going to rot in prison forever, until I heard a voice outside my cell. "Be very silent, I am getting you out of here!" the voice whispers. It is [savior_target.GetFullName], come to save me!
No, I quite like it here.

During the night, [child_of_destiny.GetFullName] escaped from my dungeons! [child_of_destiny.GetSheHeCap] was apparently helped by [savior_target.GetFullName], who has joined [child_of_destiny.GetHerHim] at [child_of_destiny.GetHerHis] court.

[child_of_destiny.GetFullName], who was imprisoned by [jailer_target.GetFullName], has escaped during the night! [child_of_destiny.GetSheHeCap] was apparently helped by [savior_target.GetFullName], who has joined [child_of_destiny.GetHerHis] court.

I know that the key to success lies in who I let close to me. No great [child_of_destiny.GetManWoman] ever reached the top without having at least a couple of loyal friends by their side – and I intend to choose only the most useful of people to stand by my side. There are many people clamoring for my attention, but who should I encourage?
Someone powerful, to aid me if I need help.
Someone in a position to further my goals...
Someone wise and clever, to provide counsel.
I do not like either of these people.

Lying in my bed I glance out through the open window. In the stars I can see my destiny, the soft light dancing in front of my eyes – telling of the many adventures I will have, the friends I will make, and the Kingdoms I will rule. It is comforting to know that the stars align just for me.
When I am older I will seize what is mine, but for now I will rest.
For as long as you live, you can use the §GInvasion Casus Belli§!
An army with which to claim your destiny assembles!
[This.Founder.GetTitledFirstName] was a duelist of great renown. No one would stand in [This.Founder.GetHerHis] way lest they wanted a humiliating defeat, or a swift death...
[This.Founder.GetTitledFirstName] was a duelist of great renown. No one would stand in [This.Founder.GetHerHis] way lest they wanted a humiliating defeat, or a swift death...

No matter the weapon: sword, axe, mace or spear – I am unmatched in a duel. Many have tried to best me, and few have ever succeeded. My reputation reaches both far and wide – I am known for my skill, my tenacity, my cunning and my ruthlessness... Come the day, I would even defeat [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName] in personal combat!
This character has used [GetHerHis] cunning to track down and corner those who refused to duel [GetHerHim].
この人物は暴力的で不屈の決闘者です。[GetHerHim]に挑戦して生きて帰れる人はあまりいません。
I will always approve this type of war!

斧は§Y重歩兵§!と§Y軽歩兵§!、§Y軍事力§!、§Y個人戦闘能力§!、§Y毎月の威信§!にボーナスを与えます。\n

弓は§Y弓兵§!と§Y騎兵§!、§Y軍事力§!、§Y個人戦闘能力§!、§Y毎月の威信§!にボーナスを与えます。\n

これが教皇が十字軍が成功した暁には十字軍王国を与えたいと考えている人物です。もし誰も選択されていない場合は特に教皇に意中の人物はおらず、一番貢献度の高い者の受益者が十字軍王国の支配者に選ばれます。
これが十字軍の目標となっている人物と王国です。目標は教皇がその教えでの重要性に基づいて選んでおり、通常遠隔地への遠征を行うよりその教えの本土を守ることを優先するようになっています。
軍資金は十字軍の準備のために集められた富と十字軍の間に集められた戦利品の両方を表すものです。十字軍が始まると、兵の徴用を支援するため軍資金の一部が十字軍への参戦を盟約した者に配られます。十字軍が成功した際に、軍資金として残った富、信仰点、威信、秘宝は十字軍の参戦者に配られ、戦利品の配分は参戦者の戦争貢献度に基づいて決まります。
十字軍が始まったら参加することを盟約した人々です。
クリックして相手陣営の参加者を表示
これが受益者として選んだ人物です。聖戦が成功すれば受益者は十字軍国家の領主となります。十字軍国家の領主になれば一族全体に信仰点ボーナスが与えられます。
当陣営の軍事戦力を相手陣営と比べたものです。自分が参加する陣営の戦力のほうが高いほど、戦争に勝利する可能性が高くなります。
この一年間聖騎士団に寄付していない [Root.GetHolyOrderDonationCD]
- you can donate to a Holy Order again on: §Y[This.donate_to_holy_order_cooldown.GetExpiryDate]§!
§Yエルサレム§!の§Y伯爵領§!を保持している
§Y[Root.GetBestName]§!は§Yウトラメール帝国§!を創設する
ゲーム中に不合理なイベントが起きる可能性があります。
ゲーム中に不合理なイベントは起きません。
AI君主にも、不合理なイベントが起こります。
この場所を破壊するな！私には考えがあるのだ。
[baltic.GetGroupName]の戦士たちは、一騎討ちを通して白兵戦の強さを確かめるために、ここへと集結します。
The feared horse archers of the steppes are trained here. These highly mobile horsemen frequently outmaneuver their opponents, and are some of the finest warriors the world has ever seen.
強固な防御で知られるギャロウグラスの戦士は優秀な重歩兵です。
The strong tradition of archery in England and Wales produces excellent bowmen. Here they can practise with their powerful longbows.
The strong tradition of archery produces excellent bowmen. Here they can practise with their powerful longbows.

This is where the elite of the [GetMoorish] cavalry are recruited and trained. The [GetMoors] have a long tradition fielding some of the finest cavalry in the world - armed with lances, swords and bows, they have great tactical flexibility.
[combatant_2.GetFirstName]'s attacks were vicious and unrelenting, leaving [combatant_1.GetFirstName] severely injured...
[combatant_1.GetFirstName]はこの戦いで無数の軽傷を負ったが、少しは成長に役立ったことは間違いない！
Fortunately, [combatant_1.GetFirstName] got away without any significant injuries.

我らが戦士団の[combatant_1.GetSocietyRank]である[combatant_1.GetFirstNameWithNick]の決闘者としての実力は良く言っても[combatant_1.GetNegativeDuelSkillTerm]程度である。[combatant_1.GetHerHis]の助けが[Root.Society.GetName]に必要な時、ひどく未熟であることは[combatant_1.GetHerHim]のようなタイプの人間にとっては恥ずべきことだ！もしかして誰かとの練習試合を薦めるべきなのだろうか？
[combatant_1.GetSheHeCap]にはまず自信が必要だ。それなら[society_practice_duelist_target_1.GetFirstName]が楽な試合をしてくれるだろう。
[society_practice_duelist_target_2.GetFirstName]なら五分五分の挑戦をもたらすだろう。
失敗こそ最高の師、[society_practice_duelist_target_3.GetFirstName]がうってつけだ！
いや、[combatant_1.GetFirstName]が[combatant_1.GetHerselfHimself]で決めるべきだろう…

[combatant_1.GetFirstNameWithNick]は、わずかな打ち合いの後、思わぬほどにあっけなく[combatant_2.GetFirstNameWithNick]を倒してしまった。喝采を上げる観衆が、[combatant_1.GetFirstName]を高く担ぎ上げた。果てはお祝いだめでたいと、小屋の上にまで[combatant_1.GetHerHim]を押し上げた。いつの日か[combatant_1.GetSheHeCap]は高名な戦士となるだろう…
[combatant_1.GetFirstNameWithNick]は[combatant_2.GetFirstNameWithNick]に汗をかかせることも出来ずに惨敗した。[combatant_1.GetHowWoundedDidIBecome]

Just as [combatant_1.GetFirstNameWithNick] was about to issue [combatant_2.GetFirstNameWithNick] a challenge, [combatant_2.GetFirstName] ran away! I wonder what kind of attitudes we really foster here in [Root.Society.GetName], because this is embarrasing for all of us...
[combatant_2.GetFirstNameWithNick]へ挑戦しようとしたとたん、[combatant_1.GetFirstNameWithNick]は逃げ出した!なんて臆病者なんだ、あんなに臆病なやつは見たことがない!
[combatant_1.GetFirstNameWithNick]と[combatant_2.GetFirstNameWithNick]は、互いにあらゆる手段を使って戦った！観衆が二人を囲み、[combatant_1.GetFirstName]がついに勝利を飾った。[combatant_1.GetHowWoundedDidIBecome]

[combatant_1.GetFirstNameWithNick]と[combatant_2.GetFirstNameWithNick]は、互いにあらゆる手段を使って戦った！観衆は二人を囲み、[combatant_1.GetFirstName]のぎこちない動きを笑い、[combatant_1.GetSheHe]は結局負けてしまった。[combatant_1.GetHowWoundedDidIBecome]
[combatant_1.GetFirstName]は、対戦相手を選んだ私の慧眼に感謝した！
[combatant_1.GetFirstName]は考えた。[combatant_2.GetFirstName]は格下だったのではないかと…
[combatant_1.GetFirstName]は私のせいで死にかけたと思っている！
§Y[combatant_1.GetFirstName]§!が勝つだろうが、果たして[combatant_1.GetSheHe]はこれで喜ぶだろうか？
§Y[combatant_1.GetFirstName]§!と§Y[society_practice_duelist_target_2.GetFirstName]§!のどちらが勝つかわからない、公平な戦いになるだろう。
§Y[combatant_1.GetFirstName]§! will without a doubt be beaten bloody - effective, but perhaps a bit harsh?
[Root.Society.GetName]の一員である§Y[lodge_member_killed.GetFirstNameWithNick]§!が§Y[lodge_member_killer.GetFirstNameWithNick]§!との決闘で死亡した！

The fearless warriors of the Jaguar order are trained here. They represent the elite of the [nahuatl.GetName] war machine and entire armies have been known to rout at the mere sight of the spotted fur covering their armor.

[FromFrom.PrimaryTitle.GetName]は貧しいながらも信心深い[From.GetOnlyDynastyName]部族によって打倒された。退廃した[FromFrom.PrimaryTitle.GetTier]は崩壊し、不徳な[FromFrom.GetTitle]の束縛から全ての封臣は解放されたのである。この[FromFrom.PrimaryTitle.GetTier]の崩壊により、この地域に権威を回復するに相応しい一族が現れるかどうかはいずれ時代が明らかにするであろう。
Family Member was made a Saint
§R受益者となる資格のあるものがいません§!

私の血に[GetWarriorLodgeSymbol]の力が流れているのを感じながら、敵指揮官に対して咆えると[enemy_commander.GetHerHim]は目に見えるほど驚いた。「降参だ！」[enemy_commander.GetSheHe]は叫んだ。「私は[enemy_commander.GetBestName]だ、そしてーー」[enemy_commander.GetManWoman]の言葉は私の武器が喉を[GetWeaponSwinging]ことで途切れた。
ハハハ！こいつの頭を[Root.GetCapitalHolding]の防壁に晒してやろう！
この頭蓋骨には変色した血痕が残っており、苦しみや残忍性が想起されます。[battlefield_location.GetName]の戦いで[Root.GetTitledFirstName]が頭蓋骨を持ち帰ることを決める前に、[enemy_commander.GetBestName]の頭は完全に切り離されていた、という話です。
いくぶん華やかなこの盃は、明らかに変わった素材でできています。一度ささやかなトロフィーを手にすると、頭蓋骨が見事に磨かれて頑丈な固定具にはめ込まれ、宝石で飾られていることに気付くでしょう。
残虐な人物からの評価

我が軍の指揮官[home_commander.GetBestName]に関して報告を受けた。[battlefield_location.GetName][battlefield_location.GetTerrain]の戦いにおける戦働きは見事であったとのこと。直近の噂によれば、敵指揮官の首を容赦なく跳ね飛ばした後、素早く[home_commander.GetRidingMarching]の身となるや否や、次なる敵へ向かったという。

My [home_liege.GetRootRelation] [home_liege.GetTitledFirstName] is apparently thoroughly impressed by my battle technique. A missive I have received speaks at length about my bravery, and of people telling stories about the decapitation of [enemy_commander.GetTitledFirstName] for years to come.

I am staring down the [home_commander.GetEnemySoldierDesc] enemy commander, trying to gauge what on earth [home_commander.GetHerHis] armor actually consists of. Are those... rat pelts? My thoughts begin to trail off and I proceed to demand [home_commander.GetHerHis] surrender. But then suddenly the world is spinning, and someone shouts: "Dodge for the flying head!".
§Y[home_commander.GetTitledFirstName]§!は§Y敵の頭蓋骨§!を§Y宝物庫§!に加えた。

My commander [enemy_commander.GetTitledFirstName] has been slain [battlefield_location.GetInOn] the [battlefield_location.GetTerrain] of [battlefield_location.GetName]. "Decapitated, my [Root.GetLordLady]", the courier says, shuddering. "It was [home_commander.GetTitledFirstName], from [home_commander.Society.GetName]", he continues, averting my eyes.
And you just left [enemy_commander.GetHerHim] in the [battlefield_location.GetGroundDesc]?!
Aaargh! I will personally take care of that brute.
あなたも§Y[Root.Society.GetName]§!の会員であるため、これが選択可能です

[From.GetBestName] did not appreciate the fate [enemy_commander.GetTitledFirstName] met with at the battle of [battlefield_location.GetName], and has sworn to take matters into [From.GetHerHis] own hands. All this fuss over head on a pike?

[From.GetBestName] must not have heard how I refused to take the head of my enemy as a trophy, because I am told that the [From.GetManWoman] has sworn to take vengeance on me, for the fate [enemy_commander.GetTitledFirstName] met with at the battle of [battlefield_location.GetName].
Even though I left [enemy_commander.GetHerHis] skull in the [battlefield_location.GetGroundDesc]?
[battlefield_location.Capital.GetName]の[battlefield_location.GetTerrain]へ向かう道中、巨大な岩が道を塞いでいた。[GetRidingMarching]酷使され続けた筋肉が真の挑戦を求めて疼いている。「新兵！」大きすぎる武器を持った若い[Root.GetBoyGirl]に呼びかける。「私にハンマーを」
この岩をどうしてくれようか。
あなたは仕事に取り掛かります。\n
あなたは仲間の指揮官に道中の岩を破壊させます。\n

On our way through the [battlefield_location.GetTerrain], a gigantic boulder blocks our path. Commander [From.GetTitledFirstName] is arguing at length with [From.GetHerHis] officers about whether we should try [GetRidingMarching] around the river crossing or not, when suddenly I hear them shouting my name, gesturing in my direction with a huge hammer.
Finally! Let's do something about this rock.

[my_fellow_commander.GetTitledFirstName]は[GetRandomMythologicalCreature]のような強さで戦う好戦的な指揮官だ。誰もが数えているものでもないが、[GetRandomMythologicalCreature]が単独でどれほどの敵を倒したのか気になってしまった……「私の分も取っておいてくれ」[battlefield_location.GetTerrain]へ向かって呼びかけた。
フッー！なんて目立ちたがりなんだ！べつに凄くなんてない！

Commander [From.GetTitledFirstName] keeps throwing me looks across the [battlefield_location.GetTerrain], as I am [GetWeaponSwinging] my way through our enemies. Just as I begin to get uncomfortable by the surveillance, [From.GetSheHe] calls out: "Save some for me, will you?"
Nothing like the smell of bloodshed in the morning!
You do me too much honor, [From.GetTitledFirstName].
Haha, of course! Aaah, this is so invigorating!

Nostalgia comes easily in the soft light of a campfire. Last night, one eager soldier blessed us with a riveting tale of the battle that claimed the life of my [target.GetRootRelation], [target.GetBestName]. As I am [GetRidingMarching] onto the battlefield today, I let the past fuel my resolve.

In the light of the campfire, my men often talk about heroes of old. Last night, one of them blessed us with a fabulous tale of the battle that claimed the life of [target.GetBestName]. I never gave it that much thought, but [GetRidingMarching] onto the battlefield, I find myself lingering on the story.

It was long ago I felt so good about being in charge of a regiment. Today, while lying in wait for an ambush, one nervous officer confessed that there was a time when the stories about my command were all over [home_capital_province.GetName]. "It's what made me vow to join the [Root.Culture.GetName] army, my [Root.GetLordLady]", [Root.GetSheHe] murmurs.

I remember hearing the stories from [home_capital_province.GetName], about the command and leadership of [target.GetBestName]. "It is important to have role models", I said at the time. Today, I look out over my regiment, thankful for all the great leaders that came before me.
You're saying *I* am the reason you became a soldier...?
Now they all look to me.
好奇心旺盛な新兵の一人が、戦場で敵を斬首したときのことを尋ねてきた。私は「敵の頭蓋骨を杯になどしない」と言って笑い[GetSkullTrophyComment]

「もし[target.GetTitledFirstName]が敵の骨で盃を上げてるとしたら？」と問いかけた。新兵はしきりに相槌を打つ。私は笑って、意味ありげに[Root.GetHerHim]の肩に腕を回した。「間違いなく、[home_capital_province.Capital.GetName]の宮殿には秘密の部屋があって、[target.GetSheHe]が血の風呂に入っていると噂されるだろう。」新兵の顔は真っ青になった。
そんな話、放っておけないだろ?
こんな話を聞いたことがあるか？[target.GetFirstName]と馬が…
「しかし、それは悪い考えではないな！なかなかいいユーモアだ[Root.GetBoyGirl]」と言って、[Root.GetHerHim]の背を叩いた。
「頭蓋骨を持ってきてさえいない！正直に言うと、想像力が豊かすぎるぞ兵士よ」と言って、[Root.GetHerHim]の背を叩いた。
This character is riding on a wave of glorious battles, long gone by.
This character is awash with a sense of pride and duty.
This character is enjoying the attention.

「私は[GetWarriorLodgeSymbol]と一体だ」[GetDuelWeapon]を振る度に自分に言い聞かせる。「[Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName]のために！」咆哮を上げ、私の邪魔になるものは誰であれ[GetWeaponSwinging]伏せる。死体と血が[battlefield_location.GetTerrain]中に溢れかえり、枯れていた生の川を満たすように鬨の声を上げ続ける。
Come out, come out, where you are!
あぁあ、目の前で骨と意志が折れる音がする...爽快だ!
May [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] care for all these souls.

[battlefield_location.GetTerrain]で[enemy_commander.GetTitledFirstName]を追っていると、[commander_to_the_rescue.GetTitledFirstName]が私を横に押しのけた。「[Root.GetLordLady]、こいつは私が！」[commander_to_the_rescue.GetSheHe]はそう吠えると、[commander_to_the_rescue.GetClumsilyElegantly]に[commander_to_the_rescue.GetDuelWeapon]を振り上げた……
私の歓心を得ようとしているのか……？
[commander_to_the_rescue.GetSheHe]が[commander_to_the_rescue.GetHerselfHimself]を傷つけなければいいのだが…？
Why do such a foolish thing, [commander_to_the_rescue.GetBrotherSister]...?!

[home_commander.GetTitledFirstName]が[battlefield_location.GetTerrain]で[enemy_commander.GetTitledFirstName]を追っているという報せがあった。わが指揮官[commander_to_the_rescue.GetTitledFirstName]はそこに割って入ろうしている！[commander_to_the_rescue.GetBattleRescueDesc]
戦況の主導権を握ろうとしているのだ！
上手く敵の指揮官の裏をかいて、戦場を奴の血で染めてやろうとしているのだ！
おそらく[home_commander.GetTitledFirstName]の命を救おうとしているのだ！
戦況は一時的に混乱し、[This.GetHerselfHimself]はそのなかで負傷した。
そのなかで[This.GetHerselfHimself]は戦死した。
運命は常に誠実なる者に報いるわけではないのだ。
運命は常に勇者に味方するわけではないのだ。
私はお前にとって最悪の悪夢というわけだ。
つまりは、私がお前の死刑執行人ということだ。
敵の指揮官[other_combatant.GetTitledFirstName]の戦いぶりは卑怯で、私を[battlefield_location.GetTreeRockFence]まで完全に追い詰めていった。奴の背後からは、その手勢が次々にこちらに近づいてくる。奴らは高笑いしながら私をあざけり、血に飢えている様子だ……
敵の指揮官[other_combatant.GetTitledFirstName]の振り回す[other_combatant.GetDuelWeapon]は徐々にその正確さを増し、[battlefield_location.GetTerrain]において私は死を覚悟し始めていた。

目の前で起きていることが信じられないが、[other_combatant.GetTitledFirstName]が[other_combatant.GetDuelWeapon]を振り回すごとに、[other_combatant.GetHerHis]はこの勝負で勝利に近づいている。飛びのいて攻撃を避けても、運を味方にした別の恐ろしい一撃が襲ってくる。私は自分が[battlefield_location.GetTreeRockFence]を背にしていることに気づいた。
ま…待て、降伏する！潔く捕虜となろう！
[commander_cannon_fodder.GetTitledFirstName]を私の代わりに連れていけ…！必ず迎えに行きます！
この人物は戦場において味方を売ったと噂されています…！

It seems that the enemy commander [other_combatant.GetTitledFirstName] actually expected me to play fair when [other_combatant.GetSheHe] chased me down on the battlefield. "Just you and me!" the [other_combatant.GetManWoman] demanded, sword held high. My men quickly joined me in taking the fool down.

I was swinging my [Root.GetDuelWeapon] with increasing precision, but I am not sure the enemy commander [other_combatant.GetTitledFirstName] realized that [other_combatant.GetSheHe] was going to perish on this battlefield, until I landed a deadly blow to [other_combatant.GetHerHis] skull, cracking it audibly open.

It was surprising, but with each swing of my [Root.GetDuelWeapon], [other_combatant.GetTitledFirstName] seemed to have increasing difficulty controlling [other_combatant.GetHerHis] stance. All in all it was close, but in the end I landed a lucky blow to [other_combatant.GetHerHis] temple...
They will all learn to fear me!

I yield! [From.GetTitledFirstName] calls out. Sweat dripping down my forehead, I am holding my [Root.GetDuelWeapon] high, a deadly blow about to come down on my enemy. "You what?!" I demand. The [From.GetManWoman] drops to [From.GetHerHis] knees. "I'll be your prisoner! I'll be of more use to you alive" [From.GetSheHe] cries.
「ま、待て！降参だ！」[From.GetTitledFirstName]が叫ぶ。我が[Root.GetDuelWeapon]は高く、眼前の敵に振り下ろされんと、その致命的一撃が、鈍る。[From.GetManWoman]が、慌てて後ずさる、しかし[From.GetHerselfHimself]につまずいてしまう。「捕虜としてくれ！命ばかりは！」[From.GetSheHe]は涙ながらに懇願する。
おまえには死がお似合いだ。
戦いのさなか、我が軍の指揮官[From.GetTitledName]は、[FromFrom.GetBestName]と一対一で決闘をして死んだ。[From.GetTitledFirstName]は降参しようとしたが無駄だったそうだ。
戦闘の最中に、私と同じ色の服を着た[my_dear.GetBoyGirl]を目にした。[my_dear.GetHerHis]を打ち倒したとき、その荒々しい表情に気付く時間があった。[my_dear.GetSheHe]がどれほど我が[my_dear.GetRootRelation]、[my_dear.GetFirstName]を想起させたかに気付き、私は罪悪感に襲われた。

During the battle I catch sight of a [my_dear.GetFaceDescription] [my_dear.GetManWoman] who looks a lot like my [my_dear.GetRootRelation] [my_dear.GetTitledFirstName]. Then [my_dear.GetSheHe] is struck down. Suddenly, I am pushing soldiers out of the way, hurrying over to where I saw [my_dear.GetHerHim] fall. I know it is not [my_dear.GetFirstName], but I cannot help myself...!
我々は負傷者の手当てを忘れてはならない。
「休憩」時間なんて無い![Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName]のために、とつげぇぇき!
As a member of §Y[Root.Society.GetName]§!, you can choose to harness your inner strength and shrug off a physical injury.
NOT already focusing on an injury
自分のポートレートを§G右クリック§!して、自分自身の肉体的損傷を取り除けます。
The old wound has finally healed, leaving a pretty grotesque scar behind. Some fresh air and walks in the [Root.Location.GetTerrain] surrounding [Root.Location.GetName] was all I needed!
I am starting to think the physician who looked at my injury was mistaken. The wound from the maiming has healed completely! Maybe it was all a trick of the light?
The old wound has finally healed, leaving a pretty grotesque scar behind.

My injuries were extensive, but not enough to break me. Waking up this morning, I straighten my back. "This pain is temporary" I declare to my servant, who is watching me incredulously. The demons will have to try harder before [Root.GetTitledFirstName] surrenders to self-pity.

All my [Root.GetBrotherSister]s of [Root.Society.GetName] know that infections are best treated with a calming poultice, good sleep, and fresh air. I am not surprised to find that the foul smell is gone from my wound, leaving but a pale scar behind.

「誰か斧を!」と私は吼える。私が振り回し始めると、群衆はあえぎ、パニックになって慌てて逃げ出そうとする者もいた。一人の勇者、[kinslayer_target.GetTitledFirstName]が私の前に出て挑戦を受けた。終わった後、私たちは心から笑っている。「お前の激情が好きなんだよ、[Root.GetBrotherSister]!」と言って、[kinslayer_target.GetSheHe]は額の汗をぬぐった。

Someone get me an axe! NOW! I roar to the closest soldier I can find. In the corner of my eye, I see my [kinslayer_target.GetRootRelation] [kinslayer_target.GetTitledFirstName] watching me. As I start swinging the weapon around, the rush of combat fills me. I find myself smiling, then laughing, from the bottom of my belly. [kinslayer_target.GetFirstName] is laughing too, and the crowd cheers me on.

Give me your axe! NOW! I roar at the recruit. The young [Root.GetBoyGirl] obeys and the crowd around me gasps as I start swinging it around me, some scrambling to get out of my way. "[Root.GetFirstName], what are you doing?!" my [kinslayer_target.GetRootRelation] [kinslayer_target.GetFirstName] yells in despair, clutching at [kinslayer_target.GetHerHis] bloodied tunic.
あぁあ、我は敵の災いなるぞ!
Aaah, by [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]! You are a small sacrifice for my new-gained strength!
I was just... Curses, someone help us out here!
died caught in the violent fury of $KILLER$
died a victim of violent fury

[From.GetTitledFirstName] apparently went on a wild rampage through [From.GetHerHis] [From.GetCapitalHolding], and my poor [kinslayer_target.GetRootRelation] [kinslayer_target.GetTitledFirstName] was caught in the crossfire!

幾枚かの[target_title.GetName]の地図を睨みつけていると、[giving_member.GetTitledFirstName]が訪ねてきた。召使いが[giving_member.GetHerHis]の訪問を告げる。「ご注意を」と添えて。卓上から視線を上げると、上等な布で包んだ何かを携えているのに気づいた。「来る戦いに備えて」[giving_member.GetManWoman]の言葉に、場の空気が緩んだ。
おお、太っ腹にも程があるぞ。代わりにこれを持っていくがいい！
思うに、これが必要なのは私より貴方だ、[giving_member.GetFirstName]よ。
I would rather focus on my personal training.

Out [Root.GetRidingMarching] with [fellow_member.GetTitledFirstName], my eagle by my side, the [fellow_member.GetManWoman] showers both me and my bird with compliments. "You make a great team", [fellow_member.GetTitledFirstName] concludes.

私が近いうちに[target_title.GetName]へ旅立つと知り、[Root.GetMyMarshalName]である[marshal_character.GetTitledFirstName]は、不在の間に軍を指揮するものがいないことを心配している。「ご自身の指揮権の象徴として、[target_artifact.GetName]を置いて行かれていはどうでしょうか?」と[marshal_character.GetSheHe]は言った。「少なくとも、[Root.GetLordLady]よ、あなたはそれを研いでおくべきです。」と[marshal_character.GetSheHe]は顔を顰めた。

Sharpen it! I'll inform the troops of the confidence I have in you.

I am not letting anyone else touch this weapon.
[Root.GetTitledFirstName]の持ち物の中でも秘蔵のトロフィーである。[Root.GetTitledFirstName]が[target_title.GetName]へ冒険の旅に出る時に備えて、[Root.Society.GetName]は、この武器を研いでいた。
[Root.GetTitledFirstName]の持ち物の中でも秘蔵のトロフィーである。[Root.GetTitledFirstName]が[target_title.GetName]へ冒険の旅に出る時に備えて、[Root.Society.GetName]は、この武器を研いでいた。

ついに敵国に向けて移動する時が来た。[fellow_member.GetTitledFirstName]と共に[Root.Society.GetName]へ再び乾杯する。「我らは彼の地で最も経験豊かな戦士を見つけ、[Root.Culture.GetName]が如何なるものか見せつけるのだ！」私も宣言する。「我らの名を誰もが知ることになるだろう！」[fellow_member.GetSheHe]は頷き、机に拳を下ろした。

私にとって大物すぎる……
あなたは立ち去ります...\n
旅仲間と焚き火を囲んで酒を飲みながら話をする夜を過ごして、私は深い眠りについた。寝る場所に戻る途中、私は足を止める。[target_ruler.Capital.GetTreeRockFence]を挟んで、用を足そうとしていた[my_duel_target.GetManWoman]がいたのだ。「敵だ！」私は恐怖より驚きの方が大きかった。

すぐここから立ち去ろう。

[target_ruler.Capital.GetName]のとある村を通過するとき、村民が異邦人である私の話を熱望してきた。明らかに私のような[Root.GetManWoman]を未だかつて見たことがなかったようで、私の鎧や栄光の足跡に対して崇敬の眼差しを向けてきたが、明白な敵意にさらされるまでそれほど長い時間はかからなかった。一人の[my_duel_target.GetManWoman]が「よそ者は帰れ！」と怒鳴ったのだ。
面と向かって言うべきじゃないか？戦おう！
私にとって大物すぎる……
一晩中寝返りを打っていた私は、[fellow_member.GetTitledFirstName]のいびきを聞いてすっかり目を覚ましていた。起き上がろうと思ったとき、藪がガサガサ音を立てた。立ち上がろうとすると、一人の[my_duel_target.GetManWoman]が私にのしかかり、疑わしそうに私を見つめながらのど元にに武器を突き付けた。
武器を持っているな、わかった…1対1で勝負しないか？
斥候に決闘を申し込み、月明かりの下で刃を交える。\n
§Y[fellow_member.GetTitledFirstName]§!と共に、その斥候を撃退する。\n

「この辺りで最高の戦士？それなら[my_duel_target.GetTitledFirstName]でしょう、[Root.GetMasterMistress]」小さな[Root.GetBoyGirl]が言った。[fellow_member.GetFirstName]はポケットから硬貨を取り出して、情報の対価として見窄らしい恰好の子供に与えた。「[my_duel_target.GetSheHe]だ！」子供が突然叫んで、道を歩いている[my_duel_target.Culture.GetName]人の[my_duel_target.GetManWoman]を指さした。

§Y[fellow_member.GetTitledFirstName]§!は戦いを熱望し、指を鳴らしています。\n

[target_ruler.Capital.GetName]のとある村を通過するとき、村民が異邦人である私の話を熱望してきた。明らかに私のような[Root.GetManWoman]を未だかつて見たことがなかったようで、私の鎧や栄光の足跡に対して崇敬の眼差しを向けてきたが、明白な敵意にさらされるまでそれほど長い時間はかからなかった。一人の[my_duel_target.GetManWoman]が「よそ者は帰れ！」と怒鳴ったのだ。
A challenge! I will duel this one!

あまりにも危険になってきた。
The legendary journey is over, for both you and §Y[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]§!.\nYou return home in shame.
[From.GetTitledName]は外国への冒険の旅の最中に亡くなった。[From.GetHerHim]と共に戦った人間ならば[From.GetSheHe]が戦士としての死を迎えたことを知っている。

[target_ruler.Capital.GetRegionalBigAnimal]は地面に倒れ、[other_combatant.GetManWoman]は私の攻撃に備えている。私は叫ぶ。「[Root.Society.GetName]のために！」私の[Root.GetDuelWeapon]が空気を裂く音がした。私が[other_combatant.GetWeaponInjuringBlow]するのを目撃したものは木々しかいない。
酔っていたが、私は自然と戦いの構えを取る。相手は驚いてよろめき、[target_ruler.Capital.GetTreeRockFence]に倒れ掛かった。[other_combatant.GetSheHe]が体勢を立て直す前に、私は[Root.GetKillingBlow]。
私が躊躇なく剣を引き寄せると群衆はまわりに散っていき、円の中で対峙することになったが、戦いは想定を超えていた。終わった時、私は喝采の中で[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]に対して静かな祈りを捧げていた。そして武器を[other_combatant.GetHerHis]の頭にドスンと振り下ろした。
キャンプから離れてすぐに、敵は武器を引いた。 風は月明かりに照らされた牧草地の上を吹きわたり、草はうねり、地面自体が呼吸しているかのように見えた。 私は「簡単すぎる。」とつぶやき、[other_combatant.GetWeaponInjuringBlow]した。

[fellow_member.GetTitledFirstName]が人々に離れるように指示を出し、[other_combatant.GetTitledFirstName]は私に突進する直前の[other_combatant.GetHerHis]の表情からは侮辱を感じた。観衆の興奮した歓声から判断して、攻撃を受け流し、守りに徹した。結局、[other_combatant.Culture.GetName]の戦士の血が通りに流れるまで群衆は増え続けた。
My opponent seems to be getting tired, [other_combatant.GetHerHis] moves becoming slower. Strengthened by the cheers of the crowd, I [Root.GetKillingBlow].

You must be lost! I proclaim, drawing my weapon. I sway a little, internally cursing the alcohol in my veins. The [other_combatant.GetManWoman]'s face darkens, and I swallow. A scout! A spy? My mind races. "Your liege knows we are here then?" I demand to know, but my opponent has already slashed my guts open. "You heathen drunk", [other_combatant.GetSheHe] mutters.

You want me to DUEL you?, the [other_combatant.GetManWoman] mocks, rolling [other_combatant.GetHerHis] eyes. The next thing I know, I am under a furious flurry of attacks, only barely keeping up with my opponent. A young girl screams as I collapse into the crowd, bloody and unable to stand any longer. "Inform [target_ruler.GetTitledFirstName], that the heathen troll is dead", is the last thing I hear.

I hear birds. It must be dawn, I think to myself. Why does my face feel cold, my limbs frozen...? Tensing, I cannot move. What happened? We fought on a meadow, the moon was guiding me, and... I fell. That blasted scout skewered me, with [other_combatant.GetHerHis] sword. Oh [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName], welcome me to your side...

[other_combatant.GetTitledFirstName]は武器を勢いよく振り回し、まるで私に飛びかかって来るように見える。[fellow_member.GetTitledFirstName]は道の脇に子供を避難させ、群衆に下がれと叫んだ。相手の剣術は実戦用というより見てくれを重視している様に見えたし、気づけば見世物じみてきていた。そのとき突然、[other_combatant.GetHerHis]の武器が私の胸に沈み込んだ。
伝説の旅路は前進します\n
伝説の旅路は§G大きく§!前進します\n

[Root.Capital.GetName]に帰還すると、[Root.GetLegendaryReturnReception][Root.GetCapitalHolding]中が祝いの旗で飾り付けられ、あなたの[my_beloved.GetRootRelation]である[my_beloved.GetTitledFirstName]が笑顔で出迎えてくれた。[Root.GetLegendaryAchievementSummary]\n\n[Root.GetCapitalHolding]の奥から[Root.Society.GetName]が戦いの歌を歌い、その旋律によってあなたは祝典へと誘われる。
everyone seems happy to have you back. A lot of them ask what you are going to do next. "Surely, you still have things to do?"
your servants and household members trip over themselves to greet you, the victorious warrior returned.
戦士も平民もあなたを見つけると気絶しそうなほど歓喜した――ある[Root.GetManWomanOpp]は馬上のあなたが供を従えて近づくと、本当に気絶してしまった。
I am just happy to have you home, my [Root.GetLordLady].
「説明していただきたい噂がいくつかあると思っています。我が[Root.GetLordLady]」[my_beloved.GetSheHeCap]はにやにやして付け加えた「それとも脚色して、でしょうかね？」

「吟遊詩人は末代までこの偉業を歌い伝えるでしょう！百人の軍隊や野生の[target_ruler.Capital.GetRegionalBigAnimal]の群れを倒したと言っていますよ！？何人かが捕虜にとられて、それから……」[my_beloved.GetGirlWomanBoyMan]の声は次第に小さくなり、落ち着きを取り戻して言った。\n「我が[Root.GetLordLady]よ、お帰りなさいませ」

[From.GetTitledName], your [From.GetRootRelation], has left this earthly realm, but tales of [From.GetHerHis] adventures are all around us. The memory of the [From.GetChineseComplimentAdjective] warrior-[From.GetManWoman] is sure to live on, if not in the hearts of [From.GetHerHis] companions, so in the blood of [From.GetHerHis] family.\n\nA hero has left us.

They say that everyone in the [From.GetCapitalHolding] of [From.Capital.GetName] spent several moons preparing for the return of [From.GetTitledName]. The [From.GetManWoman] has been the main source of interest and fascinating rumor since even before [From.GetSheHe] left for [target_title.GetName], but reports all agree that the pomp is well deserved. As [From.Society.GetName] celebrate this warrior's victory, we pray that our young find this living legend an ideal worthy of emulating.
May we all share in [From.GetHerHis] glory.

Having wreaked havoc in the realm of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName], the warrior scoundrel [bloodline_founder.GetTitledName] has been carving a name for [bloodline_founder.GetHerselfHimself] in blood. Our records will remember that [bloodline_founder.GetSheHe] and [bloodline_founder.GetHerHis] band of warriors have taken great pleasure in cutting their way through our countryside, fighting any willing man or woman who dared stand in their way, leaving traumatized children and devastated villagers in their wake...
It is the way of barbarians.
died trying to best $KILLER$ in a legendary duel
was slain in a legendary duel
$KILLER$との華々しい決闘に敗れ死亡した
was slain in a spectacular duel
slam my [Root.GetDuelWeapon] into [other_combatant.GetHerHis] [other_combatant.GetBodyPartInjured], soaking [other_combatant.GetHerHim] in [other_combatant.GetHerHis] own blood
slam [other_combatant.GetHerHis] [other_combatant.GetDuelWeapon] into my [Root.GetBodyPartInjured], soaking me in my own blood
結社の§Y伝説§!進捗バーを開放します\nあなたが所属する結社の全ての会員が§Y[Root.Society.GetNameCap]§!の§Y伝説§!に貢献します
太古から吟遊詩人によって謳われてきた[Root.Society.GetName]の偉業を世界に知らしめるのだ。\n

Wings brushing my shoulder, dark eyes trusting me. I... I must have been dreaming about hunting with my eagle. "My [Root.GetLordLady]! I tried to stop it, but it just flew in through the [Root.GetChamberOpening]!", an embarrassed servant blurts as I rub my eyes, realizing I can still hear the gentle cawing of a bird.
What do we have here? A new friend?
You will care for the young bird.
You get the feeling that §Y[bloodline_founder.GetTitledFirstName]§! would approve of you caring for the young bird.
Get that thing out of my chambers!

Training with my soldiers, I find myself distracted by an excited barking from the barracks. "What *is* that noise?", I finally demand to know. My sparring partner lowers [Root.GetHerHis] weapon and clears [Root.GetHerHis] throat: "It was going to be a surprise, my [Root.GetLordLady], but we got a new puppy..."
I... I *have* been missing a companion...
You will care for the dog.
You get the feeling that §Y[bloodline_founder.GetTitledFirstName]§! would approve of you caring for the dog.
Do I look like I have time to raise another dog? Come on, raise your weapon!
Someone else will care for the animal.

From playing its favorite games in the [Root.GetCapitalHolding], to warming my feet in the winter, my trusted war hound has taken its last breaths. "I will... Leave you alone with [Root.GetDogName], [Root.GetMasterMistress]" a servant says, wiping a tear from her face.
It was an honor to serve with you, friend.
おそらく、いつかあなたは新しい犬を飼うだろう。
Characters have an easier time joining §GWarrior Lodges§!
人物は狩猟鳥を飼う傾向にあります。
人物は猟犬を飼う傾向にあります。
評議会員が§Y忠臣§!になりやすい
Characters have §YSmiths§! strive to please them.
戦闘での特別なアクションを解除する。

§Y血脈§!の始祖として知られるようになります
This character is famous for their combat prowess and warrior's blood they carry in their veins. Their presence alone has people swooning.

[This.GetTitledFirstName] traveled far into foreign lands, fighting [This.GetHerHis] way through the best warriors of [This.GetHerHis] time. The [This.Founder.GetComplimentAdjective] [This.Founder.GetManWoman] was rumored to have a supernatural affinity with birds.
結社の[This.Founder.GetWarriorRole]から高い尊敬を受けるこの[This.Founder.GetComplimentAdjective][This.Founder.GetManWoman]は軍犬を引き連れて戦いに挑んだと言われている。
とりわけ回復力のある[This.Founder.GetManWoman]であった[This.Founder.GetFirstNameWithNick]はその時代最良の[This.Founder.GetWarriorRole]であることを証明した。
[This.Founder.GetFirstNameWithNick]は偉大な[This.Founder.GetWarriorRole]として、そしてそのリーダーとしても知られています。[This.Founder.GetHerHis]は異国の地への伝説的な襲撃で熱狂的な支持を集めました。

This [This.Founder.GetComplimentAdjective] [This.Founder.GetEducationRole] made a name for [This.Founder.GetHerselfHimself] fighting for [This.Founder.Society.GetName] and spreading the way of the [This.Founder.GetWarriorRole] to all who would dare challenge [This.Founder.GetHerHim].

Always ready for battle, [This.Founder.GetFirstNameWithNick] became famous for [This.Founder.GetHerHis] many victories, and being the finest [This.Founder.GetWarriorRole] [This.Founder.Society.GetName] had ever seen.

Rumored to often have gone singing into battle, [This.Founder.GetFirstNameWithNick] was a [This.Founder.GetWarriorRole] of a different time, [This.Founder.GetHerHis] deeds inspiring greatness in others for generations to come.

[This.Founder.GetFirstNameWithNick] was known as the [This.Founder.GetComplimentAdjective] leader of [This.Founder.Society.GetName] – the mention of [This.Founder.GetHerHis] courage still lights a fire in many [This.Founder.Culture.GetName] soldiers.
[This.Founder.GetBestName] was both feared and respected, not only for [This.Founder.GetHerHis] combat prowess, but for [This.Founder.GetHerHis] relentless courage.
[This.Founder.GetFirstNameWithNick]は、[This.Founder.Society.GetName]内で高く尊敬を集めた。また、[This.Founder.GetHerHis]の用兵術と戦技は巧みなことで知られ、後世まで他の[This.Founder.GetWarriorRole]達を奮い立たせた。

My [Root.GetLordLady]!, the [Root.GetWarriorRole] struggling next to me shouts. "We have to do something about these [enemy_liege.Culture.GetName] soldiers! They are gaining on us!".\n"What do you expect me to do?" I shout back over the turmoil of battle.
Clang your swords together! To the rhythm of BLOOD!
This character is known to inspire [Root.GetHerHis] companions on the battlefield, singing songs of triumph even before the battle is won.
This character is known to intimidate [Root.GetHerHis] enemies from a distance, rhythmically chanting threats of destruction upon entering a battle.
I must survive, so I can compose a ballad of my trials!
Let me sing you the one about the idiot [enemy_liege.Culture.GetName]...!
Ooh, insults? I know a song, mocking [enemy_liege.GetTitledFirstName].
Through clenched jaws, you begin humming a familiar tune, throwing your enemy off completely...!\n
Hah! I will try to remember that one, for my next battle chant!
You run away, abandoning your fellow soldiers, and leaving behind a confused enemy.\n
*gulp* Wait! Have you heard the one about the [enemy_liege.Culture.GetName] [enemy_liege.GetRegionalSmallGameAnimal]?
You attempt to talk your way out the situation. It is not entirely successful.\n
Come to hear me sing, have you?
You begin shouting a hymn of battle, the soldiers next to picking up the tune, just as you practiced...!\n
あなたの§Y血脈§!のため、この選択肢が利用可能です
§Y戦士団§!に称賛される§Y伝説的な血脈§!の一員である
Characters are NOT busy, or fighting a war
狼の戦士団は、勇気や親交の理想はもちろん、戦場で名を馳せて名誉を得るために戦う猛々しい男女によって構成されている。[norse_pagan.GetHighGodName]に敬意を表して、戦闘では毛皮を被り、個人戦闘では槍を好んで使用する。
鷲の勇士団は鳥と共に行う訓練と狩猟の古き伝統を受け継いでおり、最も誉れ高い鳥がイヌワシだ。「ベルクッチ」とも呼ばれる狩人は人生に3つのものしか必要ないと言われる。早馬、忠犬そして、馬だ。

Hunters and warriors alike look to [baltic_pagan.GetHighGodName], as the guardian of the woods. Most fighters wear animal pelts for its connection to the wilderness, and they worship trees, as the roots are seen as connected to [baltic_pagan.GetHighGodName]. At the end of the day,the Forest Walkers have but one calling: to protect the forest, the ancestral home and legacy of their ancestors.

The [finnish_pagan.GetName] do not even utter the name of the sacred animal, but draw strength from worshiping the bear, calling it 'the King and Queen of the Forest'. After hunting one, a complex ritual must take place, wherein the bear is convinced that it was not slain, but died due to fault of its own, so that its hunters may don themselves in its fur.

The members of the Silver Arrowheads worship the thundering skies, and strive to uphold an ideal of honor, guarding their fellow men and women from wrongdoing. Their families are known to hang protective symbols of arrows and bolts by their houses, to grant their heroes luck on the battlefield and shield them from storms.
水の中に時折贈り物が残されていることに気が付いた雨の走者は、[west_african_pagan.GetHighGodName]の名のもとで訓練を行い戦います。戦闘に突入するとき、彼らは青に身を包み、胸の近くに小さな呪物の象徴を掲げることで知られています。
天上から常に我々を見守って下さる灼熱の神ズンに、炎の番人は屈強であることを誓う。長時間の訓練や模擬戦によって鍛えられた戦士は、戦場では炎色の衣を身に纏いながら、淡淡とした意志の強さで知られている。

The sun always watching, the Fire Dancers vow to be a strong as the scorching being in the sky. Spending long hours training and practicing with each other, they are often clad in the colors of flame. Many admire their usage of fire, during their ceremonial fights.
守護者たちは多くのボン宗教寺院を取り巻く戦士氏族社会の恩恵だ。彼らの住む山岳地帯と同様に厳しい規律を有した迷信深い共同体出身の戦士であり、戦いの前には適切な儀式と生贄を行ったかを確かめるでしょう。

The Light Keepers are the boon of a society of warrior clans surrounding the many [bon.GetName] monasteries. Possessing a discipline as harsh as the environment they inhabit, these fighters are from a superstitious community and will always make certain to perform the appropriate rites and sacrifices, before each battle.

The Mountain Guardians train hard and maintain an expert physique, not only for the purpose of battle, but for games of sport – participating is prestigious, and the most skillful of their community are adored by everyone, commoner and noble alike.
§Y[invited_character.GetBestName]§!という名の指揮官が仕えるため宮廷に現れた。
戦士団の会員は訓練と交遊のために他の会員と決闘する。同じ地位の会員への知らせすることは義務ではない……
この任務を完了するには、対象の人物のポートレートを§G右クリック§!して、「§Y決闘§!」を選択してください。勝者は§Y[Root.Society.GetCurrency]§!を得ることができます。
時に自身の勇気を確認して自分が戦士であることを証明することは重要だ。分かりやすい方法は敵を見つけ出し決闘を行うことだ。一人でな……
この任務を完了するには、対象の人物のポートレートを§G右クリック§!して、「§Y決闘§!」を選択してください。勝者は§Y[Root.Society.GetCurrency]§!を得ることができますが、一方で、敗北してまだ息がある場合は§Y[Root.Society.GetCurrency]§!を失います...
戦士に快適な家の中で怠惰に過ごしている暇はない！領地と共に自分の名前を広げることは栄光への確かな道です。
この任務を完了するには、対象の州の所有者のポートレートを§G右クリック§!して、「§Y[From.Location.GetName]の征服§!」の開戦事由を使用して「§Y宣戦布告§!」してください。戦争の結果は得られる§Y[Root.Society.GetCurrency]§!に影響を与えます。

[hero_character.GetTitledName] of [hero_character.Society.GetName] eyes me up and down, first skeptically, but then [hero_character.GetHerHis] posture relaxes. "Say, my [Root.GetLordLady]... Are you related to [founder_target.GetTitledFirstName]?". I nod, smiling. "That [founder_target.GetManWoman] is a legend!" [hero_character.GetSheHe] laughs. "I look forward to seeing you in action", [hero_character.GetSheHe] adds, squeezing my shoulder.
Legendary or not, I'm itching for a duel, my [hero_character.GetLordLady].

[From.GetTitledName] has volunteered as my opponent. I am uncertain what [From.GetSheHe] thinks of my lineage, and judging from the whispers surrounding us as we shake hands, so is [From.GetSheHe]... "Best of luck to you both!" [hero_character.GetBestName] says, shooting [From.GetFirstName] a reassuring glance. I let go of [From.GetManWoman]'s grip, noticing the sweat of [From.GetHerHis] hand.
