[This.GetFirstName]は神学研究を奨励し、学者や司祭の積極的な後援者であったことで知られている。
[This.GetFirstName]は異端的な考えに不寛容であり、最も極端な形の[This.Religion.GetName]崇拝を促進したことで悪名高くなった。
[This.GetFirstName] has become infamous for [This.GetHerHis] intolerance of heretical thought and [This.GetHerHis] promotion of the most extreme form of [This.Religion.GetName] zealotry.
[This.GetFirstName] has become infamous for [This.GetHerHis] intolerance of heretical thought and [This.GetHerHis] promotion of the most extreme form of [This.Religion.GetName] zealotry.
[This.GetFirstName] has become infamous for [This.GetHerHis] intolerance of heretical thought and [This.GetHerHis] promotion of the most extreme form of [This.Religion.GetName] zealotry.
[This.GetFirstName] has become infamous for [This.GetHerHis] intolerance of heretical thought and [This.GetHerHis] promotion of the most extreme form of [This.Religion.GetName] zealotry.
[This.GetFirstName] has become infamous for [This.GetHerHis] intolerance of heretical thought and [This.GetHerHis] promotion of the most extreme form of [This.Religion.GetName] zealotry.
拒絶のわけを知らされるだろう。

[scoped_guardian.GetFirstName] is such a bore! [scoped_guardian.GetHerHisCap] lessons are tedious and [scoped_guardian.GetSheHe] never lets me play in peace. I think it is time for me to find a better guardian.
Do you want to play a very special game, [scoped_guardian.GetFirstName]?
Nah, I still like [scoped_guardian.GetHerHim] well enough...

[From.GetFirstName] was really insistent about showing me a present [From.GetSheHe] prepared just for me, yet, now that we are alone in [From.GetHerHis] chambers, I do not think following [From.GetHerHim] was such a good idea...
Careful, child, you might get hurt.
I was not born yesterday, you know?
Wait- What are you doing with that? Stop!
It seems I underestimated [From.GetFirstName]. [From.GetSheHeCap] did not fall for my trick and simply scolded me for trying to get [From.GetHerHim] hurt.

It has been some time since anybody at court saw [scoped_guardian.GetTitledFirstName]. The [scoped_guardian.GetManWoman] seems to have vanished without leaving a trace. [FromFrom.GetFirstName], [scoped_guardian.GetFirstName]'s ward, has been pestering me for quite some time about assigning [FromFrom.GetHerHim] to a new guardian.
I will get right on it, child.
Can add executed prisoners to the §YMacabre Banquet§!.
was embalmed and added to $KILLER$'s macabre banquet
Add [Root.GetTitledFirstName] to your collection of embalmed corpses, so that [Root.GetHerHis] sight might serve as warning to all your enemies.

Only a few hours after [From.GetHerHis] unfortunate demise, [From.GetFirstName] has joined [From.GetHerHis] traitorous peers in the main hall, fashionably dressed and propped on the long, dusty table, the vacuous gaze of [From.GetHerHis] corpse staring at the empty plates before [From.GetHerHim].
What a charming new guest we have!

It appears that my jailer has a particularly terrible fate in store for me. [FromFrom.GetSheHeCap] will have my body embalmed after my death and prop it in [From.GetHerHis] own palace like a macabre puppet to scare off [FromFrom.GetHerHis] enemies.
§Yはぐらかし§!によって評判を回復できます
Spend §YPrestige§! to cast doubt on the validity of the crimes you have recently committed.
Must NOT have used this decision in the past §Y10 years§!
A few well-placed words, mixed with a bit of bribery and coercion are surely all that is needed to obfuscate the validity of some of the vile rumors that my enemies are spreading about me...
I would never raise a hand against my kin!
How could I possibly be a murderer?
How valid can rumors without evidence be?
I will think of some better excuses.
Keeping together this intricate web of lies holding my good reputation is proving to be an increasingly difficult task.
Sometimes I wonder whether my courtiers really believe in the lies I tell them, if I really am as blameless to their eyes as I hope to be, or if instead I am surrounded by smiling enemies.
Keeping all these lies together is quite the challenging task. All this exercise has sharpened my tongue beyond what I thought to be possible.
There is always room for improvement.
People are so gullible! They are all but pawns under my control, for me to push and break as I see fit, incapable of seeing the wolf in sheep's clothing as [Root.GetSheHe] walks amongst them.
I cannot do this anymore! No matter how many people I kill, nobody believes to my accusers. Is the world gone insane?
I have grown bored with [plot_target.GetFirstName]. I think the time has come for me to conclude our delightful game and move onto my next victim.
Wait for another chance before striking.

A mysterious stranger has joined me after tonight's feast. Although [From.GetHerHis] voice sounds familiar, I cannot remember if we have met before in the haze of the dinner. We exchange pleasantries for a while, until a strange feeling makes me shiver, and I suddenly realize that we are alone.

The guest chuckles and welcomes me in a forceful embrace. Something stings me. When I push my assailant away, a stream of blood squirts from my side. The murderer tilts [assassin_plot_owner.GetHerHis] head, smiles, and slashes my throat open with a quick cut of [From.GetHerHis] knife.

I isolate [From.GetFirstName] after a dinner feast. I stalk behind my target as [From.GetSheHe] stumbles through the corridors of the palace in a drunken stupor, and catch [From.GetHerHim] in a cold embrace, plunging my blade through [From.GetHerHis] side. As [From.GetSheHe] turns to scream for help, I cut [From.GetHerHis] throat open.

The guest chuckles and welcomes me in a forceful embrace. Something stings me and I instinctively push [assassin_plot_owner.GetHerHim] away, seeing a stream of blood wetting my clothes already. Looking at my assailant's smile, I finally recognize [assassin_plot_owner.GetHerHim] as [assassin_plot_owner.GetTitledFirstName] and scream [assassin_plot_owner.GetHerHis] name.

I isolate [From.GetFirstName] after a dinner feast. I stalk behind my target as [From.GetSheHe] stumbles through the corridors of the palace in a drunken stupor, and catch [From.GetHerHim] in a cold embrace, plunging my blade through [From.GetHerHis] side. Unfortunately, the [From.GetManWoman] recognizes me and screams my name before I can finish [From.GetHerHim].

My sudden moment of panic passes as quickly as it arrived when one of my courtiers call me from the other side of the corridor. I turn back to invite the strange guest to join us in the hall once again, but [assassin_plot_owner.GetSheHe] has vanished without leaving a trace.

Just as I thought I had finally isolated [From.GetFirstName] to perform my art in peace, one of [From.GetHerHis] drunken friends stumbles upon us in the corridors of [Root.Capital.GetName], forcing me to change my plans.
I just like that, the mood is ruined.

As the guest approaches me with a few comforting words, I notice the dagger [assassin_plot_owner.GetSheHe] is hiding behind [assassin_plot_owner.GetHerHis] back and immediately push [assassin_plot_owner.GetHerHim] away, screaming for my guards. Seeing [assassin_plot_owner.GetHerHis] attempt at murder fail, my assailant flees.

Just as I am about to start my art on [From.GetFirstName], the drunken fool manages to spot my dagger and starts screaming for help. In [From.GetHerHis] desperate counterattack, [From.GetFirstName] manages to wound me, forcing me to abandon my pursuit and flee.

As the guest approaches me with a few comforting words, I notice the dagger [assassin_plot_owner.GetSheHe] is hiding behind [assassin_plot_owner.GetHerHis] back and immediately push [assassin_plot_owner.GetHerHim] on the ground, twisting the blade against [assassin_plot_owner.GetHerHim] and plunging it into [assassin_plot_owner.GetHerHis] chest.

Just as I am about to plunge my dagger through [From.GetHerHis] flesh, [From.GetFirstName] realizes the danger [From.GetSheHe] has gotten [From.GetHerselfHimself] into and reacts with surprising quickness and strength. [From.GetSheHeCap] slams me on the floor and twists my own blade against me, piercing my heart.

A wandering knight has arrived to my court, drawn in by the tales of virtue and bravery surrounding my family name. [invited_character.GetSheHeCap] claims to have traveled far and wide, searching for a liege worth following, and that [invited_character.GetSheHe] wishes to pledge [invited_character.GetHerselfHimself] to my service.
I will give you command of an army.
I am sorry, but my court is full.

A wandering bard has arrived at my court, drawn in by the great tales of valor and honor surrounding my family name. [invited_character.GetSheHeCap] claims that [invited_character.GetSheHe] wishes to pledge [invited_character.GetHerHis] loyalty to me and sing about the great deeds of my dynasty.

I have received a distraught message from a damsel in need. [From.GetTitledFirstName] is suffering under the yoke of an uncouth [From.Liege.GetManWoman] with no honor. Hearing tales of my family's reputation, [From.GetSheHe] pleads me to offer [From.GetHerHim] my protection.
My heart melts at your plea!
Fear not, my [From.GetLordLady]! I will protect you!
Unfortunately, I cannot offer assistance now.
来たる戦中の試練に備え、軍隊の訓練を特定の難事に集中させる。
Must NOT have used this decision in the past §Y10 years§!
§Y威信§!を指揮能力の向上に使う。
Only through constant practice and innovation can a commander maintain dominance over the battlefield. I must drill my troops regularly if I wish to prevail against my enemies.
We will focus on fighting on foreign territory.
We will try to improve our formations.
We need to reorganize how we deal with supply lines.
Maybe this is not the right time.

All these days spent in the field, shouting orders and hitting things have done wonders to improve my reflexes and endurance, yet they have not been good for my looks. The coarse voice, messy hair and foul stench are making me look more and more like a man than I would like to admit.

All these days spent in the field, shouting orders and hitting things have done wonders to improve my reflexes and endurance, yet they have not been good for my looks. The coarse voice, wavy nose, rough skin and foul stench are making me look more and more like a wild animal than I would like to admit.
I am too important to look like this!

Organizing formations with uneducated peasants and unexperienced officers looks like an impossible task at times. How many times can I repeat a very simple strategy before it finally enters the thick mind of my soldiers?
Losing myself to anger will only cloud my mind.
No! Stop! You are not supposed to go there!

All of this studying, training and discussing strategy has given me very little time to rest or eat. I feel that, if I am not too careful, I might soon become too weak to hold a sword or yell my orders at the troops. I have already taken on a more skeletal look and I am becoming increasingly paler.

All of this studying, training and discussing strategy has given me very little time to rest or eat. I feel that, if I am not too careful, I might soon become too weak to wear armor or yell my orders at the troops. I have developed some distinct bags under my eyes and lost some hair already.
I can always find some time for eating...
I could use to lose some weight.
I do not have time to worry about food.
Vassals are less likely to join §YFactions§!.
Issue a period of lavish festivity to strengthen the realm's diplomatic standing, either locally or abroad.
Spend §YPrestige§! to boost the §YOpinion§! of either your subjects or your neighbors.

Only by improving the relations I have with my fellow noblemen I can ensure peace and prosperity for my people. And there is no better way to do so than by exchanging gifts and organizing a few lavish feasts.
I should invite my neighbors to [Root.Capital.GetName].
Improve the §YOpinion§! that any ruler neighboring §Y[Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName]§! has of you.
I will share my wealth with the people!

[From.GetTitledFirstName] has dedicated a lot of [From.GetHerHis] time in the past weeks trying to make sure that all [From.GetHerHis] vassals understand the girth of [From.GetHerHis] prestige and generosity, holding several feasts and getting to know each of us better. [From.GetSheHeCap] has undoubtedly proven to be an enthralling [From.GetManWoman]...

[From.GetTitledFirstName] has dedicated a lot of [From.GetHerHis] time in the past weeks trying to make sure that all the neighbors of [From.PrimaryTitle.GetName] understand the girth of [From.GetHerHis] prestige and generosity, holding several feasts and attempting to know each of us better. [From.GetSheHeCap] has undoubtedly proven to be an enthralling [From.GetManWoman]...
I would never fall for [From.GetHerHis] tainted courts!
This option is available because of your religious §YDoctrine§!
An impressive display, to be sure...
I have never met anybody like [From.GetHerHim].
I hope you will accept this small gift in exchange for your hospitality and care, my [Root.GetTitle].\n[From.GetTitledFirstName]
These gems scarcely match the beauty of your eyes, yet I still hope you will accept them from your humble servant.\n[From.GetTitledFirstName]
I will never forget the warm welcome you gave me, my [Root.GetTitle]. I hope you will accept this token in return.\n[From.GetTitledFirstName]
I wish you to take this small trinket, along with all my gratitude for the excellent time we spent together during the last feast.\n[From.GetTitledFirstName]

Being such a popular public figure is proving to be more vexing than I ever thought possible. The expectations my guests have about me are quite high, and they appear very often to be focused on my appearance more than anything else. Most of the times, they will not even care of what comes out of my mouth, enthralled as they are by my voice.
If only I could avoid all of this attention...
Who needs brains when you have looks?

All these meetings and feasts I organize to keep my subjects and neighbors happy have come with no shortages of toasts to new friendships and a prosperous future. It is always quite inspiring, yet I am not sure how much dignified it is to reach the end of every night as a giggling goose.

All these meetings and feasts I organize to keep my subjects and neighbors happy have come with no shortages of toasts to new friendships and a prosperous future. It is always quite inspiring, yet I am not sure how much dignified it is to reach the end of every night as a grunting half-wit.
I should try to be more composed.

All these visits, feasts and celebrations are giving me endless new opportunities to further refine my palate with all sorts of exotic foods, and I fear that if I do not watch myself, the graceful figure I was blessed with will soon be a long-lost memory, as the paunch tightly pressing my dress can already attest.

All these visits, feasts and celebrations are giving me endless new opportunities to further refine my palate with all sorts of exotic foods, and I fear that if I do not watch myself, the fit body I was blessed with will soon be a long-lost memory, as my puffy jowls can already attest.
I should be more careful of what I eat in the future.
I could use to be at least a *bit* heavier...
Why should I make this a problem?
This ruler is sharing [Root.GetHerHis] wealth and issuing a series of festivals for [Root.GetHerHis] less fortunate subjects.
特別な§Y都市§!建築物を利用できる
The ruling dynasty has taken a special interest in §YArchitecture§!
By reorganizing the more rural areas around the city, it is possible to sustain a greater influx of travelers.
A safe network of wide stone roads can significantly increase the number and size of caravans bringing commerce to the city.
Clearing out the major pathways and establishing official outposts around the city's main roads can greatly facilitate the local garrison's efforts to defend travelers from brigands and wild animals.
A marvel of ancient empires, now restored for modern use, capable of quickly transporting water through the entire province.
特別な§Y城砦§!建築物を利用できる
The ruling dynasty has taken a special interest in §YEngineering§!

Compartmentalized wall sections within the fortress ensure that, even in case of a breach, the garrison is able to trap the attackers within the outermost sections of the castle, preventing the sacking of the entire fortress.
The killing fields allow the garrison's archers to safely keep throwing arrows and stones at the attackers even after they have breached through the main walls.
These overhanging holes embedded between the castle's corbels allow the defenders to throw rocks, bees, boiling oil and other unpleasant items at the attackers from a relatively safe position.

The latest innovation in military engineering, a reinforced barbican will force the castle's assailants through a crooked and narrow path after the breach of the main gate, exposing them to heavy retaliation from the defenders.
特別な§Y教会§!建築物を利用できる
The ruling dynasty has taken a special interest in §YReligious Architecture§!
より高く、巨大な記念碑を建設することによってのみ、天上に対する永遠の献身を示すことができる。
より高く、巨大な記念碑を建設することによってのみ、天上に対する永遠の献身を示すことができる。
より高く、巨大な記念碑を建設することによってのみ、天上に対する永遠の献身を示すことができる。
より高く、巨大な記念碑を建設することによってのみ、天上に対する永遠の献身を示すことができる。
もっと早く§Y繁栄§!を手にする
By making good use of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName]'s extensive spy network, you can greatly limit factionalism for a period of time, ensuring peace throughout the realm.
Must NOT have used this decision in the past §Y10 years§!
Any §YVassal§! is member of an existing §YFaction§!
Release your spies to force a dissolution of all §YFactions§! within the next few weeks.

All my informers are ready to relay my orders throughout [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName], using bribery and intimidation to prevent my subjects from conspiring against me and putting the realm's peace under threat.
Peace must be achieved by all means necessary!
Stop all current §YVassals§! from joining §YFactions§! for the next §Y10§! years.
Stop all current §YVassals§! from joining §YFactions§! for the next §Y6§! years.
We must not leave any room for insubordination.
Stop all current §YVassals§! from joining §YFactions§! for the next §Y4§! years.
A responsible ruler must enforce discipline.
Stop all current §YVassals§! from joining §YFactions§! for the next §Y2§! years.

The vile spies sworn to the [From.GetOnlyDynastyName] dynasty have been unleashed once more upon [From.PrimaryTitle.GetName]. Recent rumors have convinced the [From.GetTitle] that somebody might be conspiring against [From.GetHerHim] and, as has become tradition for some time now, [From.GetTitledFirstName] has sent [From.GetHerHis] cronies to pressure all of [From.GetHerHis] subjects into submission.
You are forced to disassociate from any §YFaction§! in §Y[From.PrimaryTitle.GetName]§!
It looks worse than usual, too...
Has it been a year already?

Peace is not easily ensured upon the unruly masses. Even now, my vassals keep conspiring within the inscrutable depths of their thoughts, where my spies cannot reach them. If I wish to find proof to frame them, I must be vigilant. Every cowardly twitch and bashful gaze around me betrays their treasonous hearts.
Yet, I should not let fear cloud my judgment.
A keen mind is necessary to achieve peace.

More naive rulers might claim that stability and prosperity in government is achieved through an open relation of mutual trust between a liege and [Root.GetHerHis] vassals, yet nothing could be further from the truth. To give my subjects any reprieve from scrutiny would only invite insubordination and chaos.
All that said, I should show them some compassion.
The more I squeeze, the tighter my grip over them.

It is my sworn duty to uphold the peace over [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName]. In order to do so, I must crush any form of organized resistance coming from my rebellious subjects. Hardening my heart against their entitled demands is something that I do for their own good.
I am nothing if not just.
Not that I mind doing it, of course.
特別な§Y城砦§!建築物を利用できる
The ruling dynasty has taken a grim interest in §YEngineering§!

An austere and imposing statue, representing one of the esteemed members of the realm's ruling dynasty. Its cold, stern gaze overlooks the battlements, inspiring a lingering sense of dread amongst the masses.
An intricate network of watchtowers ensures that the garrison of this fortress can maintain absolute control over anything happening within the castle.
An isolated tower, built not too far from the main castle, providing the garrison with an advanced outpost and a more secretive place to deal with inconvenient prisoners.
A massive building raised within the fortress' walls, surrounded by bloodied pikes and overlooking a large execution stand.
§Y文化技術の研究§!に更なる効果がある
§Y宮廷の牧師§!の§Y郡§!の改宗の速度が向上します
Each member of our prestigious family must serve as an example of class and nobility if we wish to maintain our renown.
Must NOT have used this decision in the past §Y5 years§!
This character has been recently reminded of [Root.GetHerHis] marital duty to procreate heirs for [Root.GetHerHis] dynasty.

I worry about [meddling_target.GetFirstName]. If [meddling_target.GetSheHe] is going to represent the prestigious [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName] name, [meddling_target.GetHerHis] bearing and behavior should be impeccable.
I have a few words about [meddling_target.GetHerHis] habits...
A [meddling_target.GetManWoman] of [meddling_target.GetHerHis] stature should strive for a better image.
Try to improve §Y[meddling_target.GetTitledFirstName]§!'s look and bearing.
On second thought, I think [meddling_target.GetSheHe] is fine.
I need to help [meddling_target.GetHerHim] take care of [From.GetHerselfHimself].
[meddling_target.GetSheHeCap] should take [meddling_target.GetHerHis] marital responsibilities more seriously!
[From.GetSheHeCap] should start acting like a proper [scoped_founder.Culture.GetName].
[meddling_target.GetSheHeCap] should focus more on [meddling_target.GetHerHis] responsibilities and less on [meddling_target.GetHerHis] looks.
Would it kill [meddling_target.GetHerHim] to brush [meddling_target.GetHerHis] hair every once in a while?
[meddling_target.GetSheHeCap] always looks so frail! Does [meddling_target.GetSheHe] eats anything at all?
Try to convince §Y[meddling_target.GetTitledFirstName]§! to eat more.
A new diet might improve §Y[meddling_target.GetTitledFirstName]§!'s health.
[meddling_target.GetSheHeCap] is always eating, I worry about [From.GetHerHis] health.
Try to convince §Y[meddling_target.GetTitledFirstName]§! to eat less.

My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] decided to visit me last night. [From.GetSheHeCap] has been concerned with my health as of late, and wanted to remind me that [From.GetSheHe] is always going to be ready to support me, and so is the rest of our family.
そう言われてほっとした。

I have just received a long, stern chiding from my [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] about my current conduct. [From.GetSheHeCap] has berated me for surrendering to vice and apathy in such a way as to bring dishonor to our prestigious family name, and urged me to change my attitude immediately.

My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] has decided to give me a long talk about the virtues and responsibilities of a good [Root.GetManWoman] towards [Root.GetHerHis] family, about the necessity to remain faithful to one's spouse, build a relationship based on trust and respect, and, most importantly, maintain the bloodline going with new heirs.
I will try to do better.

My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] has been pressuring me for quite some time now to fall in line with the [scoped_founder.Culture.GetName] customs upon which our great dynasty has been founded. According to [From.GetHerHim], only by embracing this culture I will be able to set good morals for my descendants to follow.
That is ridiculous! I was raised [Root.Culture.GetName]!

My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] believes that I spend too much time worrying about my looks and not enough studying and tending to my responsibilities as a [Root.GetTitle], that I am wasting my youth as a vacuous fop and I will come to regret it in time.

My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] believes that I spend too much time worrying about my looks and that I will come to regret wasting my youth in such a vapid when my beauty has shriveled away and I am left with a wrinkled body and an empty head.
I will heed your words, dear [GetFromRelation]!
You are just jealous because you are old!

My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] believes that I do not spend enough time taking care of my image, that it is extremely important for a young [Root.GetManWoman] of my stature to always appear at my best before my subjects. [From.GetSheHeCap] insists that by neglecting myself I smear my family's good name.

My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] thinks that I am too loud and crass, that I spend too much time managing menial court affairs while forsaking my own grooming. [From.GetSheHeCap] insists that a young [Root.GetLordLady] of my stature should always strive to look at [Root.GetHerHis] best, projecting an aura of grace and dignity by [Root.GetHerHis] very presence.
I have bigger responsibilities than looking pretty!

My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] has been encouraging me for some time now to try and eat more, fearing that my frugal diet might cause me to get seriously sick, and that my frail disposition might reflect badly on our family's prestige.

My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] has been encouraging me for some time now to try and eat more, insisting that I need to be sturdier if I wish to deliver strong children, and that my frail disposition might reflect badly on our family's prestige.

My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] has been encouraging me for some time now to try and eat less, fearing that immoderation in my diet might cause me to get seriously sick and, more importantly, that it might put a stain on our family's good name.

For some time now my [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] has been making comments insinuating that I might be gaining too much weight, and that I should exert more moderation, especially during court dinners, as it is unfit for a [Root.GetLordLady] of my stature to be seen eating so much.

My [GetFromRelation] has heeded my call and finally embraced [From.Culture.GetName] customs. I am certain that [From.GetHerHis] new attitude will lead [From.GetHerHim] to treat [From.GetHerHis] subjects with decency and justice, and allow [From.GetHerHim] to teach good morals to [From.GetHerHis] children.
Now we truly look like [GetFromRelation] and [From.GetRootRelation]!

My [GetFromRelation] has stubbornly refused to listen to my advice. [From.GetFirstName] insists that [From.GetSheHe] was born and grown [From.Culture.GetName] and will not abandon the proud and moral traditions of [From.GetHerHis] culture.
How else can I make [From.GetHerHim] understand?

My [GetFromRelation] has taken to heart my advice and sacrificed some of the time [From.GetSheHe] wasted at the altar of vanity to focus on [From.GetHerHis] responsibilities instead. [From.GetFirstName] might not be quite as much the charmer with the ladies at court as [From.GetSheHe] used to be, but it is for [From.GetHerHis] own good.

My [GetFromRelation] has taken to heart my advice and sacrificed some of the time [From.GetSheHe] wasted at the altar of vanity to focus on [From.GetHerHis] responsibilities instead. [From.GetFirstName] might not be quite as much popular with the young lords and bards at the court as [From.GetSheHe] used to be, but it is for [From.GetHerHis] own good.

[From.GetFirstName] and I have never been as close as since I convinced my [GetFromRelation] to forsake empty vanity to focus on more concrete responsibilities. The rest of the court might see us as coarse and uncivilized, but we both know better now.
A sharp mind trumps a pretty face.
Perhaps I was too harsh with [From.GetHerHim]?

My [GetFromRelation] refused to follow my advice and is still spending an undue amount of time grooming [From.GetHerselfHimself] while neglecting some of [From.GetHerHis] responsibilities. I fear that [From.GetSheHe] is too enamored with [From.GetHerHis] own image to see how [From.GetHerHis] behavior is hampering is growth as a [From.GetManWoman].

Following my advice, my [GetFromRelation] has finally started to take better care of [From.GetHerselfHimself] and is slowly learning how to properly act at court. Even I was surprised to see how much more charming [From.GetSheHe] could become just by cleaning [From.GetHerHis] face and speaking more softly.

Following my advice, my [GetFromRelation] has finally started to take better care of [From.GetHerselfHimself] and is slowly learning how to properly act at court. [From.GetFirstName] looks more and more like a proper [From.GetLordLady] with each passing day. Bards might soon start writing songs about [From.GetHerHim].

By following my advice, [From.GetFirstName] has become quite the charmer. Maidens that would not have given [From.GetHerHim] a second look before are now filling the palace with their feverish gossiping about my [GetFromRelation]. I have never felt as proud of [From.GetHerHim] before.

By following my advice, [From.GetFirstName] has become quite the charmer. Young men that would not have given [From.GetHerHim] a second look before are now hopelessly competing for [From.GetHerHis] favor and attention, following my [GetFromRelation] whenever [From.GetSheHe] goes. I have never felt as proud of [From.GetHerHim] before.
You are finally starting to look like a proper [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName]!
I hope [From.GetSheHe] does not go too far now...

[From.GetFirstName] refuses to listen to reason. My [GetFromRelation] seems to prefer acting like a wild animal, loud and uncivilized, too absorbed by [From.GetHerHis] own petty interests to understand how [From.GetHerHis] crass demeanor is costing [From.GetHerHim] the respect of [From.GetHerHis] peers and the dignity of [From.GetHerHis] family name.

I am glad to see my [GetFromRelation] has taken my advice to heart and started to eat more. A young, healthy [From.GetManWoman] of [From.GetHerHis] status should work on developing a robust and imposing figure, worthy of fear and respect.

I am glad to see my [GetFromRelation] has taken my advice to heart and started to eat more. A young, healthy [From.GetManWoman] of [From.GetHerHis] status should work on developing a robust frame and birthing hips.

Feeling [From.GetFirstName] encroaching on my place at the dinner table, I stick my elbow in [From.GetHerHis] gut, prompting my [GetFromRelation] to raise [From.GetHerHis] head from the plate. [From.GetSheHeCap] proclaims that there soon will not be enough space for both of us in the hall, at which point we both erupt in a bellowing laughter.

[From.GetFirstName] rests back [From.GetHerHis] head with a sleepy expression, pressing a napkin on [From.GetHerHis] mouth to suppress a belch. I point at the paunch pressing against [From.GetHerHis] dress and comment that, with such commitment to [From.GetHerHis] new diet, my [GetFromRelation] will soon outrank me as the largest member of our family.

Yet again, I meet my [GetFromRelation]'s gaze with scornful disdain across the dinner table, seeing [From.GetHerHim] refuse to finish [From.GetHerHis] first course. [From.GetFirstName] has completely ignored my advice.

My [GetFromRelation] has decided to follow my advice and finally change [From.GetHerHis] dieting practices. [From.GetFirstName] looks much more lean and spry already, as a [From.GetManWoman] of [From.GetHerHis] age should.

My [GetFromRelation] has decided to follow my advice and finally change [From.GetHerHis] dieting practices. [From.GetFirstName] looks much more graceful and delicate already, as a [From.GetManWoman] of [From.GetHerHis] age should.

Ever since [From.GetFirstName] decided to follow my advice, we have spent much more time together, eschewing the crass excesses of evening dinners for relaxing walks outside and quiet contemplation. My [GetFromRelation] has never looked better, having acquired a much more humble and collected figure, not unlike my own.

Ever since [From.GetFirstName] decided to follow my advice, we have spent much more time together, eschewing the crass excesses of evening dinners for relaxing walks outside and quiet contemplation. My [GetFromRelation] has never looked better, having acquired a much more diaphanous and elegant figure, not unlike my own.

Yet again, I meet my [GetFromRelation]'s gaze with scornful disdain across the dinner table, seeing [From.GetHerHim] demand another course for [From.GetHerselfHimself]. [From.GetFirstName] has completely ignored my advice.
This commander is focusing the training of [Root.GetHerHis] soldiers on stealth and espionage, making them more adept at seeping through the defenses of foreign armies.
By refining coordination between [Root.GetHerHis] troops, this commander has reduced the time required to mobilize [Root.GetHerHis] army.
By strengthening of communications and exploration efforts, this commander has increased the autonomy of [Root.GetHerHis] armies while in enemy territory.

I am thoroughly impressed by how seriously my [GetFromRelation] has taken on my advice to be an exemplar spouse. [From.GetFirstName] has acquired a reputation for courtly manners and undying loyalty of the kind that only bards sing about when referring to Princes in fairy tales.

I am thoroughly impressed by how seriously my [GetFromRelation] has taken on my advice to be an exemplar spouse. [From.GetFirstName] has acquired a reputation for unblemished fealty and staunch chastity of the kind that only bards sing about when referring to Princesses in fairy tales.

I am thoroughly impressed by well my talk with my [GetFromRelation] went. [From.GetFirstName] now fully understands the mutual bounds and responsibilities that bind us together, both in marriage and blood, and has taken on a completely new and inspiring attitude when it comes to upholding the sanctity of our union.
We truly are of one mind!
I could not ask for a more virtuous [GetFromRelation]!

The challenges that [This.Founder.GetFullName] overcame on [This.Founder.GetHerHis] rise to power were so great that the very blood that courses through [This.Founder.GetHerHis] veins is considered legendary.
A master with any weapon, [This.Founder.GetFullName] was always the first into war and the last off the battlefield.
[This.Founder.GetFullName] is said to have been one of the most beautiful [This.Founder.GetMenWomen] to ever live, not to mention a fantastic lover.
The lisp of this character sometimes causes them to mispronounce words.
I guess I'll just wait until nobody is around.

Ancestral legends tell of a time when the three brothers, Lech, Czech and Rus, went their own way to find fertile lands for their people. Today, countless generations later, all the children of this same ancestral blood are united under my rule, so it is only fit that we rid ourselves of our old and petty borders and formally establish one land in which all slavs will be as brothers and sisters.

Centuries ago, the three brothers Lech, Czech and Rus, our venerable ancestors, parted ways to settle their people. Divided by rivers, forests, mountains and wicked conquerors since time immemorial, we proved that blood is thicker than water, as today we celebrate the unification of all brothers and sisters of the great plain.
Together we will stand impervious to the tests of time!

§Y交易所§!は§Yサハラ縦断交易路§!沿いの一部の州でのみ建設できます。\n 有効な州を表示するには、§Y交易圏マップモード§!を開く

交易路によって以下の影響を受けます：
$MODIFIER$

交易路に建てられた交易所によって全ての州の補正を増加させます。交易路が包囲や占領によって封鎖されている場合、交易は振り分けられ他の交易路は一時的に高いボーナスを得ます。

If active, the Trade Route would give the following effects:
$MODIFIER$

Trade posts built in Trade Route counties increase the modifier for all provinces. If some Trade Route provinces are blocked (by siege or occupation), other Trade Route provinces temporarily get a higher bonus as trade is redirected.
交易所は、商業共和国の都市貴族一族が沿岸部に（他国の領土であっても）§Y$COST$§!¤で建設します。また州に交易路が通っていれば、地元の領主も交易所を建設することができます。（§Y交易圏§!マップモードを参照）
交易所は、商業共和国の都市貴族一族が沿岸部に（他国の領土であっても）§Y$COST$§!で建設します。また州に交易路が通っていれば、地元の領主も交易所を建設することができます。（§Y交易圏§!マップモードを参照）
These barracks provide [coptic.GetName] rulers with a strong force of spearmen to hold a defensive line against the enemy.
These barracks provide [assyrian.GetName] ruler with a strong force of infantry, capable of both offensive and defensive battles.
アレキサンダー大王の不滅の血筋
Thanks to the efforts of [This.GetTitledFirstName], the [This.GetOnlyDynastyName] dynasty has been universally acknowledged as being directly descended from Alexander the Great.
アショーカ大王の転生者
[This.GetTitledFirstName] has been acclaimed by many wise men as the next reincarnation of the great Ashoka, unifier of India.
アレキサンダー大王の血筋

アレクサンドロス大王に関する伝説やアジアを横断する彼の壮大な偉業は、世界中の人々に知られている。多くの若い支配者たちが、この伝説的な人物の不朽の業績を見習おうと、絶望的な試みの中で命を落としてきた。\n若くして死んだアレクサンドロスは、たった一人の子供をもうけただけで、多くの業績をあげたにもかかわらず、王朝を設立することができず、悲劇的なことに帝国はその誕生後すぐに滅亡してしまった。\nあらゆる信条や国家の支配者たちは、自分たちの祖先をアレクサンデルの血統に連なるものであると主張しているが、そのような名声を求める主張を仲間や臣民に認めてもらうことができた者はいない。
私が最初の成功者となる!
§Yアレクサンドロスの血脈§!に連なるという主張を捏造する。
アレキサンダー大王の墓

The location of the hallowed grounds where the great conqueror was put to his final rest has been a contested topic for millennia. Many Roman Emperors of old have claimed to have visited the tomb of Alexander during their rise to power, yet its true location still eludes modern scholars.\nThe recovery of my ancestor's sacred remains would surely strengthen my claim to his bloodline. As [Root.GetTitle] of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName], I am closer than most contenders to the most likely locations, yet wasting time and resources in a quest that many have already failed to accomplish in the past might not be the wisest course of action.

The location of the hallowed grounds where the great conqueror was put to his final rest has been a contested topic for millennia. Many Roman Emperors of old have claimed to have visited the tomb of Alexander during their rise to power, yet its true location still eludes modern scholars.\nThe recovery of my ancestor's sacred remains would surely strengthen my claim to his bloodline. Yet wasting time and resources in a quest that many have already failed to accomplish in the past might not be the wisest course of action, especially given how far my expedition would have to travel to reach the most likely locations of the tomb.
Use your §YIntrigue§! and invest §YWealth§! to attempt to find §YAlexander's Tomb§!
Establishing a valid claim would be a better investment of resources.
Use your §YLearning§! and invest §YWealth§! to attempt to establish a claim on §YAlexander's Family§!
This search is taking too much of my time and resources.
Abandon your quest to claim §YAlexander's Bloodline§!.

No sooner Alexander had passed on that his generals had already started fighting for possession over his body. They knew that the one amongst them who became guardian of his remains would be acclaimed as his true successor.\nAnd in the same way, I am certain that by ensuring the recovery of Alexander's body my claim to his ancestry will be stronger than any upstart [Root.Culture.GetName] ruler. Having already spent several weeks consulting the most learned scholars in the realm to gather more information regarding the tomb's possible locations, it is now time for me to invest in a proper expedition to uncover the ancient sepulcher.
By investing a large amount of resources, you will greatly increase your chances of success.
I will buy the best equipment money can buy.
By investing a good amount of resources, you will increase your chances of success.
I cannot bankrupt my realm for this venture!
By investing a moderate amount of resources, you will decrease your chances of success.
The bare minimum is all I can afford.
By investing a small amount of resources, you will greatly decrease your chances of success.

Historians agree that Alexander had a son, named after him, born of a Bactrian Princess, yet the life of this child is shrouded by mystery. The Empire he was supposed to inherit from his father had long been split amongst greedy warlords by the time Alexander's son became a man, making it impossible for him to succeed.
Fearing retaliation from the Diadochi, it is no surprise that Alexander's wife would flee from his army and hide the child from assassination attempts.
It is not so far-fetched to think that their descendants found refuge to [Root.Capital.GetName] eventually, and split into the [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName].
My scholars only need to find the right references in the ancient accounts of my dynasty to uncover this prestigious link.
I will provide you with everything you need.
I will have the court library expanded to accommodate new books.
Surely, a few more papers will be enough?

The valiant members of my expedition have finally returned to [Root.Capital.GetName].
They bring a marvelous gift with them: a mummified corpse, covered in ancient jewels that they claim to belong to my distinguished ancestor.
After a long consultation with my scholars, who carefully examine every detail of the body, I am certain that the expedition has been successful.
After having been lost for so many centuries, the body of Alexander the Great has finally been found, and I am the one responsible for its recovery. The only thing that remains for my claim to Alexander's ancestry to become unobjectionable, is to make this news known throughout the world.
Send out every messenger, inform every crier!
Everybody must know of this great discovery!
I should make sure all my subjects know of this.
An official statement should be enough.

The valiant members of my expedition have finally returned to [Root.Capital.GetName].\nUnfortunately, they do not bring much with them. A few rusted jewels and fragments of a skulls, which my scholars quickly dismiss as too recent to belong to the great conqueror.\nDespite the alleged care and efforts that they put into their search, my men were unable to succeed, wasting a considerable amount of my time and resources for nothing.
We must try again! That tomb must be somewhere!
Forget the tomb, we will pursue another path.
I have been ruined enough by this foolish venture.

It took us countless sleepless nights spent reading ancient tomes and pursuing forgotten scrolls, but we have finally achieved our goal. Under my lead, my group of scholars has been able to trace a lineage from the earliest known members of the [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName] dynasty and the most plausible line of descendants of the glorious conqueror himself.\nThe only thing that is left now is to validate my claim in the eyes of my peers and subjects.\nMany envious upstarts are sure likely to dismiss my findings, jealous of my illustrious ascendancy. I will need to make sure that their voices are drowned out in the celebration for this momentous discovery.

Despite all the sleepless nights, hundreds of researched scrolls and learned scholars, my efforts to find a link between my dynasty and Alexander's unknown descendants has been fruitless.
Surely, a man that has traveled so far and wide, that has achieved so much during his brief life and earned eternal glory would not allow his glorious line to die out.
And a dynasty as powerful as mine, who has risen to hold the most esteemed throne of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] must surely trace its ancestry to the great conqueror himself.
Why is it then so hard for me to find the link between us?
Maybe I should focus my attention on Alexander's tomb.
We just need to look harder!
アレキサンダー大王の血を継ぐもの
何年もの研究と投資を経て、ついに目標を達成し、一族の血脈が歴史上最も偉大な征服者の一人に繋がるということを立証した。\n私が死んでからも、人々は長きにわたり私の子孫を畏敬の念をもって眺め、戦場で彼らに会うことを考えるだけで震え上がるだろう。\n我らの血の中にはエジプトを征服したのと同じ力、バビロンを陥落させたのと同じ英知、一人の男を文明の中心から世界の果てまで旅させたのと同じ野望が流れている。
永遠の栄光が我らを待っている!

Despite my best efforts, my peers have yet to recognize the legitimacy of my claim to Alexander's ancestry.\nEven worse, my own subjects have reacted with apathy and skepticism to the news about my dynasty's prestigious founder. My councilors believe that the people are simply too ignorant to understand the importance of my discovery, while my peers are merely envious of its implications.\nFor one reason or the other, my quest is not over yet. My claim will have no value for as long as it is not universally recognized.
We need more celebrations and exposure!
The voice of the [Root.GetTitle] of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] will be heard!
There must be a way to educate those peasants...
It is no use. This was nothing but a huge waste of time.
アレキサンダー大王の血を継ぐもの

There have been many rumors about [From.GetTitledFirstName] recently.\nUsing the help of charlatans, sorcerers and grave-robbers, the [From.GetTitle] of [From.PrimaryTitle.GetName] has fabricated a ludicrous claim to Alexander's the Great dynasty. Many rulers have made such ludicrous assertions in the past, trying to latch onto the glorious name of the ancient conqueror, yet none had been taken seriously, until now.\nBy associating [From.GetHerHis] family to Alexander, [From.GetTitledFirstName] has succeeded in increasing enormously the prestige of the [From.GetOnlyDynastyName] for centuries to come.
How can people fall for such a blatant fabrication?
And I could not be happier for us!

Ashoka is remembered by many for his outstanding military victories and his wise and prosperous rule. Under his lead, all of India was unified and at peace.\nOf all the dynasties who hopelessly wasted their lives trying to emulate his accomplishments, mine was the closest to succeed. I have been pondering as of recently if the accomplishments of my family in reunifying India and holding it under a just and enlightened rule should be proof that the glorious spirit of Ashoka is being reincarnated through our bloodline, all the way to myself.

Ashoka is remembered by many for his outstanding military victories and his wise and prosperous rule. Under his lead, all of India was unified and at peace.\nMany rulers have wasted their lives hopelessly trying to emulate his accomplishments. As the [Root.GetTitle] of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName], I have certainly come closer than most, and I wonder now if the feats of my family are proof enough that the glorious spirit of Ashoka is being reincarnated through our bloodline, all the way to myself.
We must get to the root of this question!
§Yアショーカの血脈§!に連なるという主張を捏造する。
The very thought betrays my impurity.

Being already responsible for the reunification of India, my family has a greater claim to Ashoka's legacy than any other [Root.Culture.GetName] ruler, yet, in order for me to be formally recognized as a reincarnation of the enlightened Devanampiya Piyadassi, I must submit myself to the judgment of the wisest amongst us.\nI will call for the oldest and most prestigious Brahmins in India and allow them to examine my life and judge my character, so that they can confirm to my peers and subjects what I already know is the truth.

As a celebrated [Root.GetTitle] of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName], I have already a greater claim to Ashoka's legacy than many other [Root.Culture.GetName] rulers, yet, in order for me to be formally recognized as a reincarnation of the enlightened Devanampiya Piyadassi, I must submit myself to the judgment of the wisest amongst us.\nI will call for the oldest and most prestigious Brahmins in India and allow them to examine my life and judge my character, so that they can confirm to my peers and subjects what I already know is the truth.
We will take all precautions when hosting the wise ones.
They will be given our best accommodations.
We will treat them with the utmost care.
I am sure they will be honored to assist me.

The wise Brahmins that have gathered in [Root.Capital.GetName] to examine and determine whether I am worthy of calling myself heir to Ashoka or not claim that, before anything else, I must prove my courage to them.\nDespite being born the youngest of Maurya Bindusara's sons and from a mere lowborn, he proved unparalleled bravery during the course of his life, surpassing all of his siblings to arise as a paragon of virtue and discipline.\nIf I truly am the new lion of India, it should be easy for me to prove that I have the fortitude to meet my bold claim.
I will let my deeds speak for themselves...
Allow me to enlighten you with tales of my valor.
But where is the line between bravery and recklessness?
Speak! Whatever the challenge, I will take on it!
I submit myself to your judgment.
What- What kind of proof do you need?
The §YBrahmins§! will examine your conduct and deliver their judgment when they feel satisfied.

It has been months now, yet the Brahmins are unsatisfied with my conduct.
They claim that I have failed to meet the standards of Ashoka's divine valor, of his enlightened leadership in battle and strategic skills.
If I truly am is reincarnation, I should not dread the prospect of facing my enemies and my insecurities. 
Until I have proven to them the purity of my intent, they will not allow me to proceed to the next phase of their test.
I assure you, I will not disappoint you.
If only you could tell me more precisely what you expect of me...
I think you should  re-examine your definition of fear.
What more can I do to prove myself?
I will try my best to impress you.
I am not so sure about this...
This is impossible! Your standards are too high!
Abandon your quest to claim §YAshoka's Bloodline§!.

Ashoka's father may have been an Emperor, but his mother was a common woman, the daughter of a poor Brahmin, and he was but the last of a large litter of Princes.\nAlthough in time he arose far above his station, outshining both his siblings and his old father, it is only thanks to his humble beginnings that Ashoka was able to rule with justice and kindness over the many people of India, achieving harmony between our various creeds and customs.\nIf I am Ashoka's new form, then I must remember the low beginnings of my previous life and share his humility.
Let us talk of his story one more time, wise ones.
If I were proud, would I submit myself to your judgment?
Humility is relative to one's state.
I submit to your judgment, wise ones.
How can I possibly prove that?
Of course! I am the most humble [Root.GetTitle] ever!

Despite my many attempts to convince them otherwise, the Brahmins are not satisfied by my display of humility. They claim that my demeanor betrays the inner smugness of somebody born within the highest echelons of nobility, somebody that has no knowledge nor memory of hunger and anonymity.\nA few of them are convinced that my very desire to be recognized as the heir to Ashoka is proof enough of my unbridled pride.
I understand your concerns, but let us discuss the matter further.
Is your test not faulty to begin with then?
Could we better determine the requirements of your test?
I can only hope you to reconsider your judgment.
他にできることがあるとでも？
But I am humble! Are you blind?!
Enough. I cannot possibly prove this.

According to legend, Siddhartha Gautama was the first to predict the coming of Ashoka. The Gift of Dust, the story holding his prophecy, tells of a time when Ashoka, born as Jaya in one of his previous lives, saw Buddha wandering the streets of his village while playing in the mud. The child, taken by his desire to offer something to the wanderer, threw a fistful of dirt in the Tathagata's bowl.\nBuddha, moved by his gesture, predicted that Jaya would be reborn as Ashoka, Emperor of all India.\nThe Brahmins state that, in order to be acknowledged as Ashoka's new form, I will need to prove that I am just as charitable.
Behold, wise ones, the girth of my munificence!
Oh, yes, I understand what you mean, wise ones...
But how should be valued a gift requested?
I suppose I could make a show of charity...
I imagine a second fistful of dust will not be enough?

The Brahmins are not satisfied with my show of charity.\nThey claim that merely giving some gold to the less fortunate is not enough to prove the true purity of intent that Jaya showed when he met Buddha. When Ashoka's past form had almost nothing, he was still driven to share what little he had to a complete stranger.\nThey say that my display is vacuous at best in comparison as the gifts that I am giving to my subjects I will take back in time as their [Root.GetTitle].
I shall give more than they could ever repay me!
Perhaps it is you who require some of my charity?
How can I fill the hole in this bowl, wise ones?
I have to care for the realm's stability as well.
Still not enough to compare to a bowl of dirt?!
Enough. I have spent too much already.

It was not an easy task to convince the Brahmins, but their final response was inevitable.
It was only a matter of time before my true nature was revealed for all the world to admire. 
I am the last incarnation of Ashoka, the great unifier of India.
By returning in the form of [Root.GetFullName] I have led the people of this great land to peace and prosperity just as I did in my past life, and just like my successors will do after I leave this body.

It was not an easy task to convince the Brahmins, but their final response was inevitable.
It was only a matter of time before my true nature was revealed for all the world to admire. 
I am the last incarnation of Ashoka, the great unifier of India.
By returning in the form of [Root.GetFullName] I will unify the people of this great land under a new Empire of Harmony and Virtue, just like I did in my past life and just like my successors will continue to do after I leave this body.

After a long, laborious ordeal, [From.GetTitledFirstName] has been announced by a council of Brahmins as the new incarnation of Devanampiya Piyadassi.\nAfter having unified India once already in the form of Ashoka, this enlightened spirit has been reborn in the [From.GetOnlyDynastyName] and achieve this glorious feat a second time.\nUnder [From.GetHerHis] rule, India is sure to know peace, prosperity and harmony for centuries to come.

After a long, laborious ordeal, [From.GetTitledFirstName] has been announced by a council of Brahmins as the new incarnation of Devanampiya Piyadassi.\nAfter having unified India once already in the form of Ashoka, this enlightened spirit has been reborn in the [From.GetOnlyDynastyName] and [From.GetSheHe] is now set to achieve this glorious feat for the second time.\nUnder [From.GetHerHis] rule, India is sure to know peace, prosperity and harmony for centuries to come.

My prestigious ancestor had already conquered the known world as a young man, bringing the Persian Empire to its knees and traveling all the way from Greece to India, and how much did I accomplish in the same time? How many great conquests have I achieved in my youth?

My prestigious ancestor had already conquered the known world as a young man, unifying all of the different people of India under one rule, and how much did I accomplish in the same time? How many great conquests have I achieved in my youth?
I was never meant to be a conqueror.
What have I done with my life?
§Y宗教解放§!戦争を呼びかけることができる
領国の未来はこの子の生死にかかっています。このように、[Root.GetHerHis]の 両親は、大切な赤ちゃんが大人になるまで安全に過ごせるよう、あらゆる注意を払っています。

I am concerned about the health of poor [From.GetFirstName]. This realm requires a strong and healthy heir in order to prosper, yet my my child was not born under the best stars. It is my duty as a responsible [Root.Religion.GetName] [Root.GetTitle] to take all possible precautions in order to ensure a smooth succession.
私の愛する[From.GetSonDaughter][From.GetFirstName]の未来について心配になることがある。我が国の繁栄のために屈強で健康的な後継者が求められており、[Root.Religion.GetName][Root.GetTitle]の円滑な継承のために取り得る対策は全て講じる義務が私にはある。
The stars will reveal the future of my heir!
Issue a closer reading of §Y[From.GetFirstName]§!'s horoscope, entrusting the child's future to your §YPiety§! and §YLearning§!.
細心の注意を払って[From.GetHerHim]を育てよう。
[From.GetSheHeCap]はあらゆる危険から守られなければならない。
[From.GetSheHe]なら乗り越えらるでしょう……

Despite [FromFrom.GetHerHis] sickly birth, the horoscope guarantees an almost certain recovery for little [FromFrom.GetFirstName]. And not only that! The child has clearly been born under very auspicious stars and is likely to become a great leader!

A closer inspection of [FromFrom.GetFirstName]'s horoscope has revealed that my child was born under extremely auspicious stars and that [FromFrom.GetSheHe] will likely grow to become a great leader once I have passed to the next world.

Inspecting the child's horoscope has revealed that, despite [FromFrom.GetHerHis] sickly birth, [FromFrom.GetFirstName] will likely grow into a healthy and strong [FromFrom.GetManWoman], fully capable of ruling over my realm after I have moved to the next world.

Stability in [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] can only be maintained as long as all the strands of the great tapestry which makes up this great realm of ours are weaved properly. I fear that [scoped_improvement_target.GetFirstName] has yet to reach the full extent of [scoped_improvement_target.GetHerHis] potential. [scoped_improvement_target.GetSheHeCap] might use some help to improve [scoped_improvement_target.GetHerselfHimself].

By focusing on [scoped_improvement_target.GetHerHis] main field of study, §Y[scoped_improvement_target.GetTitledFirstName]§! has a chance to improve [scoped_improvement_target.GetHerHis] §YEducation§!.

一族のことを知らなければ、他者を導くことなど出来ない。

Thanks to my relentless efforts, I have achieved a greater understanding of politics than I ever thought possible. With these newfound diplomatic skills I will ensure peace and prosperity throughout [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] for years to come!

All these days of mock-battles and constant drilling have finally paid off. Thanks to my relentless efforts, I have achieved a greater understanding of strategy than I ever thought possible. I can only hope that the new tactics I worked on will be able to protect the realm when war comes.

All these days of harsh training and mock-duels have finally paid off. Thanks to my relentless efforts, I have become a better commander than I ever thought possible. When war comes to [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName], I will be ready to lead my troops in battle and uphold the name of my dynasty without shame nor fear.

After countless nights spent awake in my study, reviewing reports and reordering the realm's archives and treasury, I have achieved a much greater understanding of the cogs that make this realm turn than I ever thought possible. With these new skills, I will surely be able to lead [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] into a new era of wealth and prosperity.

I have spent the last few nights extending my network of contacts and spies, hiring a veteran of the craft to teach me a few new tricks, and trying some of my own. As unpleasant as it was to take part in these dark proceedings, by refining my understanding of the human mind to a new level I will certainly be able to maintain peace throughout [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName].

I have lost track of how many books I have studied during the past few weeks. As of recently, I have been taken by a new craving for knowledge that I thought I had long satiated, and through it, I have acquired a much greater understanding of the world around us than I ever thought possible. These ancient wisdoms will surely help me in my responsibilities as [Root.GetTitle] of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName].

My [GetFromRelation] has taken a deep interest in helping me deepen my understanding of politics and foreign as of recently. I was skeptical at first, but, after countless hours spent reviewing old treaties and mingling with [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s friends, I was amazed by how much I was able to learn in such a short amount of time.

My [GetFromRelation] has spent a few weeks tutoring me on matters of war, hoping to share [From.GetHerHis] extensive tactical knowledge with me. [From.GetTitledFirstName] helped me learn how to drill my troops better and how to engage in complex mock-skirmishes to refine both the soldiers' and my own readiness. I could not believe that there was still so much to learn about strategy...

My [GetFromRelation] has insisted that I spend some time with [From.GetHerHim], learning how to better defend myself. We trained and dueled for days, and I ended up being pleasantly surprised by the level of skill shown by my opponent. [From.GetTitledFirstName] was an exquisite training partner and a wonderful mentor. I am marveled at how much I have learned about combat in such a short time.

My [GetFromRelation] is of the opinion that I need to learn more about the responsibilities of a [Root.GetTitle]. [From.GetTitledFirstName] helped me to better understand some of the most commonly avoided duties associated with reviewing reports and administrating justice in the realm. Thanks to [From.GetHerHis] generous help, I have become a much more responsible ruler.

At first I was skeptical of [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s honesty when [From.GetSheHe] offered me [From.GetHerHis] help to extend my spy network and refine the less flattering skills that I employ to enforce my rule over [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName]. And yet, after a few weeks of intriguing discoveries, I must admit that my [GetFromRelation]'s help was not only appreciated but sorely needed.

[From.GetTitledFirstName] has been so courteous as to share some of [From.GetHerHis] most prized books and scarce time to help me refine my research method. I was amazed by the level of accuracy and care with which my [GetFromRelation] handled our collective studying sessions, and I have undoubtedly learned a lot by watching [From.GetHerHim].
I have still so much to learn...

Dynastic names, family ties, political agreements, proper court manners... I hastily excuse myself from my council, my mind feverishly tormented by all the new information I am trying to assimilate. I really wished to learn more about ruling a realm, but all these rules and social cues are simply too intricate, too contradicting, too many!

I feel my temples pulsating under my fingertips as I sit down in the middle of the training grounds, holding my head and searching for a slice of peace after another day wasted yelling at my troops in a fruitless attempt to test a new tactic. I am trying my hardest to become a better commander, yet the results of all my work have been minimal and disappointing.

I let out a loud swear and order my training partner to stop, faltering for a few steps before finally finding my balance again. The soldier asks if we should resume our training, but I simply dismiss him with a grunt while rubbing my sore wrist. I have been trying my best to refine my dueling skills in the past few days, yet I am still unsatisfied with the results.

I angrily crumple another paper and throw it away from me, looking sourly in the opposite direction. I have tried my best to improve my skills as a steward to rule more fairly  and competently over the good people of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName], yet all my efforts seem to result into nothing concrete. Whoever made our laws so needlessly complicated?

I dismiss the spy with an annoyed tap of my hand, returning to the solitude of my study. For a while I really thought I was making some progress, strengthening my network of spies and increasing my influence over [Root.Capital.GetName], yet mine was nothing but a fool's hope. At least half of my spies are turncoats working for my enemies.

The sudden slam of my head against the open book brutally brings me back to my senses. I look around in the library, with a mix of confusion and embarrassment, hoping that nobody noticed me falling asleep over my work again. I have wasted entire nights trying to refine my scholarly skills, yet I feel no wiser than I was last month.

Dynastic names, family ties, political agreements, proper court manners... I hastily excuse myself from [From.GetTitledFirstName], my mind feverishly tormented by all the new information I am trying to assimilate. My [GetFromRelation]'s attempt to try and refine my diplomatic skills was well-intentioned, but it only made me more confused and upset about my limitations.

I feel my temples pulsating under my fingertips as I sit down in the middle of the training grounds, holding my head and searching for a slice of peace after another day wasted yelling at my troops. [From.GetTitledFirstName] has been trying to help me refine my skills and extend my spy network for a few days now, hoping that doing so would help me better rule over [Root.Capital.GetName]. This is simply too much for me.
I have had better days, to be sure...

If I skip dinner again, I might have more time to work.
Agh! I cannot take this anymore!!

Ever since I started helping [From.GetHerHim], [From.GetFirstName] has not quite been the same. Ever since I had to abandon some of my more frivolous habits in order to focus on my responsibilities as [Root.GetTitle], I have noticed that several courtiers have begun to avoid me. Most turn their nose up at my unwashed hair and worn-out clothes, yet I have found a kindred spirit in [scoped_kindred.GetTitledFirstName]. [scoped_kindred.GetSheHeCap] truly understands me.

Ever since I had to abandon some of my more frivolous habits in order to focus on my responsibilities as [Root.GetTitle], my tangled hair and foul stench have been the topic of many slanderous chats going on at court behind my back. I glimpse at [From.GetFirstName] from my place at the table, looking as my [GetFromRelation] hoards as much food as [From.GetSheHe] can on [From.GetHerHis] plate before hastily excuses [From.GetHerselfHimself] to return to [From.GetHerHis] study. Noting my sour expression as the weaver tightens the string around my gut in order to measure my size for a new clothes I have ordered, [scoped_kindred.GetFirstName] hastily assures me that it is perfectly understandable, and laudable even, for a [Root.GetTitle] to focus on [Root.GetHerHis] duties to the realm, even when it comes at the expense of private concerns.

[From.GetTitledFirstName] absentmindedly orders the servant to carry away the half-finished meal on [From.GetHerHis] desk, too enthralled by our conversation to finish eating. The effects of my newfound dedication to my duties as [Root.GetTitle] has not passed unnoticed at court. The divine blood of [This.GetFirstName] flows through the veins of all [This.GetHerHis] descendants, carrying a glimpse of its eternal power.
The bureaucratic and cultural revolution that the heavenly [This.GetTitledFirstName] has brought to [This.PrimaryTitle.GetName] have earned [This.GetHerHim] a place in the annals of history.
The members of this ruthless and infamous dynasty claim to be descendants of the Dragon-[This.GetTitle] [This.GetFirstName], notoriously famous for burning [This.GetHerHis] enemies to cinder.
§Gヘルメス協会への加入を許可します§!
Make a public display of the charred remains of your victims.

Tales of [Root.GetTitledFirstName]'s cruelty have spread far and wide across the lands of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName], reaching greater and greater height at each new year.The monstrous tyrant of [Root.Capital.GetName] has burned scores of innocent people to satisfy [Root.GetHerHis] whims. \nBelieving [Root.GetHerselfHimself] to be more than a mere mortal, [Root.GetFirstName] proudly flaunts [Root.GetHerHis] disregard for human life, convinced to be far beyond the reach of [Root.GetHerHis] petty subjects.
The ancient fire of the Great Wyrms flows within my veins!

The [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName] has always known how to properly deal with those that stand in the way of our glorious destiny. [From.GetFirstName]'s charred corpse is nothing but the last example of our power.
[From.GetSheHeCap] who toils with the dragon tastes the flames.
You have angered the dragon, proclaims the jailer, dragging me out of my cell with a mocking smirk. "And now you will taste [FromFrom.GetHerHis] flames."
No! Wait! You cannot do this!
The ancient flames that course through our veins will consume our enemies in a fiery whirlwind of vengeance, leaving nothing but cinders and charred bones.
I wonder how long it will last...
[FromFrom.Mother.GetFirstName]の不倫の果実がついに実った。まだ[FromFrom.Mother.GetSheHe]がほんとうに私を裏切ったとは信じられない。
我が主は、最近獲得した称号管理の責任を私に与えてくださった。
My liege has denied to give me the responsibility of handing out [From.GetHerHis] recently acquired titles.

A bit of careful waiting, a few stings in the right places, and, just like that, the game is already over. Well, for [From.GetFirstName], that is. How unfortunate that [From.GetSheHe] will no longer be able to fulfill [From.GetHerHis] duties as my guardian anymore. Perhaps [From.GetHerHis] successor will be kinder to me.
Lure your §YGuardian§! to a secluded location to try and §Ykill§! [scoped_guardian.GetHerHim].
宮廷にいる適切な年齢の一人を[Recipient.GetOppositeConsortSex]として与えることができます。
[Recipient.GetOppositeConsortSex]候補を選出します。あなたが近親者の場合、評価ボーナス(§G+$OPINION$§!)。
§Y[Recipient.GetBestName]§! に §Y[ThirdPartyCharacter.GetTitledFirstName]§! を[ThirdPartyCharacter.GetConsortSex]とすることを提案する。
Since [ThirdPartyCharacter.GetSheHe] is your close relative, [Recipient.GetSheHe] will be duly grateful (§G+$OPINION$§!).
側室をとる提案を受諾
§Y[Recipient.GetBestName]§! took §Y[ThirdPartyCharacter.GetTitledFirstName]§! as a [ThirdPartyCharacter.GetConsortSex], as suggested by §Y[Actor.GetBestName]§!.
側室をとる提案を拒否
§Y[Recipient.GetBestName]§! declined §Y[Actor.GetBestName]§!'s suggestion to take §Y[ThirdPartyCharacter.GetTitledFirstName]§! as a [ThirdPartyCharacter.GetConsortSex].
[Actor.GetBestName] suggests that I take [ThirdPartyCharacter.GetBestName] as a [ThirdPartyCharacter.GetConsortSex].
I think [ThirdPartyCharacter.GetBestName] would make you a most suitable [ThirdPartyCharacter.GetConsortSex]!
あなたの恵みあふれる申し出を受けます。[Root.GetTitledFirstName]は、良き[Root.GetConsortSexCap]となるでしょう!
Character and §YLiege§! publicly follow the §YCathar§!, §YMessalian§!, §YBogomilist§!, or §YMazdaki§! religion

Try to influence §Y[sway_target.GetFirstName]§! into adopting one of your personality §YTraits§!.
I will never rest until [FromFrom.GetSheHe] is brought to justice!

§Y[Actor.RelHead.GetTitledFirstName]§Wに対し、§Y[Actor.Spouse.GetFirstName]§Wとの離婚許可を要請します。要請すると[Player.Religion.GetPietyName]が下がるうえ、許可された場合、配偶者の親族に侮辱とみなされます。このような要請の検討において、配偶者の貞節さと多産性は、[Actor.RelHead.GetTitle]の決断を促す主たる要因となる傾向にあります。

The story of the Roman Empire's glorious recovery will be told throughout the ages. Those unfortunate enough to have lived through the black days when barbarians sacked Rome at will or the Arab invaders swept in from the desert would not have dared dream of this day. All of the old provinces have been reclaimed and the Empire now stretches farther than it has in nearly a thousand years.\n\nBy shedding the weight of the dead god of the Galileans and re-embracing the Olympians the Empire of Caesar and Augustus has risen from its ashes. It will be a challenge to keep such a vast realm together, but for the sake of all humanity you must succeed, lest the world plunge into yet another dark age of ignorance and barbarity bereft of Rome's guiding light.

The story of the Roman Empire's glorious recovery will be told throughout the ages. Those unfortunate enough to have lived through the black days when barbarians sacked Rome at will or the Arab invaders swept in from the desert would not have dared dream of this day. All of the old provinces have been reclaimed and the Empire now stretches farther than it has in nearly a thousand years.\n\nCountless people from all races and creeds all across Europe are celebrating this momentous occasion and men and women in both Rome and Constantinople are weeping tears of joy. It will be a challenge to keep an empire of this scale together, but for the sake of all humanity you must succeed, lest the world plunge into yet another dark age of ignorance and barbarity bereft of Rome's guiding light.
[Root.Religion.GetName] 信仰は、宣教師や十字軍などの、弱く退廃的な敵対者に対抗する準備を整えた。
§Y$NAME$§!という名の$TYPE$が§Y$EMPLOYER$§!の宮廷に現れます。\n
生きて、成すべきことがある！
[Root.GetFirstName]に課された部族への責務は、[Root.GetHerHis]の人生に新たな強さと目的を与えた。
This ruler has been forced to neglect some of [Root.GetHerHis] duties in order to focus on taking care of a distinguished Elder of [Root.GetHerHis] tribe.
One of the oldest, most distinguished members of [Root.GetTitledFirstName]'s tribe has showered this ruler with praise for [Root.GetHerHis] wisdom and foresight.

I may not be as strong and sprightly as I once was, but I have a duty to keep sharing my wisdom and advice to the brash, young members of [Root.Capital.GetName], thus ensuring the prosperity of my tribe. Somebody must tell these kids all the things that they are doing wrong.

[From.GetTitledFirstName] decided to appear unannounced at my court this morning, claiming that [From.GetSheHe] is pleased by my leadership and that [From.GetSheHe] wishes to follow my progress as [Root.GetTitle] more closely, while providing me with [From.GetHerHis] priceless advice.
§Y[Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName]§!にいる§Y長老§!は全員、あなたの決定に満足するでしょう。
Who do you think you are, old [From.GetManWoman]?
§Y[Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName]§!にいる§Y長老§!は全員、あなたの決定に腹を立てるでしょう。

After a long period of constant fights, [From.GetTitledFirstName] finally decided to leave me and my court in peace. Unfortunately, [From.GetSheHe] is now wandering through the realm, warning all the other esteemed Elders of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] about my allegedly poor treatment of [From.GetHerHim].
I assure you, [From.GetSheHe] has always been impossible to deal with.
Convince the other §YElders§! to ignore §Y[From.GetFirstName]§!'s rumors about you.
At least we will have some quiet...

[scoped_ruler.GetTitledFirstName] might be a good and wise ruler, but [scoped_ruler.GetSheHe] often has a hard time when it comes to spotting talent amongst [scoped_ruler.GetHerHis] people. Luckily for [scoped_ruler.GetHerHim], I am here to help.
There is but one person fit for this job...
Advice §Y[scoped_ruler.GetTitledFirstName]§! to grant one of [scoped_ruler.GetHerHis] §YCounties§! to you.
You need only to look at [scoped_recipient_first.GetFirstName]!
Advice §Y[scoped_ruler.GetTitledFirstName]§! to grant one of [scoped_ruler.GetHerHis] §YCounties§! to §Y[scoped_recipient_first.GetFirstName]§!.
Advice §Y[scoped_ruler.GetTitledFirstName]§! to grant one of [scoped_ruler.GetHerHis] §YCounties§! to §Y[scoped_recipient_second.GetFirstName]§!.
[scoped_recipient_third.GetFirstName] is the most competent [scoped_recipient_third.GetManWoman] I can think of.
Advice §Y[scoped_ruler.GetTitledFirstName]§! to grant one of [scoped_ruler.GetHerHis] §YCounties§! to §Y[scoped_recipient_third.GetFirstName]§!.
Then again, maybe there is a lack of talent around here...
[From.GetTitledFirstName]が、いつからか執拗に絡んでくるようになった。[scoped_potential_count.GetFirstName]は、チャンスさえもらえるなら、どれだけ模範的な家臣になるのだろうか、と。
[From.GetTitledFirstName]が、いつからか執拗に絡んでくるようになった。領民の繁栄を願うならばある程度の責任は分配すべきだと。だが、単に[From.GetSheHe]自身の領土拡大を望んでいるだけでは、という疑念が拭えない…

It took me some time to convince [From.GetTitledFirstName] of [scoped_potential_count.GetFirstName]'s clear potential, but I was able to get my way in the end. I am certain my [GetFromRelation] will not have reason to regret [From.GetHerHis] decision.

It took me some time to convince [From.GetTitledFirstName] that I am still perfectly capable of administering more land and that granting me a new title would be merely in the interest of a prosperous [From.PrimaryTitle.GetName], but I was able to get my way in the end.
The words of a wise [Root.GetManWoman] are hard to dismiss.

Unfortunately, [From.GetTitledFirstName] has decided to ignore my words. I cannot believe that [From.GetSheHe] would so easily dismiss the council of one of the elders of [From.GetHerHis] realm. Such a shortsightedness should never be tolerated in leadership.
What a foolish and impertinent child!

It is quite clear that [scoped_ruler.GetTitledFirstName] is too inexperienced and foolish to handle all [scoped_ruler.GetHerHis] responsibilities as [scoped_ruler.GetTitle]. Luckily for [scoped_ruler.GetHerHim], I am here to help [scoped_ruler.GetHerHim] find someone skilled enough to share [scoped_ruler.GetHerHis] responsibilities.
Clearly, I need to take charge personally.
One cannot deny [scoped_recipient_first.GetFirstName] has a... sparkle, of sorts.
[scoped_recipient_third.GetFirstName]'s potential is sure to blossom... eventually.
Then again, maybe [scoped_ruler.GetSheHe] is better off alone.
いつものように[From.GetHerHis]の空虚なおしゃべりに付き合う。それだけではまるで不足であった。結果、いつからか[From.GetTitledFirstName]は私の足を引っ張るようになってしまった。[From.GetHerHis]の骨抜き腰巾着に、[Root.GetTitle]たる私の責務を分け与えてはどうかと言い出したのだ。

いつものように[From.GetHerHis]の空虚なおしゃべりに付き合う、それだけではまるで不足であった。結果、いつからか[From.GetTitledFirstName]は私の足を引っ張るようになってしまった。年老いた[From.GetManWoman]に私の領地の一画を与え直接統治させる形で、[Root.GetTitle]たる私の責務を[From.GetHerHim]に分け与えてはどうかと言い出したのだ。
Whatever will make you shut up!
For once, it appears I have been able to instill some wisdom in [From.GetFirstName]'s thick skull. After a long and lively discussion, the [From.GetTitle] has finally decided to give into my demands.
Perhaps [From.GetSheHe] is not so bad a [From.GetTitle] after all...

It was too much of me to expect that [From.GetFirstName] would listen to reason now after ignoring my council for so long. The stubborn [From.GetTitle] has rebuked my suggestion again and again, too shortsighted and proud to admit the merit of my argument.
[From.GetTitledFirstName]は[From.GetHerHim]に耳を傾ける者が誰もいないことに何度か不満を漏らし、私たち全員が[Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName]の貴い長老にもっと敬意を払い、気配りをすべきだと言った。実のところ[From.GetSheHe]は孤独を感じているだけだろう。
無視されないようにしよう。
実はあなたの望みは知っている......
気分よくなってもらうように、できることがあるにちがいない......
待て......[From.GetFirstName]はまだ生きているのか？

It has been a few weeks now since [From.GetTitledFirstName] started to claim I would make a wonderful [Root.GetTitle] for [scoped_ruler.PrimaryTitle.GetName]. It seems the old [From.GetManWoman] is fed up with [scoped_ruler.GetTitledFirstName]'s lack of respect and would be ready to legitimize me as [scoped_ruler.GetHerHis] successor, should I decide to depose [scoped_ruler.GetHerHim].
That is something to think about...
[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]は、[From.GetFirstName]を称賛しながら、[Root.Capital.GetName]を巡回している。[From.GetSheHe]は、私よりも[Root.GetTitle]にはるかにふさわしいそうだ。 私はあの長老を粗略に扱うべきでではなかった…
[From.GetTitledFirstName]はここ数日の間、[Root.Capital.GetName]中を歩き回って、過去何十年の間で[Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName]におけるもっとも賢い族長だと私のことを褒め称えている。領国で最も老練で、最も尊敬されている人々の1人が私をそんなにも明らかに支持していることを知って、間違いなくすべての封臣の中での私の地位は高まった。
いつでも[From.GetHerHim]のことが好きだ。

Having long since recognized me as a ruler worthy of praise and respect, [From.GetTitledFirstName] has decided to dedicate some of [From.GetHerHis] dwindling time to share a spec of [From.GetHerHis] ancient wisdom with me, so that I may pass it down to my own descendants.
Tell me of the customs of our ancestors.
You must have watched over many rulers in your time...
I would like to know more about our people's legends.
多くの神の中から私は従うべき神を選ぶことができる。豊沃の女神、母なるツンバブラにするのが良いか？交渉と導きを与える月の精霊アイユールか？富と繁栄のため、偉大な蛇ビダを選ぶという手もある......
指導力と知恵を得るためにアイユールに祈りを捧げよう。
ビダは想像を超えた富で私を祝福するだろう。
ツンバブラにしよう。慈母のご加護があらんことを。
力強いドンゴよ、あなたの名のもとに戦おう！
力強く啓蒙的なアイユールは月に関わる精霊だ。月光のように、アイユールは暗闇を明かりで照らす。夜、アイユールはすべての生物の精神を読み解く。崇拝し、生贄を捧げる全ての人に霊感と導きを与える。
ワガドゥーの偉大な蛇、ビダは七つの頭を持ち、人の目が届かない深い穴に住んでいる。ビダは年ごとの生贄と供物をもって鎮めなければならないが、加護と豊かな黄金、慈雨によって信奉者に報いる。
神秘的な女神ツンバブラは、カノの民の母なる神である。ツンバブラはダラの丘に立つ神木に住み、あらゆる種類の供犠を受ける。供物を捧げるものは誰しも、女神の知恵と力を分け与えられる。
ドンゴ万歳！この偉大なる戦士の王は、死すらも超越して永遠に支配する!その行く先で、天から石と稲妻を降らせ、愚か者どもに正義を鉄槌を下すのだ。
この人物はアフリカの月の神、英知と導きを与える「アイユール」の敬虔な信奉者です。
この人物はアフリカの繁栄をもたらす蛇神「ビダ」の敬虔な信奉者です。
この人物はアフリカの母性の神「ツンバブラ」の敬虔な信奉者です。
この人物はアフリカの雷と戦の神「ドンゴ」の敬虔な信奉者です。
この人物がアイユール神の思いやりと尊厳を持っていることはよく知られています。
アイユールの道をたどるために敬虔に努力を積み重ねることにした。アイユールの名の下に平和を維持し、臣民の間の相互理解を進めた。結果として外交力が向上した。
A deeply revered [west_african_pagan_reformed.GetName] deity, the spider-god Anansi is a famous trickster, considered to be the spirit of all knowledge of stories.
虹の蛇はブードゥー神話における生と魂の調停者で、世界の均衡、秩序、平和そして対話を維持します。
