アナンシの道をたどるために敬虔に努力を積み重ねることにした。アナンシの名の下に策謀をめぐらせ、密偵を送り、野蛮な計画を組織し、友人や家族を操った。結果として、策略能力が向上した。
私はアナンシを敬うための記念碑を建てるべきでしょう。
私はダンを敬うための記念碑を建てるべきでしょう。
遂に記念碑が完成しました。それは、あなたの想像通りの、あるいは想像以上に素晴らしいものになりました。 その完成を祝うために、アナンシを讃える盛大な式典が開催されました！ 記念碑が[Root.Capital.GetName]を見守っている限り、その物語は語り継がれるでしょう。
遂に記念碑が完成しました。それは、あなたの想像通りの、あるいは想像以上に素晴らしいものになりました。 その完成を祝うために、虹の蛇を讃える盛大な式典が開催されました！ 記念碑が[Root.Capital.GetName]を見守っている限り、その物語は語り継がれるでしょう。
多くの神の中から私は従うべき神を選ぶことができる。ドンゴへの祈りで戦いの勝利を求めようか、それとも蜘蛛の神アナンシの機嫌を取ろうか？中庸の生活に恵まれ賢く老練に成長することを望むのなら、ダンの指導を仰ぐべきかもしれない。
アナンシによって、私は機知に富み、権謀術数にたけるだろう！
ダンは我が人生では及びもつかない知恵を私に与えるだろう。
他にもっとふさわしい崇拝対象があるはずだ...
Great Anansi, share your secrets with me, and I shall keep them. The spider-god will guide me through the intricate web of lies out of which our world flourishes.
霊と生との間の聖なる仲介者である虹の蛇に栄光を与えよ。彼は我々の世界全体で均衡、秩序、平和そして対話を維持するのだ！
おそらく、私は、この本を違うときに学ぶだろう...

ローマは子供が治めるべきではない
帝国評議会及び帝国軍の指揮官が皇帝の選出に影響を与えます。封建制における選帝侯と異なり、帝国評議会の各評議員は自身の持つ威信・名誉称号・特質に応じてそれぞれ異なる投票強度を持ち、有権者の影響力には差が生まれます。皇帝は醜かったり、奇形であったり、未成年で無い限り最も大きな影響力を行使します。現在の皇帝の親族、指揮官、元帥及び帝位僭称者の全員が有効な後継候補者となります。
帝制は封建制と異なり、内政に大きな影響を持つ都市部と集権化された宮廷に大きな重点が置かれます。評議員と指揮官はそれぞれの威信と力量に応じた様々な大きさの影響力を保持し、それは帝国の継承に大きな影響を与えます…

A famous bard named [invited_character.GetFirstName] has arrived to my court, lured by tales of my family's generosity towards all artists and craftsmen. [invited_character.GetSheHeCap] hopes to join my court and offer [invited_character.GetHerHis] services to such an illustrious patron of the art as I am.

I am afraid I must decline your offer.

A mysterious [invited_character.GetManWoman] has reached my court. [invited_character.GetSheHeCap] claims to be a renown scholar from a place far away, who was cast out by [invited_character.GetHerHis] people for [invited_character.GetHerHis] unyielding devotion to knowledge. [invited_character.GetSheHeCap] hopes that a prestigious patron of the arts such as myself would have greater foresight than [invited_character.GetHerHis] previous liege.

A mysterious [invited_character.GetManWoman] has reached my court. [invited_character.GetSheHeCap] wishes to pledge [invited_character.GetHerselfHimself] to me, hoping that I will show greater foresight than [invited_character.GetHerHis] previous liege.
All scholars are welcome at my court!
I cannot soil my good name by employing criminals.

妊娠した人物に対して通常の頻度でフレーバーイベントが発生し、臨月にさしかかると摂政政治を強制されます。
妊娠した人物に対して少ない頻度でフレーバーイベントが発生し、臨月にさしかかると摂政政治を強制されます。
妊娠した人物に対するフレーバーイベントは発生せず、臨月おける摂政政治の強制はありません。
felt like an extension of my arm
そして地面は私の足元にしっかりと感じられた
the wind blew gently across my face
and meeting [other_combatant.GetFirstName]'s eyes I saw they were full of apprehension
and I feel as strong as a [GetRandomMythologicalCreature]
そして兵士たちは、息を呑んで観戦している。
and struck once, I did not need to strike again
そして[GetDuelWeapon]を[other_combatant.GetHerHim]に振り下ろした。最初の一撃はかわされたが、二撃目はかわされなかった
and in a whirlwind of blows they were down
決闘のあと、[GetDuelWeapon]の血を拭った
I left them lying on the ground and went to celebrate my victory
Once it is done I roar in victory
Once the duel was over, I mopped the sweat off my brow
looks fancy but I'm not so sure I know how to use it.
私はそれに気付くことすら出来ぬまま自らの血溜まりに沈んだ。
I am doubled over clutching a wound in my side.
§Y[Root.GetTitledName]§! finds a new muse for [This.GetHerHis] poetry
全ての廷臣から§Y[This.GetTitledFirstName]§!に同性愛の疑いがかかる
全ての廷臣から§Y[This.GetTitledFirstName]§!に近親相姦の疑いがかかる
全ての廷臣から§Y[This.GetTitledFirstName]§!に不能の疑いがかかる
全ての廷臣から§Y[This.GetTitledFirstName]§!に不貞の疑いがかかる
全ての廷臣から§Y[This.GetTitledFirstName]§!に神秘主義の疑いがかかる
§Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!が[Root.GetMyChancellorName]§Y[This.GetTitledFirstName]§!を信頼していない事が、全廷臣の知るところとなる
§Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!が§Y[This.GetTitledFirstName]§!元帥を信頼していない事が、全廷臣の知るところとなる
§Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!が家令の§Y[This.GetTitledFirstName]§!を信頼していない事が、全廷臣の知るところとなる
§Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!が密偵頭の§Y[This.GetTitledFirstName]§!を信頼していない事が、全廷臣の知るところとなる
§Y[This.GetTitledFirstName]§!は全ての廷臣から不信心だと思われる
§Y[This.GetTitledFirstName]§!は全ての廷臣から臆病者だと思われる
§Y100%§! chance of you making a good move.
§Y100%§! chance of you making a great move.
Apparently the church has found a fitting Saint of the faith. [saint_person.GetTitledName] has proven to be an exemplar of the faith, as well as having done miracles.

[saint_person.GetTitledName] is a well known exemplar of our faith, who recently passed away. Discussions about permanently venerating [saint_person.GetHerHim] as an ancestor have come up, but everyone is waiting for my final decision on the matter.

[saint_person.GetFirstName] was a true exemplar of the [saint_person.Religion.GetName] faith, living a pious and inspiring life. In a grand announcement [canonizer_person.GetBestName] has decided to include [saint_person.GetFirstNameWithNick] among the venerated ancestors of old.

Many tales are told about the feats [saint_person.GetFirstName] did in life, and [saint_person.GetSheHe] will be an inspiration for our descendants in the years to come.

It is a great honor for the family of the blessed one, and may we all aspire to follow in [saint_person.GetHerHis] footsteps.
イタリア半島中央部を支配してからこの方長きに渡って教皇庁は自らをローマ帝国の正当なる後継者だと主張してきた。しかしつい先日、[From.GetTitledName]はその地域を征服し、自らをその主だと宣言した。\n\n教皇は自らの敗北と教会への侮辱に怒り狂っているが、教皇庁の旧領の領主たちの殆どは[From.GetTitledFirstName]の支配を受け入れた。
大胆な行為だ。これからどうなるのか見守るとしよう。

[ThePope.GetTitledName]はイタリア半島の旧領を回復するため長きに渡り激しい戦いを続けてきたが、遂に自らの敗北を認めることとなった。またここまで積み重なった敗北の数々によって、半島に広がるかつてのローマの領土への請求権を全て放棄することを余儀なくされたのである。\n\n半島全体に及ぶ教皇の影響が失われたことにより、新たな征服者と貴族たちは聖座が失われたことによる空白をなんとかして埋めねばなるまい。この地の遍く領主と都市国家よ、来るべき紛争に備えるのだ。
[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]の御稜威によって、私は自分の民を放っておくと彼らに確信させることになるだろう。
なにを考えているんだ？
§Y[From.GetTitledName]§!に§Y[northern_crusade_duchy_title.GetFullBaseName]§!の全領国の領地を与える

敬愛されし[Root.GetTitledName]殿へ

チュートン騎士団は、[northern_crusade_title.GetBaseName]での戦争における貴君の援助に御礼を申し上げます。

（署名）
[From.GetTitledName]

敬愛する[Root.GetTitledName]殿へ

チュートン騎士団は、[northern_crusade_title.GetBaseName]での戦争における貴君の援助に御礼を申し上げます。支援への感謝を示すため、ささやかではありますが贈り物を添えさせていただきます。

（署名）
[From.GetTitledName]
できることをしたまでさ。
チュートン騎士団の失敗

北方の地を平定する試みが繰り返されてきたが、ついにチュートン騎士団はそれを断念した。あらゆるところで、北方の異教徒どもは彼らの生活様式を守るために一致団結しているのだ。

チュートン騎士団が異教徒どもへの十字軍を断念したために、北方にいる他のキリスト教徒は確実に難しい問題に直面するだろう。敵対勢力が去ったため、異教徒どもは将来の南への拡大を視野に入れ始めている。

世界の他の国々は原始宗教の猛威（パガン・フューリー）を待ち受けている。北からの抑えられない暴虐が確実に間もなく訪れるであろう。
チュートン騎士団は何をしていたのだ！？
どちらもいまいましい邪教徒どもだ。
我々の時代がまもなく訪れるだろう！
チュートン騎士団との同盟

A large honor guard of the Teutons appear outside of [Root.Capital.GetName], led by [From.GetTitledName] [From.GetHerselfHimself]. In response to my aid in their latest wars, they have decided to award me and all my descendants the honor of friendship with the Teutonic Knights.\n\nForevermore, the Order will stay by our side as valiant knights and friends, if we should ever need them.

チュートン騎士団と[northern_crusade_kingdom.GetAdjective]の地の原住民たちとの戦いは厳しく長引いたものであったが、ついに戦いはキリスト教徒の勝利に終わった。

チュートン騎士団がその地を巡回しており、キリスト教徒の土地に足を踏み入れようとする異教徒どもを十分に懲罰したので、もはや北方の地に住まう信仰正しき人々はその生命を脅かされることはない。かつて北方の原始宗教の猛威（パガン・フューリー）として知られていたものは平定され、再びそれを見ることはないだろう。

暴虐と危機は終わったのだ。
私はどうも時期を待ち過ぎたようだ。仲間たちも、これまでしてきたあらゆる準備もバラバラになりだしている。私がイベリアでの戦いを始めなかったので、人々は私の計画を信じられなくなってしまったようだ。

寛仁大度なる[Root.GetTitledName]殿

キリスト教信仰のためにイベリアを再征服するという貴公のお考えを聞き、私は武器を取るべく奮い立たっております。全力を尽くして貴公の取り組みを支援するつもりです。

貴公の盟友たる
[From.GetTitledName]

[Root.GetTitledName]殿

私は[FromFromFrom.GetTitledName]の再征服戦争を宣言しました。戦場で貴公にお会いするのを楽しみにしております。

（署名）
貴公の盟友たる[From.GetTitledName]
約束通り、我々は責任を果たし助力しよう。

After leading troops on both sides of the wars raging throughout the Iberian Peninsula, I seem to have grown quite the reputation among the local peasants and soldiers on both sides.

Though some would consider me a mercenary or a traitor to the faith, my prowess in war has made me a hero among most, and revered among the populace. Some would even go as far as to call me a folk hero.

Surely, my actions must have been righteous, seeing all the responses. I have often wondered if it would all be worth it in the end, and it is a joyous occasion to see all my hard work has paid off.
I will be remembered throughout the ages.

I have fought for the faith several times these recent years, to recapture the Iberian Peninsula  as a true vanguard for Christendom and its followers.

Though we were occupied by the Moors of Al-Andalus invading from the south who forced their way into the heartlands of Christianity, we have pushed them out of our home. Step by step, we have regained what is rightfully ours.

Hispania will rise as a bastion of Christianity once more. We will make sure of it.

[Root.GetTitledName]

I have heard about your struggles against the other [FromFrom.Religion.GetGroupName]s, and I would like to assure you I do not share their animosity towards the [Root.Religion.GetName]s. For a small donation, I will be willing to help you out.

Signed,
[FromFrom.GetTitledName]

To the magnanimous [Root.GetTitledName]

I appreciate and accept your offer. I hope to be seeing you at the battlefield shortly.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]

To the greedy [Root.GetTitledName]

Your despicable offer disgusts me. I hope to see you at the battlefield next, so I can cut you down together with the rest of the infidels.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]

[Root.GetTitledName]

Your prowess in war is well known throughout the Iberian Peninsula, and I would like to offer your a sum of gold for your services in the current Reconquest War.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
I think... Yes, that sounds like a good deal.
And betray my fellow [Root.Religion.GetGroupName]s? I think not!

To the magnanimous [Root.GetTitledName]

I appreciate and accept your offer. I will be seeing you on the battlefield shortly.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
Great! More allies are always needed!

To the despicable [Root.GetTitledName]

I find it insulting that you would even dare think I would betray my fellow [From.Religion.GetGroupName]s.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
It seems I have to look elsewhere.
来たるイベリアでの戦にて信仰に殉ずるために戦う者どもがじきにやってくるであろうが、幾ばくかの資金を投じ声明を広範に伝えることでより精鋭の兵を惹きつけられるやもしれない。
少額でも事足りるだろう。
皆が確かに聞き届けられるよう取り計らわねば。
ありったけ持っていけ！
残念ながら、余裕がないのだ。

The wars for Iberia are costly, and it has made a noticeable dent into my finances. [Root.RelHead.GetTitledName] has been a valiant supporter of our struggles for a long time, maybe it is time to ask [Root.RelHead.GetHerHim] for help?
A small donation is all I ask for.
いやいや、大丈夫だ。何の助けもいらないよ...

A massive creature of a [new_commander.GetManWoman] is brought in front of me, supposedly [new_commander.GetSheHe] has quite the renown as a commander. After seeing [new_commander.GetHerHis] interactions with some of my men, it is easy to see [new_commander.GetSheHe] knows what [new_commander.GetSheHe] is doing.
I am sure you will fit right in!
I got just the job for you!
悪いが、指揮官はもう間に合っている。
小艦隊の船長が宮廷に現れ、来るべき戦争で自分たちを雇わないかと売り込みをかけてきた。指揮官の中には船の必要性に疑問を呈する者もいるが、確かにどこかで使い所があるかもしれない。
I will happily take you up on the offer.
You would not happen to know more captains, would you?
陸地で戦うのに船などいらんわ！
イベリア半島のレコンキスタの計画を始めてから1年が経ち、このレコンキスタへの参戦を希望する者は今全て我が元へ集ったであろう。さあ後はこの新たな仲間達と目指す場所を決めるだけだ。
さあおあつらえ向きの目標を探すとしよう。
イベリアのレコンキスタ

イベリア半島を再征服せんとする試みは今まで幾度も行われてきたが、今回は[From.GetTitledName]が新たなイベリア戦役を行うべく部隊を集め、共に戦う仲間を探し始めた。半島の一部をキリスト世界に取り戻すべく、[From.GetTitledFirstName]は大いに骨を折り、この地域中から部隊を集めるべく号を発した。\n\nキリスト教徒達が戦争の準備を進めている一方で、他方の教えを奉ずる者たちも防衛のため部隊を集め始めている。イベリア半島の領地を必死で奪い合う二者が再び激突するには後数ヶ月、或いは一年もかからないであろう。
イベリアはキリスト教徒の邦なり！
キリスト教徒の暴徒共はここに居るべきではない。

[e_spain.GetFullName]の成立により、イベリア半島は[From.Religion.GetGroupName]教の完全な支配下に置かれた。この半島を支配した2つの異なる教えの間で長きにわたる戦いが行われたが、遂に[From.Religion.GetGroupName]の信徒がその長きにわたる仇敵を完全に征服したのである。\n\n二者の間で行われた戦いは遂に終わり、半島を荒れ狂った戦争から開放されたイベリアはようやく平和な未来を目指すことができるだろう。
統一ヒスパニア統こそ我らが教えの礎石となるであろう。
忌まわしき邪教徒共め！
バレアレス諸島でさえ、キリスト教によるイベリアの再征服から安全ではなかった。この地域の他の信仰の最後の砦は崩れ、今ではキリスト教国だけが残っている。\n\nついにイベリアが信徒たちのもとに戻ると、半島の再征服は終わり、平和が回復した。再び信仰の礎となるイベリアは、これからも大切な役割を担っていくであろう。

A minor noble has launched a campaign to start gathering troops to reconquer parts of Iberia. [From.GetTitledFirstName] asks for my help in supporting [From.GetHerHim], and taking part in the reconquest. This is a great opportunity to push back the infidels from Iberia.
Help a minor noble? I think not.
As the sponsor of the upcoming reconquest campaign, I have a prime opportunity to aid [FromFrom.GetDynName]. But in what manner will I help [FromFrom.GetHerHim]?
I will use my renown to find [FromFrom.GetHerHim] a lot of troops.
My connections with the clergy will prove invaluable.
Wealth can topple any enemy and bless any ally.
Why would I help out more than I already have?
[current_location.GetName]の通りを歩いていると、誰かが突然私にぶつかってくる。通りを走り去る少年が手に持っている小袋は、私のもののようだ！
気にするな。袋に大した金は入っていない
あの子を見つけて落とし前をつけさせてやろう
彼は私の役に立つかもしれないぞ？
この地域に住む賢人についての話を聞いたあと、私は彼を訪問し、彼が何に身を捧げているのかを確かめることにした。彼は冒涜的にも聞こえる儚い概念について話し始めたが、私は彼の話をより深く聞くため、従者に外へ出るよう指示した。
彼が信仰しているものが冒涜的かそうでないかを学ぶ。
もしかすると[current_location.Religion.GetName]は[Root.Religion.GetName]よりも身を捧げるべきものではないか？
§Y[Root.GetTitledName]§!は秘密裏に§Y[current_location.Religion.GetName]§!の信仰を実践し始めます。
As we travel through [current_location.GetName], we come across a festival to ancient gods still celebrated by the local populace. It reminds me of some of the harvest festivals at home.
Let us take part in the festivities!
It is not befitting of a true [Root.Religion.GetGroupName].
Maybe these harvest festivals are to the real gods?
私は夜遅くに[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]とものと思われる声で、兵士たちとともに目を覚ました。その声はわずかな間しか続かなかったが、確かに私にすべての財産を使い、正義の十字軍に参加し続けて友軍を支援するように言っていた。
たぶん酒を飲み過ぎたせいに違いないな。
私は[decided_holy_order.PrimaryTitle.GetName]に入るよう召命を受けたのだ！

As we camp for the night, riders bearing the cross suddenly approach. Led by the pious [holy_order_meeting.GetTitledName], they settle down with us for the night. Just before I am going to sleep, [holy_order_meeting.GetFirstName] asks if I want to stay up and converse with him.
My apologies, but it is too late for that.

My men and I find ourselves at a bar in [current_location.GetName], as evening turns to night. An attractive serving girl seems to pay me a lot of interest, and when I am about to go to bed for the night, she is clearly interested in joining.

My men and I find ourselves at a bar in [current_location.GetName], as evening turns to night. An attractive serving boy seems to pay me a lot of interest, and when I am about to go to bed for the night, he is clearly interested in joining.
I am not here to pick up foreigners.
Nobody will know about just one night.
You should join me at my court!
I have noticed that my men seem somewhat restless these last days. Our stay in [current_location.GetName] has taken its toll on them, and they seem a bit demotivated.
I will drill the men back into a fighting force!
Maybe the [current_location.Religion.GetName] faith has more to offer us?
I have to say the [current_location.Religion.GetGroupName]s have taken well care of [current_location.GetName] though.
チュートン騎士団領の滅亡

その最後の砦を失い、チュートン騎士団は再び領土を持たぬ存在となり、キリスト世界の中心部へと戻る彼らの行列が続いている。

もはや自分の国を持たなくなったチュートン騎士団は再び普通の宗教騎士団へと戻り、邪教徒と戦うあらゆるキリスト教徒の領主に対して軍務を申し出る存在となった。

チュートン騎士団領の滅亡はカトリックにとって間違いなく痛手であろう。
かの宗教騎士団はそもそも領土を持つべき存在ではなかったのだ。
これは最初の一歩に過ぎない。
チュートン騎士団を臣従させる
チュートン騎士団と長きに渡って同盟関係にある場合、それに相応しい存在だと認められればチュートン騎士団はこの領国の封臣となることに納得してくれるかもしれません。
チュートン騎士名誉親衛隊を雇う
チュートン騎士団と長きに渡って同盟関係にある場合、騎士団員の一部を一時的に名誉親衛隊として雇うことができます。
レコンキスタ戦争を計画
Start preparing a campaign against the infidels in Iberia, to reconquer parts of the Iberian Peninsula for Christianity. A large undertaking like this can usually only be done once a lifetime.
Find a fitting dynasty member to become a beneficiary for my reconquests at the Iberian Peninsula.
Set §Y[Root.GetTitledName]§! as a beneficiary for my reconquests at the Iberian Peninsula.
§Y[Root.GetTitledName]§! will no longer be my beneficiary for the Reconquest of Iberia.
I can sell my services against the other Christians for a sum of money, if §Y[Root.GetTitledName]§! is willing to pay.
I can ask §Y[Root.GetTitledName]§! for help against the other Christians invaders, in return for a small sum of money.
§Y[FromFrom.GetTitledName]§! will join in our Reconquest War
I can sell my services against the other [From.Religion.GetGroupName]s for a sum of money, if §Y[Root.GetTitledName]§! is willing to pay.
I can ask §Y[Root.GetTitledName]§! for help against the other [Root.Religion.GetGroupName]s defenders, in return for a small sum of money.
It is only right that the Supreme Pontiff has an honor guard to protect himself.
Not currently part of another Crusade
Cannot expel [GetJewsName] during the worst parts of the Black Death epidemic
兵士が§Y[Root.GetTitledName]§!の宮廷に現れます。
§Y近東§!地域を完全に支配している
十字軍の受益者に選択
十字軍の参加者全員が十字軍成功時に創設される十字軍国家で領地を得る後継者である§Y受益者§!を選択できます。
§Yチュートン騎士団§!より称号の階級が高い
§Yチュートン騎士団§!を臣従させる

Recently raised the Teutonic Honor Guard - cannot raise it again until §Y[Root.hire_teutonic_honor_guard_cooldown.GetExpiryDate]§!
チュートン騎士団の目標となっている王国の領域内に領土がある
[saint_person.GetFirstName] has become known as a blessed ancestor, and everyone of [saint_person.GetHerHis] §YBloodline§! will reap the benefits.
[saint_person.GetTitledName] will be made a §YSaint§! of the faith. [saint_person.GetHerHisCap] dynasty would surely appreciate the gesture.
[saint_person.GetTitledName] will be made a §YBlessed Ancestor§! of the faith. [saint_person.GetHerHisCap] §YDynasty§! would surely appreciate the gesture.
公に§Y古代ギリシャ宗教§!を信仰している
公に§Yズン宗教§!を信仰している
[Root.Religion.GetGroupName]の信者でない者が保持している慣習的王位が一つもない
§Y[reconquista_beneficiary_target.GetTitledName]§!はもう自分の受益者ではなくなるだろう
§Y[This.GetTitledName]§!が自分の新たな受益者となる
Reconquista no longer led by the one who started campaign.
イベリア半島でレコンキスタが行われていない
Add promised allies to the §YReconquest War§!

§Y[Root.GetTitledName]§!がイベリア半島の再征服戦争を開始した際はそれに参戦することを約束します。

現在§Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!によって保持されている称号について§Y強い請求権§!を持っているので、命をかけた§Y決闘§!を申し込むことが出来ます。\n§G勝利§!した場合、称号と封臣を手に入れることになります。\n§R敗北§!した場合、請求権を放棄します。そして命までも…

[combatant_1.GetRootRelation]である[combatant_1.GetBestName]は、[target_title.GetName]の請求権があることをもはや黙っているわけにはいかないと宣言し、決闘のために相まみえることを要求してきた。外交伝書使は「この件に関して、最終決定となる」と読み上げた。もし私にこの果たし状を拒否するつもりがあったなら前々から宮廷で噂を耳にできただろうに…

I am [GetEducationActivity], in deep conversation with a fellow [GetEducationRole], when a red-faced courier bursts in. "Your [combatant_1.GetRootRelation] [combatant_1.GetFirstNameWithNick] is challenging you, my [Root.GetLordLady]! To personal combat, for your titles!".
生きて立ち去ることになるのはどちらか片方だけだ…！
No...! This is not how rules of succession should be treated!
少しも無事に済むとは思えない…！
This character is known for chickening out of a good challenge.

私の申し入れを聞くと、[From.GetEducationRole]の[From.GetTitle]は眉間にシワを寄せ、[From.GetEducationReaction]らしい。外交伝書使は「この誘いを断ることによって被る屈辱を[From.GetSheHe]は理解しているのでしょう、我が[Root.GetLordLady]」と述べ、私は「利口な[From.GetManWoman]だ」とつぶやいた。この決闘はすぐに行われる。

The response from [From.GetBestName] feels [From.GetPublicOpinionOfWork], and I have my advisors read through it a couple of times. Finally, they nod in agreement: "It seems [From.GetSheHe] accepts your challenge, my [Root.GetLordLady]. The duel will take place in a few nights."
No..! It was supposed to be me...!

[other_combatant.GetBestName]は[other_combatant.GetClumsilyElegantly]に[other_combatant.GetDuelWeapon]を振り回した。[other_combatant.GetButAndYet]、私はサイドステップで攻撃をしのいだ。「効くと思ってるのか？！」私は叫んだが、帰ってきたのは唸り声だけだった。[other_combatant.GetHerHis]の顔が汗できらめいていることに気付くと、「ままよ」と私は[Root.GetDuelWeapon]を振り上げた。「[other_combatant.GetDuelistRelationOrInsult]よ、神のもとに行け！」

私は「お前は[other_combatant.GetMilitarySquadPride]」で有名なようだが」と[other_combatant.GetRootRelation]に向かってつぶやき、「今は役に立たないようだな、違うか？」と言いながら[Root.GetClumsilyElegantly][Root.GetDuelWeapon]を振り回した。[Root.GetButAndYet]相手は地面に1回攻撃するのに苦労している…

My [other_combatant.GetRootRelation] should have known better. "What were you thinking?" I ask, genuinely curious, as I circle the [other_combatant.GetManWoman], occasionally striking with my [Root.GetDuelWeapon]. "You cannot win this", I declare, as [other_combatant.GetSheHe] winces again, [other_combatant.GetHerHis] wounds clearly beginning to take a serious toll on [other_combatant.GetHerHim].
Curse you, for making me do this...!
I had a feeling I would have to destroy you.
You raise your weapon and strike the killing blow.\n
あるいは…警告を聞き入れるなら取引する用意はあるが？
§Y[other_combatant.GetTitledFirstName]§!はあなたに§Y強い請求権§!がある称号をすべて没収されます。\n

I swing my [GetDuelWeapon] [GetClumsilyElegantly], [GetButAndYet] [other_combatant.GetTitledFirstName] keeps side-stepping my attacks. My opponent does not seem tired at all! Raising [other_combatant.GetHerHis] weapon for a final killing blow, the [other_combatant.GetManWoman] suddenly pauses. "Would you heed a warning, [Root.GetFirstName]?! [GetClaimDuelDemand]"

[other_combatant.GetRootRelation]は私をあざ笑うように「お前は[Root.GetMilitarySquadPride]で有名なようだが」と言い、「今は役に立たないようだな、違うか？」と雄叫びをあげて[other_combatant.GetDuelWeapon]を猛烈に振り回した。[other_combatant.GetSheHe]がもう一度「[GetClaimDuelDemand]」と叫び始めると私の心臓はドクドク跳ねた。

My [other_combatant.GetRootRelation] has spent the better part of an hour humiliating me. I am having trouble standing, my latest lunge of attack left me in the [Root.GetGroundDesc], and my face is streaked with dirt, as well as blood. "What were you thinking?" [other_combatant.GetSheHe] asks, sounding genuinely curious. "[GetClaimDuelDemand]", [other_combatant.GetSheHe] finally pleads.

My [This.GetMySpymasterName] tells me that you were seen coating your weapons, [other_combatant.GetTitledFirstName] says, disappointment tinging [other_combatant.GetHerHis] words. I protest, but my [other_combatant.GetRootRelation] has me seized by [other_combatant.GetHerHis] guards.

We have not even started, when my [other_combatant.GetRootRelation] waves a hand in dismissal. "I have eyes and ears everywhere, [Root.GetFirstName]. Poison, truly?", [other_combatant.GetSheHe] sighs. I can feel the eyes of the crowd on me, burning with contempt at the idea.

The poison should have worked by now, I think to myself, frantically dodging another attack. Am I caught? Did I bungle the ratio? Soon, my opponent has [other_combatant.GetHerHis] blade pointed at my throat.
I... I will walk away while I can, [other_combatant.GetRootRelation]...
I would rather die standing, than live on my knees.
Cut me down, and I will live on within you, [From.GetRootRelation]...!

I swing my [GetDuelWeapon] [GetClumsilyElegantly], [GetButAndYet] [other_combatant.GetTitledFirstName] keeps side-stepping my attacks. My opponent does not seem to tire at all! [other_combatant.GetSheHeCap] tackles me, and we fall into the [Root.GetGroundDesc]. There, we struggle, until my [other_combatant.GetRootRelation] gets hold of a rock and bashes it against my temple...

My [other_combatant.GetRootRelation] has spent the better part of an hour humiliating me. My face is streaked with dirt and blood, and I have trouble standing. "What were you thinking?" [other_combatant.GetSheHe] asks, sounding genuinely curious. Then, with what looks like an effortless swing of [other_combatant.GetHerHis] [other_combatant.GetDuelWeapon], the [other_combatant.GetManWoman] [other_combatant.GetKillingBlowOnMeShort].

Leave your titles behind, and keep your life!
Forfeit your claim to my rule, and walk away from this fight!
I do not want your titles! Just give up your claims to *mine*!
[From.GetBestName]は悟った！ゆっくりとその身を起こし、武器は地面を引きずり、闘志はどこかへ消えたようだ。私の前にひざまずき「お許しください、[Root.GetLordLady]」とぼそぼそ言った[From.GetSheHe]を居合わせた人々は睨みつけた。
You extend a hand to the beaten [From.GetManWoman].\n
分をわきまえろ。お前は[GetRootFromInsult]だ。
You spit your [From.GetRootRelation] in the face.\n
[From.GetBestName]は称号を放棄するということを想像しただけで呆然とし、状況の理解を拒否したので、最終的に[From.GetHerHim]の首を落とす以外の選択肢がなくなった。最期の言葉は私への侮辱の連発だった。

[From.GetBestName] refused to see reason. Instead, [From.GetSheHe] flung [From.GetHerHis] weapon back and forth, flailing wildly, still no closer to actually injuring me – all the while shouting that [From.GetSheHe] would never kneel to me. It was with a heavy sigh that I finally sunk my weapon into [From.GetHerHis] chest.
やれやれ、とんでもない[From.GetManWoman]だったが、死んだか！
As I kneel down to ask for forgiveness, my [From.GetRootRelation] [Root.GetForgiveReject]
takes my hand, saying "you already have it". Then [From.GetSheHe] helps me stand and squeezes my shoulder. "Perhaps we can work these differences out?", [From.GetSheHe] offers.
spits in my face, to the jarring snickers of the crowd. I am left kneeling, face red with shame, and a cold anger growing in the pit of my stomach.
I am glad you show your true feelings, [From.GetFirstName].
この人物は、かつて公衆の面前で恥を晒され、今もその悪評が付いて回っています。

以下のいずれかである：§Y勇敢§!、§Y傲慢§!、§Y野心的§!、§Y勤勉§!、§Y公正§!、§Y社交的§!\n
何度かの[Root.Society.GetName]での集会で[student.GetBestName]を見かけ、不必要に怯えている[student.GetAgeAdjective][student.GetManWoman]を気に掛けずにはいられなかった。話しかけることに二の足を踏み、模擬戦を断っている……「[student.GetSheHeCap]には手助けが必要だ」私の呟きに気が付いた。
小規模の襲撃からの帰途に[student.GetBestName]と話をしたところ、その[student.GetManWoman]は冒険心を全く理解していなかった。「あんたの部族を繁栄させるためにはどうすりゃいいと思う？」と真新しい腕輪で飾られた腕を見せたが、[student.GetSheHeCap]はため息をつくだけで何の感動も受けていないようだった。

Observing yet another game of [Root.GetWarriorLodgeCompetitionType], and [student.GetTitledFirstName] storming off with a sullen expression on [student.GetHerHis] face, it occurs to me how my [student.GetRootRelation] sorely lacks patience. "It is useful in battle as well", I mumble, scratching my chin, contemplating offering [student.GetHerHim] some guidance.
訓練場で稽古をする[student.GetBestName]を見るのは面白いものだ。[student.GetHerHis]の戦闘技術は、稽古に身が入っていないせいか、欠けている物があるようだ。武器や鎧も、少し手入れが必要そうだ……「[student.GetFirstName]、ちょっといいかね？」そう声をかけて[student.GetSheHe]を遮った。
戦士として、[student.GetSheHe]には私の助けが必要だ。
よし、[student.GetFirstName]が野心を持てるようにしてやるか！
The [student.GetManWoman] needs someone to show [student.GetHerHim] a different way.
我が弟子よ、武器の整備について話そう。
私の知ったことではない。
他にやるべきことがある。

「私は貴方が決闘を断っていると聞きました」[teacher.GetManWoman]が私の後ろで声を発した。振り返ると、話していたのは[teacher.GetRootRelation]の[teacher.GetTitledFirstName]であることに気づいた。「[Root.Society.GetNameCap]は当然気づいています」[teacher.GetSheHe]は言った。私の肩に腕をかけながら、[teacher.GetSheHe]は続けた。「私は貴方を助けられます！ちょっとした指導が必要ですがね、いい[Root.GetManWoman]よ！」

[teacher.GetTitledFirstName] が国外遠征から戻った。我が [teacher.GetRootRelation] が、持ち帰った戦利品を披露する。その様子に 溜息をつくと、[teacher.GetHerHim] が手を止めた。「おわかりのはずだ、あなたはいつも手にした物で満足しきってしまう、 [Root.GetFirstName]」 [teacher.GetSheHe] は言い放つ。「野心を研ぎあげる、その手助けをしましょう」、[teacher.GetSheHe]は迫った。

I recently lost a game of [Root.GetWarriorLodgeCompetitionType], and [teacher.GetTitledFirstName] has approached me, wanting to talk about my temper. "Patience is something that comes from within", my [teacher.GetRootRelation] explains. I clench my fist, a gesture not lost on the [teacher.GetManWoman]. "You just need some guidance", [teacher.GetSheHe] finally says.
[teacher.GetBestName]は訓練場で私を見ていた。好奇心があったのだろう。だから[teacher.GetSheHe]がやってきて、私が毎日やっているルーチンについて尋ねても驚かなかった。「武器と鎧の手入れについての知識はどうかな」私が明確な答えを見つけられないでいると、[teacher.GetSheHe]は「私なら剣の手入れの仕方を教えることができる」と弁解することなく続けた。
提案を受けよう。何を考えている？
私はお前の慈善事業ではない！
それは侮辱だと、§Y[teacher.GetTitledFirstName]§!にわからせる。
君はもっと趣味を持たないと。
丁重に申し出をお断りする。
§Y勇敢§!になるかもしれません…
§Y野心的§!になるかもしれません…
§Y忍耐§!強くなるかもしれません…
§Y勤勉§!になるかもしれません…
[student.GetTitledFirstName]は手助けが必要なことを認めた。[student.GetHerHim]に物事の違いをわからせるために、[Root.GetTeachingMomentActivity]
この努力にどれだけ投資しているかを見せます
調子に乗らないようにしよう。
いつものあなた自身のままでいます
[student.GetTitledFirstName]は私の申し出を丁重に断った。[student.GetManWoman]は現在の状態でも元気のようだ。
[student.GetTitledFirstName]は大きなお世話だとかぶつぶついいながら私の申し出を断った。もしこの[student.GetManWoman]に合ったやり方があるとすれば、どうすればよかったんだ？
なんて恩知らずな…！お気に入りの[Root.GetTeachingMomentTool]を持ってこようと思ったのに！
[teacher.GetTitledFirstName]は私の反応を理解せず、決して二度と私を助けることは無いと誓った。
かなり神経質な人っているよね？

When [teacher.GetBestName] informed me that we were going to live in the woods for a few nights, I was tempted to refuse. We could be eaten by snakes! By [Root.GetRegionalFerociousAnimal]s! Or attacked by raiders! However, falling asleep in the wilderness, to the wind and rustling of the trees, my fears began to wane. Now, I do not know what it was that I was so afraid of.
[teacher.GetTitledFirstName]の「書物庫へ数日はこもりましょう」との言葉に、私は消沈してしまった。「その編纂者らは、古今東西の猛者共の全てを知り抜いています」[teacher.GetSheHe]は笑みを浮かべる。ありがたいことに、その物語集に心奪われるまで数刻で済んだ。「出来ると信じていました」[teacher.GetSheHe]は、にんまりとそう告げる。

I was not excited to watch others play games of [Root.GetWarriorLodgeCompetitionType], and I think [teacher.GetTitledFirstName] could tell. Yet, the patience with which my [teacher.GetRootRelation] narrated the matches to me, explaining each subtle move, was eye-opening. Even seeing fighters who lost one day, return for revenge the next, was inspiring!
[teacher.GetRootRelation]が午後の数時間を[teacher.GetHerHis]の武器庫の整理に費やすことを提案したとき、私はすぐに退屈すると思った。それでも[teacher.GetTitledFirstName]は私が興味を持ち続けるように数日間取り計らったので、私は今まで考えもしなかった質問をしている。私は以前の態度が恥ずかしくなりそうだ。
こんな好機を与えてくれるとは。ありがとう、友よ。
I cannot express how grateful I am. Can I... Can I kiss you?
§Y[teacher.GetTitledFirstName]§! is as happy as you are.
§Y[teacher.GetTitledFirstName]§! smiles, and shrugs nonchalantly. "I guess on the cheek would be alright."

I would not have chosen "camping in the woods", but perhaps that is the point. When my [teacher.GetRootRelation] informed me that we were going to live in the wilderness for a few nights, I pushed all imagery of falling off cliffs and being eaten by snakes aside. Looking back on the experience, I have to admit, I am sad it is over.

You want us to spend time, voluntarily, in the library? [teacher.GetTitledFirstName] nods. "Yes! I think you'll enjoy hearing about old heroes," [teacher.GetSheHe] laughs, [teacher.GetHerHis] eyes aglitter. A few hours later, I understand. The tales are fascinating! "Some make for decent role models", I admit.

We are going to watch *others* play at [Root.GetWarriorLodgeCompetitionType]? [teacher.GetTitledFirstName] dismissed my reluctance, and gestured me to a seat. Soon, [teacher.GetSheHe] was narrating the games to me, pointing out subtleties and things I would usually miss. "I.. am beginning to understand how a hot temper might get in the way of these things..." I admit.

Surely, your armory must already be in order? I offer, but [teacher.GetTitledFirstName] shakes [teacher.GetHerHis] head. "This is more about mastering the principles behind the organizing, than the organizing itself" the [teacher.GetManWoman] explains. A few days later, I admit, I have learned some valuable techniques and practices...!
There is nothing to fear here, is there?
Perhaps I simply never knew of all the things I *could* achieve?
I will exercise patience next time, [teacher.GetFirstName].
I will strive to be more diligent in the future, [teacher.GetFirstName].
[teacher.GetTitledFirstName]は私を森へと連れて行き、数日を過ごすことになった。「大地と共に暮らすのだ！」[teacher.GetSheHe]は言った。「私は[Root.GetTitle]です！[Root.GetCapitalHolding]で快適で暮らしてきました。ありがとうございます」私は答えた。数日の間、木々や風の音、食中毒に怯えながら過ごした。
[teacher.GetTitledFirstName] と私は、数日がかりで埃臭く古びた書斎で足掻いた。意味するところが何にせよ、私は「気づいてしまった」らしい。正反対に影響されたと、口惜しげに吐き出す。「恐らくだが、我らは似ても似つかん、結局な」、[teacher.GetManWoman]は失意の中、嘆息した。

[teacher.GetTitledFirstName] forced me to sit and watch all our friends playing games of [Root.GetWarriorLodgeCompetitionType]. And throughout the whole experience, the [teacher.GetManWoman] talked, and talked, trying to explain the game to me. Eventually I had enough and walked out.

[teacher.GetTitledFirstName] put me to cleaning [teacher.GetHerHis] armory. And everything I did was wrong...! The [teacher.GetManWoman] kept giving me counter-effective instructions and muttering under [teacher.GetHerHis] breath about "impossible", and "why do I even try". If there was a lesson in this, I do not think I understood it.
どうして何も学ぶことができないのか分からない。
[student.GetRootRelation]と私はキャンプの旅から帰ってきた。[teacher.GetTeachingMomentResult]
My [student.GetRootRelation] and I are back from our final session with the scribes. [teacher.GetTeachingMomentResult]
My [student.GetRootRelation] and I have retired from watching the games. [teacher.GetTeachingMomentResult]
[student.GetRootRelation]と一緒にようやく私の武器の整理を終えた。[teacher.GetTeachingMomentResult]
この[Root.GetTeachingMomentFocus]は[student.GetHerHim]の中に眠っていたものだ。
I am happy I could help.
[student.GetSheHeCap]は希望を持って[Root.GetTeachingMomentFocus]とは何かを考え続けるでしょう。
となると、＊私の＊失敗ということに？！
手入れは絶えず必要なんだ、こんな風にな...!
一緒に森の中で数日野営をすることにした。私の提案に神経質な笑いで返したところから見るに、[student.GetSheHe]は人里離れた自然に潜む多くの危険に気がついているのだろう……「臆病者には何でもないことだ」私はそう付け加えた。
[Root.Culture.GetName]の有名な戦士達とその歴史的偉業について教育することにした。その逸話は間違いなく[student.GetAgeAdjective]の[student.GetManWoman]を発奮させるに違いない。

we are going to be observing some [Root.GetWarriorLodgeCompetitionType] games. I am hoping it will teach the [student.GetManWoman] that fortune comes and goes, and that your spirit is the only permanent thing in this world.
数日の間、午後には我々で武器庫の整理を行う旨を給仕係に伝えた。今年の春の大掃除は多少の遅れを認めよう！
シジルのコレクション
[student.GetHerHis]の最初の消極性は跡形も無くなり、[student.GetHerHim]の経験を活用していくさまは賞賛に値する。「このような機会を与えて下さり感謝します、[Root.GetFirstName]」[student.GetSheHe]からの言葉は思っていたよりも心の底から出たものだった。
To my amusement, [student.GetSheHe] keeps talking, gesturing excitedly about everything [student.GetSheHe] has learned. [Root.GetTeachingMomentRomanceReaction]
[student.GetSheHeCap]が大喜びしているようには見えなかったが、何かしら掴めるものがあったことを確信している。

I love your [Root.GetTeachingMomentFocus], [student.GetSheHe] mumbles, before moving closer to kiss me.
I would happily learn more about your [Root.GetTeachingMomentFocus], [student.GetSheHe] smiles. Then [student.GetSheHe] moves closer, and I welcome [student.GetHerHis] embrace.
Can I kiss you? [student.GetSheHe] asks suddenly, and I can't stop myself from letting out a laugh. Then I shrug, but make myself clear: only on the cheek.

I am so grateful. I could kiss you! [student.GetSheHe] laughs. I blush, attempting to seem disinterested. [student.GetSheHeCap] lifts me up, and twirls me around, kissing me on the cheek. "Thank you", [student.GetSheHe] says again. Then the moment is gone.
私の頭の側面に[other_combatant.GetHerHis]の[other_combatant.GetDuelWeapon]を打ち付け

bash [other_combatant.GetHerHis] [other_combatant.GetDuelWeapon] into the side of my [Root.GetBodyPartInjured]
[my_spouse.GetHusbandWife]の牝馬が駄目になったので、新しくて扱いやすい馬を見つけることを約束した。 そして、幸運にも一頭だけではなく、三頭の牝馬が[Root.Location.GetName]に持ち込まれた！
[my_spouse.GetHusbandWife] [my_spouse.GetFirstName]は、狩猟鳥の優雅さと強さに魅了されていることを私に説明し、鳥を欲しがっている。\n[my_spouse.GetSheHe]は「まさか[Root.GetTitle]の配偶者でさえ、鷹狩りという気高い娯楽を楽しむことを許可されないということはありませんよね。」と言っている。

My [my_spouse.GetHusbandWife] [my_spouse.GetFirstName] explains that [my_spouse.GetSheHe] is captivated by the grace and strength of hunting birds, and begs me for a bird.\n"They are just so cute, with their little wings and their... Are they called beaks?", [my_spouse.GetSheHe] asks, gesturing at my nose.

While out on their raid into foreign territory, the [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetTitledFirstName] has been taken prisoner by [enemy_captor.Culture.GetName] [enemy_captor.GetTitle], after challenging [enemy_captor.GetHerHim] to one on one combat...!\n"I thought we only sent our brightest", I mutter to the servant delivering the news.

One moment we were dreaming of fighting our way through foreign lands, and the glory that awaited us back home. The next, [From.GetTitledFirstName] has instead been taken prisoner by [enemy_captor.GetTitledFirstName]! I admit, it does not quite fit  the story I was hoping we'd tell.

While dreaming of fighting [From.GetHerHis] way through foreign territory, the [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetTitledFirstName] has instead been taken prisoner by [enemy_captor.GetTitledFirstName]!\n"How the mighty have fallen", a servant chimes, before I shush at him.
After some truly exciting skirmishes in [target_title.GetName], [Root.Society.GetName] have returned home from their legendary journey.

[original_hero.GetTitledFirstName]は[Root.Society.GetName]の最高位の会員が[target_ruler.GetTitledFirstName]の領地[target_ruler.PrimaryTitle.GetName]への冒険に出ることを宣言した。「あなたにはまだやるべきことがあります、[Root.GetFirstName]」[original_hero.GetSheHe]はマグカップに口を付ける前に私に告げた。

They say [From.Capital.GetName] will spend decades mourning the loss of [From.GetTitledName]. Rarely have the [From.Culture.GetName] seen a warrior like [From.GetFirstName], and the [From.GetCapitalHolding] in [From.Capital.Capital.GetName] will forever be the home of the fascinating [From.GetManWoman]. As members of [Root.Society.GetName], we are grateful for the time we shared, and we pray that our young find this legend an ideal worthy of emulating.

When it comes to the topic of military achievements, this character never fails to bring up the adventures of [Root.GetHerHis] brothers and sisters of [Root.Society.GetName].
This character's realm has been targeted by warriors from afar, who have been fighting locals and spreading frustration throughout the ranks of nobles and commoners alike.

いずれの決闘者も§Y妊娠§!していない\n

勇敢な[Root.GetTitledName]へ、

貴殿は入団の儀式で一つの傷も受けなかったと聞きました！それは[Root.GetWarriorRole]として実に素晴らしいことであり、そのような者が我らの卓に加わることを誇りに思います。ここに、謹んで貴殿を当戦士団に招待いたします。

（署名）、
[From.GetTitledName]

高潔な[Root.GetTitledName]よ。

儀式によって、あなたの勇気と積極的な姿勢を我々に示してくれました。我々はあなたを仲間として喜んで招待しましょう。

[From.GetTitledName]

果敢なる[Root.GetTitledName]、

（署名）、
[From.GetTitledName]

I can't take it any longer. "Jailer!" I shout. For some reason the person who shows up on the other sides of the bars is a [crossfire_target.GetManWoman], saying "I heard we had a real brute down here. I got curious." I lash out at [crossfire_target.GetHerHis] smirk, punching the iron bar so hard my fingers crunch. My blood boils, but all I can do is crumple to the floor, the pain overwhelming my blood thirst.

I can't stand being confined here. In the corner of our cell, [crossfire_target.GetFirstName] stands, scratching something in the wall. "Doesn't it drive you mad?!" I growl at [crossfire_target.GetHerHim]. "YOU drive me mad!" [crossfire_target.GetSheHe] roars, flying for my throat. My boiling blood takes hold of me and soon the [crossfire_target.GetManWoman] is lying whimpering on the floor.

I have lost track of day and night, and everything reeks. The other prisoners laugh when I start attacking the wall. "Acting out your frustration?", they mock. After a few days, and some ridicule from the jailer, I manage to break loose an iron bar... The feeling of an actual weapon in my hand makes my blood boil.
You want to go again?! I can do this all day!
Get out of my way! I am getting OUT of here!
Get out of my w- Oh, no! I'm sorry! Are you hurt?

Impressive! [other_combatant.GetTitledFirstName] splutters, on [other_combatant.GetHerHis] knees in the [Root.Capital.GetGroundDesc]. Finally, I let the anger fill me. \nSuddenly, the taste of blood fills my mouth. "YOU were going to poison ME?", [other_combatant.GetSheHe] hisses, throwing a second dagger into my chest.

Could I have messed up the ingredients...? "Wait!" I call out in desperation, trying to buy myself some time. Something is wrong, I think frantically, but it is too late. The [other_combatant.GetManWoman] [other_combatant.GetKillingBlowOnMeShort].

敵は緊張していて、鎧もあまり合っていないので、日を改めるか尋ねようかとまで思った…。瞬く間にその思考を止め、新鮮な朝の空気に感覚を研ぎ澄ます。[other_combatant.GetCharacterLook][other_combatant.GetManWoman]は直ぐに地面に転がり、痛みで呻き声を上げることになった。

Pain is throbbing in my [GetBodyPartInjured], and I clench my jaw, trying not to cry. "It's not over!" I growl, but my opponent is lowering [other_combatant.GetHerHis] weapon. [other_combatant.GetTitledFirstName] is taken aback when I [other_combatant.GetWeaponInjuringBlow]. "[Root.GetTitledFirstName] wins!" someone proclaims, and my opponent groans. I am ignoring the pain in my [GetBodyPartInjured], but I have a suspicion [GetSeverityOfInjury].

「まだだ！まだ私は戦える！」膝を突きながら、自分ですら嘘だと感じてしまう言葉を口に出す。[other_combatant.GetTitledFirstName]も確かに[other_combatant.GetBodyPartInjured]を怪我しているが、[other_combatant.GetSheHe]が勝者として宣言された。項垂れながら、自分の怪我のことを考える。[Root.GetSeverityOfInjury]と感じている。
「あなたは諦めない、そうだろう？」対戦相手が笑う。「そのことを考えていたところだ」私は呟き、立ち上がろうとする。[other_combatant.GetSheHeCap]が[Root.GetWeaponInjuringBlowOnMe]させた……私は地に崩れ落ち、[other_combatant.GetTitledFirstName]は勝利に微笑んでいる。

Die! [other_combatant.GetTitledFirstName] bellows, with what must be the last of [other_combatant.GetHerHis] strength. The blow to my [GetBodyPartInjured] comes with a blinding pain, but one last glance at my opponent, I feel certain that the exhausted [other_combatant.GetManWoman] will join me in my death...

It is with effort that I finally [other_combatant.GetWeaponInjuringBlow]. But as it dawns on me that I am about to win the fight, instead of letting out a cry of victory, I struggle for breath. As I fall to the ground, I can't feel my legs. The last thing I see is the blue sky.

There is something odd about the reluctance with which [other_combatant.GetTitledFirstName] is fighting. Perhaps the poison I had my agents prepare is working better than anticipated? My [GetBodyPartInjured] is stinging with pain, and inspecting my other wounds, I find myself feeling dizzy, my vision beginning to blur... No... No, no, no!

[other_combatant.GetTitledFirstName] is moving sluggishly. Perhaps it's due to the special breakfast I had my agents prepare for [other_combatant.GetHerHim], but it is clear that the [other_combatant.GetManWoman] is not in [other_combatant.GetHerHis] best form. Before anyone catches on, I attack with full force. It feels almost too easy.

[other_combatant.GetTitledFirstName] is moving [other_combatant.GetClumsilyElegantly], yet I can't even muster the strength to hold my [GetDuelWeapon] right. "You look tired, my [Root.GetLordLady]", [other_combatant.GetSheHe] says, stepping closer. I want to protest, but my head is swimming. Smirking, [other_combatant.GetSheHe] swings [other_combatant.GetHerHis] [other_combatant.GetDuelWeapon], and [Root.GetKillingBlowOnMeShort].

ふと、[other_combatant.GetHerHis]の鎧が簡単に壊れそうな気がし、しかも[other_combatant.GetTitledFirstName]は私の小細工に気付きそうになかった。あとは正しい場所に当てるだけ…そこだ！[other_combatant.GetManWoman]はゴロゴロと回り、自分の[other_combatant.GetBodyPartInjured]を抱えて、余りの痛みに叫んでいる。

I instructed the squire to weaken my opponent's armor, but I am having trouble spotting the sabotage. "Are you making a wish?" [other_combatant.GetTitledFirstName] asks, impatiently – we have been at this for hours, and my scheming has lead nowhere. I back away, clutching my [GetBodyPartInjured]. [GetSeverityOfInjuryCap].
跡がなくならない方法はないだろう
しばらく癒えないだろう
it easily could have been worse
it's going to leave more than a scar

I am not sure what words of comfort I can offer, but I understand [craven_ruler.GetHerHis] feelings of guilt and shame. Is this the ruler [craven_ruler.PrimaryTitle.GetName] should have?
[craven_ruler.GetTitledFirstName]が最近[craven_ruler.GetSheHe]への決闘の挑戦を断ったそうだ。最初、私は[craven_ruler.GetHerHis]の臣下として、きまりが悪く感じたのだが、私と同じように思わない人がいるだろうか。それともやはり、相手を選ぶことも一つの知恵なのだろうか...?
そうだな、命あっての物種だ。
いいや! 私は[craven_ruler.GetSheHe]が臆病者として晒され続けているのを恥じる!

[From.GetTitledName] stops me in the great hall today, beckoning me to the side. In a low voice, my [From.GetRootRelation] explains that [From.GetSheHe] thinks I am right to be cautious, when all manner of villains and fools challenge my rule. "You set an example, saying that it's fair to prefer the diplomatic approach. Thank you."

[From.GetTitledFirstName] has sent me a letter, containing thinly veiled accusations of cowardice. "It is no way to uphold ideals of honor, my [Root.GetLordLady], declaring the preferred course of action to be inaction." I... I have to do something about this.

My first reaction is reluctant, but out loud I say: "Yes, of course". Perhaps this is the first step towards freeing myself of the desire for material possessions?
最初は一分が永遠のように感じられたが、その後、[book_target.GetName]のある一節が私の興味を引いたので、読むのが楽になった。私は[book_target.OriginalOwner.GetTitledFirstName]の言葉に夢中になって読み続けた!今、私は唇に笑顔を浮かべ、目的意識を新たにして眠りについた。

[This.GetTitledFirstName]は[This.Capital.Kingdom.GetName][Root.GetKingQueen]になることを目指します。異教であり、相続法が選挙分割相続制である場合は、慣習上の王国内に対して服属の開戦事由を何度でも利用できます。請求権の捏造の評議員任務が可能ならば、野望によって[This.Capital.Kingdom.GetName]の請求権を獲得するかもしれません。[This.Capital.Kingdom.GetTier]の称号がまだ存在していなければ、作成に必要なコストを減少します。

[GetFromRootCompliment] [Root.GetTitledFirstName]へ、
怠惰に留まるのは戦士の血ではありません。そのため貴方に、私を支援して我が敵に対するよう請い願います。戦争における貴方の関与に基づき、貴方を集会所で称賛することを約束します。[GetWarLetterFlavor]

[From.GetTitledName]

あなたが機知を保つためにこの手付かずの機会に加わることを期待します。
I am certain that partaking in a war will steady your aim for your future hunts.

To the [GetFromRootCompliment] [Root.GetTitledFirstName],
I heard that you turned down the offer made from [warrior_lodge_war_defender.GetTitledFirstName]. My counter offer is similar, I will put in a good word you at the lodge with the possibility of something additional if my victory is ensured. 

With the hope of your support,
[From.GetTitledName]

To the [GetFromRootCompliment] [Root.GetTitledFirstName],
I am reaching out to you, asking if you wish to join the war against [warrior_lodge_war_defender.GetTitledFirstName]. I promise to put in a good word you at the lodge if I win the war. [GetWarLetterFlavor]

With the hope of your support,
[From.GetTitledName]

The war that raged between [warrior_lodge_war_attacker.GetTitledFirstName] and [warrior_lodge_war_defender.GetTitledFirstName] has now ended in favor of [warrior_lodge_war_victor.GetFirstName]. [GetWarLetterOutcome]

The war that raged between [warrior_lodge_war_attacker.GetTitledFirstName] and [warrior_lodge_war_defender.GetTitledFirstName] has now come to a sizzling ending in white peace. [GetWarLetterOutcome]

The war that raged between [warrior_lodge_war_attacker.GetTitledFirstName] and [warrior_lodge_war_defender.GetTitledFirstName] has now ended in favor of [warrior_lodge_war_victor.GetFirstName]. [GetWarLetterOutcome]

Pleased with the aid I provided in the war, [warrior_lodge_war_side.GetFirstName] has sent me a letter informing me that [warrior_lodge_war_side.GetSheHe] has begun to spread the word of my ferocity and great deeds.
[warrior_lodge_war_side.GetFirstName] has sent me a letter informing me that [warrior_lodge_war_side.GetSheHe] will not speak highly of me for my passive deeds.
The nerve of this brazen fool!
What should I have done differently...?
There is truth in his harsh words. I must abandon my craven ways.

Another letter from [warrior_lodge_war_side.GetFirstName] arrived today. [warrior_lodge_war_side.GetSheHeCap] shares the news of people's reactions after he regaled them the grand tales of my deeds. Along with the stories is also an invitation to join [warrior_lodge_war_side.GetHerHim] in [GetSuggestedActivity]...
exchanging knowledge of war among other things
celebration of their, as well as my own, victory in the war.
I happily accept! What a joyous occasion to share with [warrior_lodge_war_side.GetFirstName].
Decline the invitation. It is not suitable to my taste.

I can tell by the handwriting that another letter from [warrior_lodge_war_side.GetFirstName] has arrived on my desk. After I accepted [warrior_lodge_war_side.GetHerHis] invitation to celebrate [warrior_lodge_war_side.GetHerHis] victory, [warrior_lodge_war_side.GetSheHe] has written more often. Surely there's a reason for this continued contact?
Time spent [warrior_lodge_war_side.GetFirstName] are precious memories I will forever cherish.
I never thought that I could find love as a consequence of war...
My letters to [warrior_lodge_war_side.GetFirstName] is nothing but formality.

The sudden death of [From.GetBestName] has left an undeniable sense of emptiness. [From.GetHerHisCap] prowess and strength in the battlefield were legendary. Although [From.GetSheHe] is sorely missed, I am sure that [From.GetTitledFirstName] is celebrated as a true warrior in the afterlife as well.
I shall have a weapon forged in [From.GetHerHis] honor!
We must teach and reflect on [From.GetHerHis] techniques!
A moment in calm solitude is the best way to pay respects.
You try to find a smithy of worth to make this weapon...

My search for a worthy weaponsmith has reached the ears of [weapon_forger.GetBestName], who tells me of a ritual that can infuse the strength of [dead_warrior.GetFirstName] into a weapon. [weapon_forger.GetSheHeCap] claims that this ritual requires the weapon to be forged in the remains of [dead_warrior.GetFirstName] or the body of a close relative. My choice is between desecrating the remains of the dead or to add another one to their ranks.
Forgive me, my friend, but I require your strength.
You decide to risk getting caught retrieving [dead_warrior.GetFirstName] remains...
The blood of a family member will have to do.
You decide to attempt a kidnapping of [potential_sacrifice.GetFirstName]...
No, stop this nonsense! Away with you!
abduct the close blood relative of my dear friend
retrieve the resting remains of my dear friend

Under the cover of darkness, I deploy my plan to [GetDecidedActionInHF51002] to forge a soulbound weapon. Although the plan was hastily crafted, I had not expected if to fail so dramatically. [witness1.GetTitledFirstName] is staring at me with such intensity one's skin could burn, and [witness1.GetSheHe] is not alone in witnessing my crime.
No! It is not what you think!
It was [weapon_forger.GetTitledFirstName]! [weapon_forger.GetSheHeCap] told me to do this!

I succeeded in my plan to [GetDecidedActionInHF51002] to forge a soulbound weapon. Memories of [dead_warrior.GetFirstName] flood my mind, soon their strength will be wieldable in the shape of a weapon. My efforts are finally bearing fruit, and [weapon_forger.GetTitledFirstName] requests an answer on what kind of weapon I want forged.
An axe is the most appropriate way to honor [dead_warrior.GetFirstName].
[dead_warrior.GetFirstName] would have wanted a sword in [dead_warrior.GetHerHis] name.
A mace to crush both my and the old enemies of [dead_warrior.GetFirstName].

The day has finally come, the [GetDecidedWeapon] infused with the strength of [dead_warrior.GetFirstName] is now complete. [weapon_forger.GetTitledFirstName] suggests you test the weapon, but just a few swings in the air was all it took for the [GetDecidedWeapon] to shatter! [weapon_forger.GetFirstName] struggles for words and then mutters that it is a bad omen.
...It was simply bad luck, nothing else.
This is clearly your fault! Fix it!
I will sacrifice your life to appease the gods.

The day has finally come, the [GetDecidedWeapon] infused with the strength of [dead_warrior.GetFirstName] is now complete. [weapon_forger.GetTitledFirstName] said [weapon_forger.GetSheHe] would bring the weapon to me first thing in the morning, but never showed. The intrusive thought of [weapon_forger.GetHerHim] stealing my [GetDecidedWeapon] enters my mind.
[weapon_forger.GetSheHeCap] is simply running late, that is all.

The day has finally come, the [GetDecidedWeapon] infused with the strength of [dead_warrior.GetFirstName] is now complete. As I arrive at the decided location of meeting with [weapon_forger.GetTitledFirstName], I hear [weapon_forger.GetHerHim] screaming bloody murder. [unfortunate_child.GetTitledFirstName] had somehow gotten a hold of the weapon and injured [unfortunate_child.GetHerselfHimself]!
This is a cursed weapon that thirsts for blood! Get rid of it!
その武器が子供を傷つけたわけではない。責任は[unfortunate_child.GetFirstName]にある。

Many good omens have shown the last couple of days, and the completed [GetDecidedWeapon] infused with the strength of [dead_warrior.GetFirstName] is now in my hands. Though the weapon seems ordinary to me, [weapon_forger.GetTitledFirstName] adamantly says that the ritual was a success.
I hope [dead_warrior.GetFirstName] is witnessing this from the afterlife.
I do not appreciate you lying to me, [weapon_forger.GetFirstName].

Many good omens have shown the last couple of days, and the completed [GetDecidedWeapon] infused with the strength of [dead_warrior.GetFirstName] is now in my hands. A sudden gust of wind passes by as I touch the weapon and the voice of [dead_warrior.GetFirstName] starts ringing in my ear. Though brief, it was as if [dead_warrior.GetFirstName] was standing next to me.
A part of [dead_warrior.GetFirstName] truly is in this weapon.
No! This is a cursed weapon that thirsts for blood! Get rid of it!

Many good omens have shown the last couple of days, and the completed [GetDecidedWeapon] infused with the strength of [dead_warrior.GetFirstName] is now in my hands. A surge of energy fills me as I touch the weapon. I hear the laughter of [dead_warrior.GetFirstName] in my mind as vividly as if [dead_warrior.GetSheHe] were standing in front of me. As [dead_warrior.GetHerHis] laughter dies, I feel stronger than ever!

儀式を執行する傑出したカトリック聖職者を見つけた今、式典そのものの準備をする時が来た。 残念ながら、戦争中のため、戴冠式に集まれるものは限られてくるだろう。
戴冠式が近づいている。私が神と全ての家臣たちの前で[Root.GetTitle]の冠を戴くまであとたったの数日だ。待つには長い時間だが、その日が大きな戦いの真っただ中となっていないよう願うばかりだ…

What sort of [Root.GetTitle] am I to become? I could not even manage to organize a proper coronation ceremony, during a time of peace. Here I am, wading through the mud of a military encampment, preparing to receive my crown in the most undignified of settings...

However justified my reasons were to organize a secluded ceremony during a war, my vassals are far from pleased. Not only do they perceive it as a sign of weakness, but they all seem to have taken their lack of invitation as a personal slight against them!

I have only heard of [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s pending coronation after the news spread across the realm. It seems that the [From.GetTitle] has organized a very secluded ceremony for [From.GetHerHis] coronation, to be held in [From.GetHerHis] own military tent. Invitation was granted only to [From.GetHerHis] most trusted councilors.
[coronation_priest.GetHerHis]の地に送り込まれた枢機卿は、ローマ教皇に軽視されてはいない。教皇の公使はまるでそう言わんばかりであった。身をもって示さんとあらん限りの傍若無人ぶりであった。事あるごとに待遇の欠如に不満をぶちまけ、彼をあらゆる危険にさらす戦時の戴冠式挙行をとりやめるよう言い募るのであった。
私の主が執り行った密やかな戴冠式に[coronation_priest.GetTitledFirstName]が失望したことは驚くに値しない。[coronation_priest.GetTitle]は、[coronation_priest.GetHerHim]が参加するには道程が危険すぎると主張し、主のもとに訪れることさえ拒否した。
天幕の中に軍を練る指揮官たちの大声が響く。[coronation_priest.GetTitledFirstName]は私に簡単な祝福をし、神の恩寵によって[coronation_ruler.PrimaryTitle.GetName]の[coronation_ruler.GetTitle]であると略式に宣言をしてその頂きに王冠を載せた。
天幕の中に軍を練る指揮官たちの大声が響く。[coronation_priest.GetTitledFirstName]の特は私に簡単な祝福をし、神の恩寵によって[coronation_ruler.PrimaryTitle.GetName]の[coronation_ruler.GetTitle]であると略式に宣言をしてその頂きに王冠を載せた。
天幕の中に軍を練る指揮官たちの大声が響く。[coronation_priest.GetTitledFirstName]は[coronation_ruler.GetFirstName]に簡単な祝福をし、神の恩寵によって[coronation_ruler.PrimaryTitle.GetName]の[coronation_ruler.GetTitle]であると略式に宣言をしてその頂きに王冠を載せた。

天幕の中に軍を練る指揮官たちの大声が響く。[coronation_priest.GetTitledFirstName]の特使は[coronation_ruler.GetFirstName]に簡単な祝福をし、神の恩寵によって[coronation_ruler.PrimaryTitle.GetName]の[coronation_ruler.GetTitle]であると略式に宣言をしてその頂きに王冠を載せた。
式典がようやく終了したので、[From.GetTitledFirstName]は別れを告げ、[From.GetHerHis]の私的な天幕から私を他の客人と一緒に解放した。
延々と先延ばしにした後、この統治者は戦争の最中という最悪の時に急いで王位に就くことを余儀なくされた。
§Y評議会§!でよい地位を与えられた
この統治者に対して非常に高い§Y評価§!を持っている
この統治者に対して程々の§Y評価§!を持っている

After [From.GetHerHis] labor, I think [From.GetSheHe] deserves a treat.
Allow your [GetFromRelation] to recover [From.GetHerHis] own way.
Solace in solitude is what [From.GetSheHe] requires.
Allow your [GetFromRelation] to mourn in peace.
My [GetFromRelation] has been surprisingly understanding of my new habits. Knowing that I have [From.GetHerHis] unconditioned approval has put me much more at ease with my recent change in lifestyle.
If only my throne was as supportive...

I was surprised to see how tactful my [GetFromRelation] has been ever since my last pregnancy. [From.GetSheHeCap] has allowed me to mourn in peace, without complaining about my isolation or attempting to drag me back into society.
I only wish I could find the strength to thank [From.GetHerHim]...

[From.GetTitledName] has accused me of cowardice and incompetence! [From.GetSheHeCap] claims I am not fit to serve as the regent of [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName], and has challenged me to single combat for the title.

With [From.GetFirstName] defeated, nobody is left to contest my claim to the regency [Root.Liege.PrimaryTitle.GetName]. It is blatant to everybody at court that only my lead can ensure the prosperity and stability of the realm during these dangerous times.
ポルフィロゲネトス――すなわち「緋紫色の産室生れ」です。 これは、皇居の緋紫色の産室で産まれた皇帝の嫡出子にのみ授与される名誉です。 彼らの後継者としての請求権は、両親が王位に上る前に生まれた年上の兄弟よりも強いものです。

This character had the honor of being born in the Purple Chamber of the Imperial Palace. As such, [Root.GetHerHis] succession claim is stronger than that of older siblings born before their parents ascended the throne.
かつての帝国の主要地域及び帝都ローマを取り戻すことができたなら、ビザンツ帝国は西欧の人々にも真にして正当たるローマ帝国の後継者と認識されるでしょう。
かつての帝国の主要地域及び帝都ローマを取り戻すことができたなら、[Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName]は再び[e_roman_empire.GetName]の名を取り戻すことができるでしょう。
[From.GetSheHeCap] just needs a good beating, that is all!
Compliment §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! for [From.GetHerHis] vocabulary, preventing [From.GetHerHim] from §YAntagonizing§! you for some time.
For your admirable honesty, I dub thee Sir [From.GetFirstName] of the Turnip!
Grant §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! a knighthood for [From.GetHerHis] honesty, preventing [From.GetHerHim] from §YAntagonizing§! you for some time.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] has entirely misunderstood my intent! Rather than being upset by my slanderous allegations, [From.GetSheHe] praised me for my refined vocabulary.
Do not worry, [From.GetFirstName], I have much more to say!
I will just have to try harder!
Perhaps I should rethink my strategy...
[From.GetFirstName] was ecstatic hearing my praise and assured me that [From.GetSheHe] has a lot more interesting names to call me.
Hopefully they will all be as endearing!
[From.GetTitledFirstName] has entirely misunderstood my intent! Rather than being upset by my slanderous allegations, [From.GetSheHe] praised me for my honesty, and even decided to knight me!
You can always count on me to tell the truth, my [From.GetTitle]!

People of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName], lend me your ears! After the miraculous recovery of territory lost centuries ago, our mighty nation has been reborn! Our land has endured dark times since the imperial frontiers were stormed by barbarians and province after province burned at their touch, but now a bright new age has dawned for all of civilization.\n\nOur great Nation will no longer be referred to as [e_byzantium.GetName] by jealous pretenders, but recognized as the true heir to the legacy of its illustrious ancestors. [Root.GetTitledFirstName] rules a restored Imperium, but much work remains to be done. There is still territory to recover and ancient borders to reclaim. For the Senate and People of [Root.Capital.GetName]!

The [From.Culture.GetName] [From.GetTitle], has somehow managed to reclaim enough lost territory to declare [e_roman_empire.GetName] restored! It can no longer be denied that they are the true successors of the Empire of old and its glorious legacy. They claim a new era is upon us.
魂喰い教団は魔女によって呪われ砂漠を永遠に彷徨い、不用心な旅人の魂によって生きながらえている穢れた人々と言われています。常人の理解を超えた力によって、人間の形をとって犠牲者を欺き、文明社会の暗い隅での生き方を見つける時もあります。
Has not been approached by the Soul Eaters before.
Attempt to find out whether §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! is open to the power of the occult. If so, you turn [Root.GetHerHim] into a Soul Eater.

During [Root.GetHerHis] rite of adulthood, this character tried to curry the favor of benevolent spirits, painting [Root.GetHerHis] face in vibrant colors, hoping to attract prosperity and peace for [Root.GetHerselfHimself] and [Root.GetHerHis] family.

During [Root.GetHerHis] rite of adulthood, this character tried to curry the favor of warmongering spirits, painting [Root.GetHerHis] face in strident colors, hoping to be blessed with power beyond [Root.GetHerHis] reach and instill fear in [Root.GetHerHis] enemies.

During [Root.GetHerHis] rite of adulthood, this character tried to curry the favor of trickster spirits, painting [Root.GetHerHis] face in dark colors, hoping they will help [Root.GetHerHim] conceal [Root.GetHerHis] intentions and strike [Root.GetHerHis] enemies.

During [Root.GetHerHis] rite of adulthood, this character tried to curry the favor of the guardian spirits of the Underworld, painting [Root.GetHerHis] face in pale colors, hoping to be spared from an untimely death.
私は、もう間もなく[Root.GetBoyGirl]ではなくなる。成人の証となる通過儀礼を行うときが迫っている。その儀式を盛大にすればするほど、精霊たちは私を祝福すると、シャーマンたちは断言した。
[Root.Capital.GetName]の住民全てが、招かれるだろう!
大規模な祝福のおかげで、今後 §Y20§! 年にわたって通過儀礼の恩恵を受ける。
顔見知りをみんな呼ぼう!
一般的な祝福のおかげで、今後 §Y10§! 年にわたって通過儀礼の恩恵を受ける。
これはプライベートな儀式だ!
小さな祝福のおかげで、今後 §Y5§! 年にわたって通過儀礼の恩恵を受ける。
そんな馬鹿げた迷信を信じるものか!
Refuse to perform the rite of passage.
群衆が宮殿の周囲に押し寄せ、一人前の[Root.GetManWoman]となった私が姿を見せるのを待っていた。吟唱、シンバル、そしてドラムの音が、身支度を整える私の部屋まで響き渡っていた。シャーマンは、この場が精霊たちが生者の世界に引かれて徘徊する危険な境界となっているため、些細なことで怒らないように注意しろ、と警告してきた。

A small crowd has reunited around my palace, waiting for me to emerge as a grown [Root.GetManWoman]. The sound of chanting, cymbals and drums echoes all the way to my chambers while I prepare myself. The shamans warned me that this is a delicate and dangerous transition when the spirits roam closer to the world of the living, and that I should be careful not to anger the wrong ones.

The little group of relatives and acquaintances awaits in the great hall, chanting and waiting for me to emerge as a grown [Root.GetManWoman]. The shamans warned me that this is a delicate and dangerous transition when the spirits roam closer to the world of the living, and that I should be careful not to anger the wrong ones.
命の精霊たち、私を見守り給え！
強大な何かが、私に力を貸してくれないだろうか。
トリックスターたちが私に知恵を授けてくださいますように！
精霊たちは私を死や病気から守ってくれるのだろうか？
鮮やかな色で自分をペイントする。
険しい色で自分をペイントする。
黒色で自分をペイントする。
淡い色で自分をペイントする。
精霊と魔法は私たちの近くに存在しており、木の中、川の底、私たちの頭の上、そして私たちが歩いている大地の下に隠れているのだ。
Upon reaching adulthood, characters perform a rite of passage.
§G真の信仰を崇拝する州のユニットは陸軍士気ボーナスを受けます§!

ビザンツ帝国の記章である王冠は真のローマ帝国の後継者にのみふさわしい。
Take some time to rest and relax.

[From.GetTitledFirstName]と[From.GetPossPronoun]の[GetFromVsNewRelation]である[New.GetTitledFirstName]は、その血脈の神々しい純潔さを確保するため、[From.Religion.GetHighGodName]の祝福を受けて結婚し、満ち足りた秩序を保っている。私たちは、式典のために支払うべき王室援助税を集めることができる。
人物は時に血を浴びることがあります。
キャラクターポートレートで血のエフェクトを使用しません。
§R要件全てが満たされ、かつ、少なくとも1つの潜在的支援者が外交範囲内において利用可能でなければなりません。§!
§Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! will become the founder of a new §YBloodline§!

Thanks to the tireless efforts of the glorious [Root.GetTitledFirstName], the lands of the [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] have been wrestled from the barbarity and the misery of its dark past, and have been dragged into a new era of clarity and order. 
A new urbanized bureaucratic caste has taken hold of the provinces once held by quarreling warlords, reinvigorating the Imperial Throne with legitimacy and power beyond all expectations.

Ten thousand years of peace and prosperity upon the great [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName] dynasty and its magnificent reformer!
Let darkness and violence be forever banned from our heavenly realm.
シワコアトルシワコアトル
ウトラメール文化を需要
ヨーロッパ人の侵略によりレヴァントには多数の異なる文化がもたらされ、混在するようになった。これらの文化が衝突し合った結果、ウトラメール人というアイデンティティが誕生することになる。
自分の一族の全§Y廷臣§!が§Yウトラメール§!文化になる
直轄領内の全ての§Y[latin.GetGroupName]§!文化の州が§Yウトラメール§!文化になる

Against all odds, the children of Christ have succeeded in their misbegotten quest to reconquer Jerusalem! \nHosts of archangels with shining armor and flaming swords have been reported to have descended upon the walls of the holy city during the final battle, smiting the infidels, turning the defenders' weapons into rust and melting their eyes out.\nA child now rules over the Kingdom of Heaven, and few doubt that it was through divine intervention that [From.GetSheHe] was put there.

Against all odds, the children of Christ have succeeded in their unlikely quest to reconquer Jerusalem! \nHosts of archangels with shining armor and flaming swords have been reported to have descended upon the walls of the holy city during the final battle, smiting the infidels, turning the defenders' weapons into rust and melting their eyes out.\n[From.GetFirstName] now rules over the Kingdom of Heaven, and few doubt that it was through divine intervention that [From.GetSheHe] was put there.

新たな征服の夢の後、人生と富を浪費するのではなく、[Root.GetTitledFirstName]はその人生を領地の改善に捧げた。支配の中でいくつかの都市を建設し、領地と街道のインフラを改善し支配地の生活環境を驚くほどに改善した。その努力のおかげで、[Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName]はさらに繁栄し他では見ないほど人口の多い領地へと成長した。新たな街を作ることに精力的な貢献をした[Root.GetTitledFirstName]のことを、数多の入植者たちはいつまでも忘れないだろう。\n
完全に忘れられることを回避することが私の最大の関心事ではあるが、子孫に私のことをどのように思っていて欲しいか考えることもまた重要だ。私が死んだ時に、後世の人々が畏怖の念を抱いて語り、[Root.GetTitle]としての私の偉業を驚愕して、私のようになりたいと心を動かすにはどのようにすればよいだろう。
私の名を不滅なものとするために、先人たちの偉業を超えて領地を改善して、[Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName]に消えない名を残さなければならない。

美徳と知恵の灯台である[Root.GetTitledFirstName]は、[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]の言葉と聖典に隠された真理への追究のために[Root.GetHerHis]の長い統治期間を捧げたことで不滅の名声を獲得しました。\n始まりの論争を乗り越え、[Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName]の[Root.GetTitle]はこの世界やその先への理解を深める終わることの議論を行う学者や神学者の宮廷を確立した。

十字軍は[From.Religion.GetName]の領国を離れ、コンスタンティノープルと[e_byzantium.GetName]に目を向けている。同時期、ローマ教皇は人間の悪行や善良な信徒がいかに惑わされてきたかについて怒りに満ちた演説を行った。[ThePope.GetSheHeCap]は教会からの破門ですべての十字軍を脅したが十字軍はボスポラスの古都に向かって進んでいる。\n\nかつて[From.Religion.GetGroupName]信仰の拠り所であったものが今では必死に自分の身を守っている。そして[e_byzantium.Holder.GetTitledName]は[e_byzantium.Holder.GetSheHe]が手に入れることのできるどんな助けにも縋ろうとしている。

コンスタンティノープルは[From.Religion.GetName]十字軍の大喝采の下に陥落した。ローマ帝国の最後の記憶が打ち砕かれ世界が涙を流している。前皇帝の[FromFrom.GetDynName]は帝国を取り戻すために[FromFrom.Capital.GetName]に逃げ延びた。

[Root.GetByzantineRefugeeText]今やコンスタンチノープルの玉座に[e_latin_empire.Holder.GetTitledFirstName]皇帝が座っている。[e_latin_empire.Holder.GetSheHeCap]はギリシャ帝国の新しい支配者になると宣言し、ギリシャとラテンの伝統を念頭に置いて統治するつもりだ。

[From.Religion.GetName]の教徒たちが[From.Religion.GetGroupName]の防壁を壊した者として記憶されるか、それともコンスタンチノープルを偉大なものに回復させた者として記憶されるかは、時間だけが教えてくれるだろう。
戦闘の最中に[From.Religion.GetName]がスポンサーとなっていたビザンチンの王位継承者、[byzantine_refugee.GetDynName]は死亡した。

Cart after cart is brought before me. I try to keep track of how many there are but quickly loses count. They are numerous, and every single one is filled with nothing but gold. To see such wealth is extraordinary and to know that all of it belong to me...

Just as I am about to retire for the day a messenger comes running up to me, quite out of breath. He bows quickly before speaking, "Forgive me, my [Root.GetLordLady], for disturbing but... Our gold mine has collapsed! There is simply no more gold to be found in [depleted_gold_mine_target.GetName]"
なんだと！？ もう金は出ないのか！？
[depleted_gold_mine_target.GetName]の金鉱採掘が再開されたという知らせを受けた！労働者たちは数日前に発見した新鉱脈で、すでに採掘を始めている。
近頃の[gold_inflation_province.GetName]への金の流入は、現地価格の急騰を招いている。そのせいで私に税を納める農民たちまで窮乏している！
巧妙な投資は物価上昇を気に掛けるものだ。
兵たちに命じて、金を無理やり回収させろ！
旅商人が様々な交易品を売買する小規模な交易所です。
A trade post that has grown into a large market, attracting a wider range of merchants and trade goods.
This is a significant trading hub on the Trans-Saharan trade route. It attracts merchants from all over Africa, trading wares and services that cannot be found anywhere else.
金を採掘して鋳造する場所。この輝く金属は高価で、通貨としてよく利用される。
大量の金の採掘を可能にするための優れた設備を備えた鉱山。
The production of this larger mining complex is unrivaled. It produces an immense amount of gold.
高品質な布を製造して販売する場所です。
大量の塩を採掘するための鉱山です。非常に価値のある交易品で同じ重さの金と同じ価値があると言われています。
The gold mine has been depleted and will not provide any gold until another vein is found.
A large influx of gold has caused prices to be severly increased.
An influx of gold has caused prices to increase.
Local peasant are rioting after having had their possessions confiscated.
Sacrificing a lot of people as
Ruling with an iron fist as

The word around the court is that a remarkable [GetWeaponArmorSmith] is residing in [neighbor_province.GetName]. Perhaps I should invite the [smith.GetManWoman] to my court to see [smith.GetHerHis] work for myself. If [smith.GetSheHe] manages to impress me, I could order my own custom made item.
What a fine idea, how clever I am!
[physician.GetSheHe]が私の健康を維持する限り文句は言わない。

最初に、私の従者の中でもっとも目利きの者に[GetWeaponArmorSmith]の職人技を確認させた後、私は[From.GetHerHim]を玉座の間に通した。[From.GetSheHeCap]は自身を「巨匠 [From.GetFirstName]」と名乗り、多くの徒弟たちに合図を送ると、見本として[From.GetHerHis]の作品を次々と運んできた。'我が[Root.GetTitle]、何か特別なものをお望みでしょうか?'
ふと気づく。日がな一日、寝台に横たわっている自分に。起き上がることが、領土統治のごとく難しい。食べ物も味気ない、友と過ごす時間を楽しいと思えたのはいつだったろう。理由はわからないがこれだけはわかる。人生に嫌気が指してしまった。
The smith will never reach their destination and your treasures will be recovered.
The castle blacksmith, more used to horseshoes and helmets than work fit for royalty, presented you with a dirty old box. "Ta da" he says, nervously, "It was a sword you wanted right?" he adds.
The blacksmith who made this sword was probably drunk when they did so.

I am slashing my way through the enemies at the river bank, my blade covered in gore. The few enemies left are starting to back away from me, obviously terrified. Suddenly I am pulled off my feet as a sharp pain engulfs my leg. I turn to look into two large black eyes before I am pulled into the water.
was fed to a crocodile by $KILLER$

$NAME$ will become a new evil diety
A Guardian of Kailash is steadfast in their defense of the holy mountain of Kailash They fight for the Bön faith.
[This.Founder.GetTitledFirstName] managed to unite the formerly disparate East and West Slavic people under [This.Founder.GetHerHis] rule.
[This.Founder.GetTitledFirstName] managed to unite the formerly disparate East and West Slavic people under [This.Founder.GetHerHis] rule.
東部ステップ、インドまたはチベットにいる人物のみが中国からの恩恵を受けれます。朝貢国は中国の外交範囲を広げません。

The use of dark magic has corrupted me! The dark tendrils of [Root.GetDWDevil]'s magic has invaded my body, eroding mind and muscle alike. It is obvious that [Root.GetDWDevil] is keeping me alive, but at what cost?
全ての力には代償が伴うものです。黒魔術はこの人物の身体と理性を損ない、虚弱で痴呆になりやすくなります。そういった明らかな弱さにもかかわらず、闇の力は邪悪な理由によって彼らを生かし続けています…
Fighting in a Warrior Lodge as
Restoring the Glory of Rome as
